“Sifumene umdlalo omhle kakhulu. Siyayiqonda ukuba abanye babadlali abadala abasincedileyo kule minyaka idlulileyo badala ngoku, kufuneka kungene abadlali abatsha kwiindawo zabo. Yiyo lo nto ndicinga ukuba ubukho bukaCastro buzakwenza umahluko,” utshilo uMotaung. 
Amakhosi adlala neSuperSport United umdlalo wePSL ngentsimbi yesithandathu emalanga ngoMgqibelo eLucas Moripe Stadium. Iqela lika-Eric Tinkler liphethe unyaka lingaqhubi kakuhle. Lizakufuna ukuvula unyaka ngeziphumo ezihle, nayo iChiefs kwelayo icala ifuna njalo.

headline: ISuper Eagles inyukele kwaNational First Division
text:
Iqela laseFree State, iSuper Eagles, lizibekele indawo kwaNational First Division emva kokuphiwa umdlalo yiBuya Msuthu evuthululwe ngo’3-1 kumdlalo obungena mtsalane eSisa Dukashe Stadium. IBuya Msuthu iphise ngawo umdlalo ngoba indlela ebidlala ngayo ibingabonakalisi ukuba liqela elidlalela ukuphumelela. Kwenzeke into engazange yabakho ebholeni, abadlali benze izitayile emhlabeni wabo kubonakala ukuba akukho kwanto ebhadlileyo ezimisele ukuyenza. Ife namthanyana i-Acornbush ebekucingeleka ukuba yiyo ezakuya kwaNFD. 
  
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iSuper Eagles inkqenkqeza phambili ngo’2-1. Iqela laseFree State livule ngegowuli elifakwe nguMpapa Mofokeng kumzuzu wesithathu umdlalo uqalile. Emva koko iBuya Msuthu iye yalinyusa izinga lomdlalo wayo. UThapelo Selepe uyibeke endaweni entle iSuper Eagles ngofaka igowuli lesibini. Akukho mandla angako afakwe ngabadlali beBuya Msuthu kulo mdlalo kuba bekungasekho nto izakuyizuza kule tumente. 
  
Isiqingatha sesibini besithande ukushushu. IBuya Msuthu ibiphantsi koxinizelelo obelufakwa yiSuper Eagles ebileqa ukufaka amagowuli ukuze inyukele phezulu. UThabo Setsumi ufake igowuli lesithathu eliqinisekise indawo ye-Eagles kwinqanaba elingasentla. Inyukele kwiNFD, iSuper Eagles, emva kokuphumelela umdlalo wokugqibela. Komnye umdlalo iThe Dolphins neMaccabi zibambene ngo’2-2.

headline: Izuze amanqaku apheleleyo iChippa United emdlalweni obuseBidvest Stadium
text:
Uza kulala ubuthongo obumnandi uLehlohonolo Seema emva kokuba iqela lakhe lizuze amanqaku amathathu emdlalweni obalulekileyo ngorhatya lwanamhlanje. IChippa United iphumelele umdlalo wayo wokuqala namahlanje ukusukela oko kuthe kwabuya imidlalo yePSL ngokubetha iBaroka FC efe isilwa ngegowuli elinye (1-0) emdlalweni obubanjelwe eBidvest Stadium. Yimpumelelo yokuqala oko efikile uSeema emidlalweni emithathu engumqeqeshi oyintloko kwiChilli-Boys. Iqela laseMpuma Koloni liye emdlalweni liphantsi koxinizelelo olumandla – kodwa ngethamsanqa liza kuphefumla kancinci emva kokuzuza amanqaku aphuleleyo namhlanje. Igowuli elifakwe yifolosi yaseNigeria, u-Augustine Kwem, ibe kuphela kwalo emdlalweni obuseBidvest Stadium noxa amathuba ebekhona macala omabini. 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iChippa isendaweni entle ngoba ibinento esandleni. Umdlalo utake iintlantsi zisuka ngoba nayo iBaroka ibizingela impumelelo. Igowuli elifunyenwe yiChippa United kwangoko kwisigaba sokuqala kuyihluphezile nayo iBaroka. UVeli Mothwa unqande amanzi engena endlini amatyeli aliqela kwa kwisigaba sokuqala. Akukho mdlalo ophucukile odlalwe yiChippa kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Into abadlali bayo abayenze kakuhle kukukhusela igowuli labo qha. Naye uMothwa wenze umsebenzi omhle ezipalini encediswa ngoogxa bakhe abadlala emva. Noxa igoduka ingaphethanga nto esandleni iBaroka – kodwa ikwazile ukudala amathuba futhi iyiyo edlala umdlalo ongcono. IBaroka ikwindawo yeshumi elinesine, yona iChippa ikwindawo yeshumi elinesibini.

headline: UFrosler uyakwazi okuza kunceda iChiefs
text:
Onke amaqela aphambili asebenzela ukuyiphumelela yonke imidlalo yawo ukuze abhukuqe iKaizer Chiefs esahleli enkcochoyini  emva kokugqwidiza kwayo emidlalweni ebalulekileyo kwisigaba sesibini sesizini ka2019/20.  
Njengokuba iChiefs ilelona qela eliphantsi koxinizelelo, umdlali wayo wasemva uReeve Frosler uthi uyayazi eyona nto eya kuthi incede iqela lakhe ekugqibeleni.  
Imidlalo yanqunyanyiswa kwinyanga ephelileyo xa kanye isizini ingena kuvuthondaba ngenxa yesifo esinganyangekiyo ekuthiwa yikhorona.  
Emva kweminyaka emihlanu yendlala, Amakhosi anethemba lokuphumelela indebe kule sizini – kodwa kwakufuneka ayiphumelele yonke imidlalo eshiyekileyo ngoba iMamelodi Sundowns ifuthela emagxeni kwaye izimisele ukongeza ezinye iindebe phambi kokuvalwa kwesizini.  
Amakhosi sele eqokelele amashumi amane anesibhozo amanqaku emidlalweni engamashumi amabini anesibini.  
UFrosler uthi ukujongana nomdlalo omnye ngexesha kokona kwakuyinceda iChiefs. 
“Siyazama ukungazihoyi izinto ezidlulileyo. Into esizimisele ukuyenza kukujongana nezinto esinokwazi ukuzenza mhla kubuyiswa imidlalo kwakhona,” utshilo uFrosler ethetha ne-Independent Media.  
Kule sizini esamisiweyo, uFrosler uzibonakalisile okokuba ngomnye wabadlali ekunokuthenjelwa kubo nguErnst Middendorp ngokudlala kakuhle emidlalweni yonke ayidlalileyo kwiChiefs.  
Umsebenzi wakhe uqatshelwe nangabaqeqeshi bamaqela esizwe. UMolefi Ntseki ukhe wambandakanya kwiqela lakhe – kanti naye uDavid Notoane ebemfake kuluhlu labadlali ebeza kukhetha kulo abadlali beSA Under-23 ebebeza kumela uMzantsi Afrika kwimidlalo yeOlimpiki emisiweyo ngenxa yekhorona nebiza kusingathwa sisixeko ekuthiwa yiTokyo, eJapan.  
Loo midlalo iye yahlehliselwa unyaka ozayo (2021).  
“Ukumiswa kwemidlalo yeOlimpiki kunika bonke abantu ithuba lokuzibonakalisa. Into endinokuyenza mna kukuqhubela phambili nokuphucula indlela endidlala ngayo,” utshilo uFrosler.  
Njengokuba ihlabathi lisaxikixwa lulwamvila lwekhorona, akukacaci nokuba iya kuqala nini na imidlalo yeAbsa Premiership kwakhona.

headline: Iziphumo zingamfaka engxakini uShakes
text:
Ukungakwazi kweBafana Bafana ukuya kwi-2017 AFCON kunokwenzeka kunyanzele iSAFA yenze iinguqu.  
Umongameli weSAFA, uDanny Jordaan, ucatshulwe kumajelo eendaba esithi umsebenzi kaShakes Mashaba bazakuwuphonononga kwezi nyanga zizayo.  
ABafana Bafana babethe iGambia ngo’4-0 kumdlalo wokuzibekela indawo kwi-AFCON ezayo, kodwa oko khange kwanele. Ngoku kugqityiwe uMzantsi Afrika uzakuphoswa yile tumente yamazwe e-Afrika.  
Ekuqeshweni kwakhe uMashaba ngo’2014, ukuthatha inxaxheba kwi2017 AFCON nakwi-2018 FIFA World Cup yayizezona zinto zibalulekileyo ekufuneka ezenzile ngokwesibhambathiso sakhe nombutho olawula ibhola yelizwe loMzantsi Afrika.  
Ukuqeshwa kukaMashaba kwaphenjelelwa kukuphoswa kweBafana Bafana yindebe yehlabathi ebisingethwe yiBrazil ngo’2014. isiqalo sakhe umqeqeshi sibesihle kakhulu ngoba ukwazile ukuthatha iqela walisa kwi2015 AFCON eyayidlalelwa e-Equitorial Guinea.  
Kodwa izinto zange zilihambele kakuhle iqela lesizwe ngoba laphuma kumjikelo wokuqala.  
UJordaan uthele thsuphe iintatheli kumsitho wokuthelekiswa kwamaqela adlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League ngoMvulo ukuba kufuneka balinde iphele yonke imidlalo bandule beyiSAFA ukuthetha ngomsebenzi kaShakes.  
“Into esinokuyenza ngoku kukulinda kude kuphele le midlalo ye-AFCON, emva koko sakuthi sihlale phantsi sihlalutye imidlalo yeBafana Bafana yonke. Asinakuyenza lo nto ngoku,” utshilo uJordaan.  
UMashaba uvumile ke kambe ukuba ngokwenene iqela lakhe libaphoxile abalandeli balo.  
“Asikwazi ukuya kwi-AFCON, nomdlalo wethu neMauritania sabethwa likhadi elibomvu. Kodwa endifuna ukutsho kubalandeli bethu kukuthi sizichane ngokwethu. Ndiyazi bebefuna ukuba sibeyinxalenye yala tumente,” utshilo uShakes.  
Lo kaMashaba uthe eyona nto ayijongileyo ngoku yimidlalo ehlakulela indebe yehlabathi ka’2018 ezakube iseRussia. 
pedro.mapelo@Inl.co.za

headline: USenatla uncoma oogxa bakhe kwiBlitzbokke
text:
Umdlali ophambili kwiBlitzbokke, uSeabelo Senatla, uzenzele imbali kwiveki ephelileyo ngokulala emgceni ityeli lekhulu namashumi asibhozo ngethuba uMzantsi Afrika ubetha iFiji.  
Ngoku uSenatla uhamba phambili kwiBlitzbokke ngokufaka amagowuli emva kokuba uMzantsi Afrika uphumelele indebe yeWorld Rugby Sevens.  
“Oogxa bam ngabo abandenza ndidlale kakuhle,” utshilo uSenetla ochongwe njengomdlali wetumente.

headline: UJulies uyibeke endaweni entle kwakhona iChippa United
text:
USamuel Julies uphindile kwakhona! Lo mdlali uyithathe iChippa United wayibeka endaweni entle kwakhona emva kokufaka amagowuli amabini ngethuba iqela lakhe libetha iBidvest Wits ngo’2-0 kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obushushu ngendlela engumangaliso eBidvest Stadium izolo ebusuku.  
Le yimpumelelo yesibini yeeChilli Boys imidlalo ilandelelana kweyePSL emva kokudlala ntanganye imidlalo emihlanu ilandelelana phantsi komqeqeshi obambeleyo – uTebogo Moloi. Ngoku iqela likaTebogo Moloi lithe ngcu kwindawo yesithandathu emva kokuqokelela amanqaku alishumi elinesine kwimidlalo elishumi. 
Njengoko bekulindelekile, abadlali beWits bahlasele kuqala besebenzisa ifolosi eyingozi, u-Amr Gamal, kwakwimizuzu yokuqala emdlalweni – kodwa izinto azimhambelanga kakuhle. Omabini la maqela azamile ukudala amathuba kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo – kodwa kude kwayiwa kwixesha lokuphumla kungekho elibhalisileyo ebhodini.  
IiChilli Boys zibuye zonyanyile kwisigaba sesibini. UMarko Paseka uphekuze amadoda kufutshane emhlabeni oyingozi weWits – uthe gqi uJulies engabhungisanga, wayibeka endaweni entle iChippa ngegowuli lokuqala. Akubanga kudala waphinda elesibini – ngelo xesha ixesha beselisondela ekupheleni. Eli qela laseMpuma Koloni lifumene impumelelo yalo yokuqala kude nekhaya namhlanje. 
 Bidvest Wits: Keet, Allie, Hlatshwayo, Khumalo, Scott, Klate, Gamal, Pelembe, Pule, Hlanti, Mlambo. 
Chippa United: Akpeyi, Macheke, Okwuosa, Konqobe, Maphanga, Mvelase, Mdlinzo, Mabaso, Mako, Lentjies, Sekola.

headline: UHendrick Esktein ufumene iqela elitsha – kodwa akakuchasanga ukubuyela eNaturena!
text:
Emva kokushiya iKaizer Chiefs ekupheleni kwesizini kunyaka ophelileyo, ubomi bukaHendrick Ekstein buqhubele phambili. Uye watyikitywa liqela laseYurophu ekuthiwa yi-Azerbaijan emva kokuba engazange avumelane neChiefs ngemali kwiingxoxo ngesivumelwano sengqesho esitsha. Ekuqaleni kwale veki, uEksten (29) utyikitywe yiSabali FK – elinye iqela azifumanele lona eYurophu ngeli thuba lokuthengwa kwabadlali elivulwe ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka. Nangona kunjalo, uEksten uxelele iKickOff.com okokuba angabuyela kwiChiefs ukuba iyamfuna. Le ndedeba yemka kwiChiefs xa kanye umdlalo wayo ufunquka phantsi kuka-Ernst Middendorp owamenza elinye lamaxhadi wakhe emva kokuthatha iintambo ekuqaleni kuka-2019. 
“Andinangxaki nokubuyela kwiChiefs. Ngeke ndikwazi kodwa ngoku ngoba ndifuna ukudlala apha eYurophu. Mna nabadlali beChiefs sakuhlala singabahlobo. Andizami ukuthi ikhona into esasisilwa ngayo. Hayi, andinayo ingxaki neChiefs. Yiyo lo nto phambi kokuhamba kwam eNaturena, ndaya kusihlalo (Kaizer Motaung) endafika engekho. Andizange ndalwa neqela,” utshilo u-Ekstein kwiKickOff. Ukungavani kwakhe neChiefs kwamphosanisa nokudlala emdlalweni weNedbank eyabethwa kuwo iChiefs ngo’1-0 yiTS Galaxy edlala kwiGladAfrica League. “Yayiliphupha lam ukudlala umdlalo kwiNedbank Cup. Emva kwezinto ezenzekayo, ndandingakhathali ngoba eyona nto endandiyifuna yayikukudlala kula mdlalo,” utshilo uEkstein. 
Bekulindeleke uEkstein ahlale iminyaka emibini kwiqela alishiyileyo – kodwa uthi uye wahamba emva kokuxelelwa okokuba akanayo indawo ngumqeqeshi. “Kuye kwafika umqeqeshi omtsha. Ndidlale imizuzu embalwa emidlalweni emithathu emva koko umqeqeshi akandisebenzisa. Usihlalo weqela wandibiza wandixelela okokuba umqeqeshi akazundisebenzisa. Ndamxelela okokuba ngeke mna ndihlale ndingadlali. Ndathi kungcono siqhawulwe isivumelwano sam sengqosho ngoba andikwazi ukuhlala nje ndiphilile,” utshilo uEkstein.

headline: UBikwani woyisiwe yiTornado FC
text:
UThobela Bikwani ulahlile njengomqeqeshi weTornado FC kule veki. Oku kudizwe yiTornado kwikhasi layo lonxibelelwano uFacebook ngoLwesibini.  
Izinto aziyihambeli kakuhle iTornado, kangangokuba lo nto yenye yezinto ebangele umqeqeshi ahambe.  
“Ndingumntu osafuna ukuya phambili mna ebholeni, xa ndibona ukuba izinto azihambi kakuhle – ndiyasuka ukuze kungene omnye umntu. Noko ndihambe isekwiTop 8 iTornado,” utshilo uBikwani kweli phephandaba. 
Eli qela lihleli kwindawo yesihlanu kwi-ABC Motsepe League lishiywa ngamanqaku alishumi elinesine yiFuture Tigers ekwindawo yokuqala. Ngokwendlela eqhuba ngayo ayinalo kakuhle ithuba lokuya kwiNFD kule isizini. 
Imidlalo yeMotsepe League: 
Zimbane Killers vs Matatiele Professionals @New Rest Stadium 15:00; Vallies FC vs Walter Sisulu @Gelvandale Stadium 15:00; Swartkops vs Bees FC @N.U.2 Motherwell 15:00; Tornado FC vs Morning Stars @Jan Smuts Stadium 15:00; Lion City vs Highbury FC @N.U.2 Motherwell 15:00; City Lads vs FC Buffalo @Mt Ayliff Stadium 15:00; Mthatha City vs Young Ideas @Rotary Stadium 15:00; Future Tigers vs Matta Milan @Ginsburg Stadium 15:00

headline: USir Jiks ufuna ukuzigxama kwi-21km yeHeroes Marathon
text:
Ekuseni namhlanje izihlwele zabantu zithathe inxaxheba kwiHeroes Marathon. Omnye wabo bathe bayinxalenye yeHeroes kulo nyaka ligqala lomsasazi wesikhululo sasekuhlaleni, i-Unitra Community Radio, ogama linguSindile “Sir Jiks” Majikija – owaziwa kakhulu ngokubhexesha inkqubo ethandwayo yomculo kaMasikhanda. USir Jiks uzigxame kumdyarho weekhilomitha ezilishumi (10km). Emva kokufika kwakhe entanjeni uxelele eli phephandaba labantu, I’solezwe lesiXhosa, ukuba ebekonwabele kakhulu ukubaleka kwiHeroes Marathon nangona ebeqala ukuthath’inxaxheba kuyo. 
Amakhulu-khulu eembaleki eziphuma kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni, kwamanye amaphondo elizwe loMzantsi Afrika nezinye eziphuma kwizwekazi le-Afrika jikelele akhuphisene kwisiqendu seshumi elinesibhozo seHeroes Marathon eququzelelwa yi-Athletics Transkei ngokubambisana nesebe leZemidlalo, Inkcubeko noLonwabo. 
“Ndiyaqala namhlanje ukuthatha inxaxheba ngokubaleka apha kwiHeroes Marathon. Ndidla ngothatha inxaxheba kwezinye ezithi ziqhubeke kwiindawo ezingqonge uMthatha. Ndiyaqala ukungena kule kwaye ndiyonwabe kakhulu. Ndiyenzile ndayigqiba i-10km, kulo nyaka uzayo ndifuna i21km ngoba ndiyayonwabela,” utshilo uSir Jiks. 
Lo msasazi uthe amalungiselelo weHeroes khange abe nzima (kuye) ngoba ungumntu ozilolongayo yonke imihla ekuseni umthetho wakhe watsho esithi nabanye abantu mabazibandakanye nezinto ezinje ngoba ziyancedisana kakhulu nempilo.

headline: UMajoro uzakumanyana noTinkler kwiCape Town City
text:
Iqela elitsha lePremier Soccer League iCape Town City, lityikitye uLehlohonolo Majoro kwisivumelwano seminyaka emibini. Lo mdlali uneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithoba, uzakuphinda amanyane nomqeqeshi * -Eric Tinkler ekuqaleni kwesizini ezayo. 
Le folosi izakufumana ithuba lokuba iphinde idlale nabadlali ebidlala nabo ngaphambili, uTsepo Gumede noSamora Motloung. 
Kwinkomfa yoonondaba ibibanjwe eKapa, uJohn Comitis ukungqinile ukuba yena nomqeqeshi * -Eric Tinkler bazakuzama ukwangeza abadlali abambalwa ukulungiselela isizini ezayo. UMajoro uzakube enethemba lokuphinda afumane ithuba lokudlala. Khange akwazi ukufumana ithuba lokudlala kwi-Orlando Pirates nakwiKaizer Chiefs.

headline: Aphazamisekile amathuba weDowns kwindebe yePSL
text:
Iintshatsheli ze-Absa Premier Soccer league, iMamelodi Sundowns, iphinde yalahlekelwa ngamanqaku namhlanje emva kokudlala ntanganye ngo’2-2 nePlatinum Stars kumdlalo wePSL obubanjelwe eLucas Moripe Stadium. Iqela likaPitso Mosimane ligoduka neziphumo ezingancumisiyo namhlanje kanye emva kokubethwa yiBidvest Wits ngo’1-0 ekuqaleni kwale veki. 
  
ISundowns ilawule umdlalo zibekwa nje emdlalweni, kuthe xa ingomzuzu wesihlanu uThabo Nthethe wafaka igowuli lokuqala. Ukufakwa kwegowuli kuyothusile iDikwena yatsho yenza imigudu emva koko. UNdumiso Mabena, oyingxaki kakhulu xa eshiywe engagandwanga, unkqonkqozile kwade kwakabini; ude walifumana igowuli. Kuyiwe kwixeshwa lokuphumla ebambene ngo’1-1 la maqela omabini. 
  
Kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo, umdlali unyukele kwelinye inqanaba kwaye la maqela athathe apho ayeke khona kwisigaba sokuqala. Ahlaselene ngamandla – kodwa yiDikwena efake igowuli lesibini ngomzuzu wamashumi amahlanu anesihlanu. Nelesibini igowuli lifakwe nguMabena emva kokunikelwa ibhola entle nguGerald Phiri. Khange iyeke ukuzama iDowns nangona bekunjalo. UPitso ukhuphe uLucky Mohomi waze endaweni yakhe wafaka uTeko Modise. UModise, uPercy Tau no-Anthony Laffor bazamile ukuhlasela amatyeli aliqela – kodwa yabe ivalile iPlatinum emva. UYannick Zakri ufake igowuli lokulinganisa elithe layinika amandla ngakumbi iDowns.  
  
Ukungaphumeleli kweDowns kulo mdlalo kuwaphazamisile amathuba wayo okukhusela indebe ekupheleni kwale isizini. Yona iDikwena izinzile kwindawo yeshumi elinanye kwiPSL kwaye kubonakala ngathi isecicini lokuqinisekisa indawo yayo kwiPSL. 
 
  
  
  
Mamelodi Sundowns: Onyango, Mashaba, Morena, Nthethe, Madisha, Zakri, Mohomi, Billiat, Laffor, Kekana, Tau. 
  
Platinum Stars: Mzimela, Mpheta, Mlilo, Mwedihanga, Jongh, Phiri, Mkhabela, Msomi, Mere, Mabena, Ntuli.

headline: IBaroka isusiwe phezulu kwiNFD
text:
Izinto ziguqukile kwiNFD kule mpelaveki, kwaye ngoku ukhuphiswano lunikisa umdla njengokuba kuleqwa ekupheleni kwesizini.  
IHighlands Park isuse iBaroka  FC kwindawo yokuqala emva kokubetha iMilano United, ngegowuli elinye eqandeni eMakhulong Stadium, emva kwemini ngoMgqibelo. 
 Igowuli elize nempumelelo yeHighlands lifakwe nguJermaine Christian. IBaroka ibithabathe inxaxheba kwiNedbank Cup kule mpelaveki, kumdlalo wayo nePolokwane City, into ethetha ukuba khange idlale kwiNFD.  
NgeCawa, AmaZulu abambene ngeqanda macala neAfrican Warriors komnye wemidlalo yeNFD. USuthu ligoduke negowuli elinye phantsi kwesandla somqeqeshi olibambela uDelron Buckley.  
ISantos ingcwatywe yiRoyal Eagles ngamagowuli amane eqandeni, le mpumelelo ithatha i-Eagles iyibeke ngasentla kweWitbank Spurs, kwaye ikuluhlu lamaqela amathathu aphezulu. 
 IBlack Leopards ibuye nelize kule mpelaveki kumdlalo wayo neCape Town All Stars, amaphaphu ebephezulu kwiLidoda Duvha emva kokubetha iMthatha Bucks kwiveki engaphambili.  
ILeopards yiyo efake igowuli kuqala ngenqina likaBongani Manana, kodwa Igugu Lekapa likwazile ukuphendula sisaqhuba isiqingatha sokuqala ngegowuli elifakwe nguMlungisi Mbunjana.  
Elesibini lifakwe nguThokozani Sekotlong, elesithathu lifakwe nguSizwe Mdlinzo, iAll Stars iphumelele ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye.  
IMoroka Swallows ivuselele ithemba lokubaleka izembe kwiNFD, ngokubetha iMbombela United ngegowuli elinye eqandeni. 
chris.gilili@inl.co.za

headline: UMaseti watsalwa ngumdlalo omhle kwiDowns
text:
I’solezwe lesiXhosa lincokole nomlandeli weMamelodi Sundowns ogama linguMzameli “Zaza” Maseti. Le ndedeba yaseMdantsane ikhalela iMTN 8 – kodwa inethemba lokuba iDowns iyakuthi ikwazi ukuyikhusela indebe yePSL. 
Nondwe Tyilo: Leliphi iqela olilandelayo kwiPSL? 
Zaza Maseru: YiMamelodi Sundowns. Ndibathanda bonke abadlali kodwa uTiyani Mabunda ngoyena uphambili kum. 
NT: Watsalwa yintoni kwiSundowns? 
ZM: Ndaqala ukuyilandela ngo1992, mhla kwakudlala iBP Top 8. Kulapho sabethwa yiKaizer Chiefs ngenqaku eqandeni, indlela ababedlala ngayo ukugcina ibhola, ihamba phantsi ukusuka emva ukuya phambili – yeyona nto eyanditsalayo. Hayi le nto umntu asuke akhabele phambili. 
NT: Anikabethwa kwimidlalo yePSL, ingaba uziva njani ngezemidlalo eningayiphumelelanga? 
ZM: Ukungabethwa kona kundivisa kamnandi kakhulu. Ukudlala ntanganye kona akundikholisi ncam. Owam umnqweno kukufumana amanqaku apheleleyo. 
NT: Yintoni oyinqwenelayo kwiDowns emva kokuphuma kwiChamps League? 
ZM: Ukukhusela indebe yePSL ngowona mnqweno ophezulu endinawo. 
NT: Unalo ithemba lokuba iDowns ingayikhusela indebe yePSL kule sizini? 
ZM: Singakwazi ukuyikhusela indebe yePSL. Okundenza ndicinge njalo kukuba sisemva ngemidlalo kwaye sikwindawo yesixhenxe. Noko asikudanga kakhulu. Ukufumana nje kwethu amanqaku apheleleyo kule midlalo sisemva ngayo, kuya kusibeka endaweni entle kakhulu kwaye abadlali bethu abatsha ooSilva Meza noMaboe bayaswabuluka ngoku, bayangena kwisingqi somdlalo weSundowns. 
NT: Zeziphi iindebe ozijonge ngamehlo abomvu kule sizini? 
ZM: Eyona ndebe ebendiyinqwenela kakhulu yiMTN 8. Isiphuncukile, ngoku indebe yePSL yeyona ndiyijonge ngamehlo abomvu kwaye ndinalo ithemba lokuyifumana kwakhona.

headline: Ekugqibeleni, Umnqweno kaShabba ufezekisiwe!
text:
Emva kweminyaka elishumi elinesibini uSiphiwe Tshabalala engumdlali othembekileyo kwiKaizer Chiefs, kule veki ulibangise kwelaseYurophu – apho aza kuqala ubomi obutsha khona.  
Umnqweno kaShabba, 33, ufezekisiwe emva kokuthengwa liqela laseTurkey ekuthiwa yiBB Erzurumspor elidlala kwinqanaba eliphezulu.  
Ingxelo ithi uTshabalala utyikitye isivumelwano seminyaka emibini – kodwa likhona nethuba lonyaka wesithathu ukuba izinto zimhambela kakuhle.  
Lo mdlali akadlaliswanga nguGiovanni Solinas kumdlalo weMTN 8 ebambene kuwo iChiefs ngo’2-2 neSuperSport United kuba bekusashukuxwa ikamva lakhe.  
Ukuhamba kukaShabba yilahleko kwiChiefs ngoba ebengomnye wabadlali exhathise ngabo iminyaka emininzi – kodwa yinto entle kuye ngoba ebesoloko elangazelela ukudlala eYurophu. 
Amakhosi akungqinile ukuhamba kukaTshabalala awamthenga kwiFree State Stars ngo2007.  
Usihlalo weChiefs, uKaizer Motaung, umkhulule ngamazwi amnandi uShabba, watsho eqinisekisa indawo yakhe eNaturena ngelithi uyakuhlala eliKhosi nalapho aya khona.  
“Simnqwenelela okuhle kodwa apho aya khona uTshabalala. Uyakuhlala eliKhosi nokuba uphi na,” utshilo uMotaung. 
Imbali kaTshabalala kwiChiefs nakwiqela lesizwe ityebe kakhulu ngoba ungumdlali owazibalula ngokusebenza ngokukhuthala nokuhlonipha umsebenzi wakhe kwantlandlolo.  
Ungomnye wabadlali abadlalele iBafana Bafana amatyeli amaninzi, kanti nakwiChiefs uhamba edlale imidlalo engamakhulu amathathu anamashumi asixhenxe anambini.  
Kuloo midlalo ayidlale kwiChiefs, ufake amagowuli angamashumi amahlanu anesibhozo. Ngethuba ekwiChiefs uphumelele indebe yePSL kabini, iTelkom Knockout kathathu, iMTN 8 kabini neNedbank Cup kanye. 
Ephawula ngokuhamba kwakhe, uTshabalala uthe ukudlala phesheya yayisoloko iliphupha lakhe.  
Uthe yinto ekwakufanele yenzeka kudala – kodwa uyalamkela ithuba alifumeneyo nangoku.  
“Ndifuna ukubulela abalandeli. Kwiminyaka elishumi elinambini, bendonwabile kwiChiefs. Ibisoloko ingumnqweno wam ukuya phesheya, ngakumbi eYurophu. 
 Kwakufanele yenzeka kudala – kodwa ke uThixo uzenza ngexesha lakhe izinto. Likhaya lam iChiefs Village kwaye iChiefs iya kuhlala isentliziyweni yam. Ndinomnqeno wokuyeka ukudlala ibhola apha kwiKaizer Chiefs,” uvale ngalo mazwi.

headline: Amakhosi afuna ukuyigcina indebe
text:
Iintshatsheli ezikhuselayo ze-Absa Premiership kunye neMTN 8 iKaizer Chiefs izakuqala ukukhusela indebe yayo yokuqala ngokuhlwa kwanamhlanje xa bequbisana neqela laKwaZulu Natal iMaritzburg United. Lo mdlalo uza kudlalelwa e-FNB eRhawutini kwaye izakuba ngumdlalo wokuqala kamqeqeshi uSteve Komphela njengo mqeqeshi weChiefs, uzakube edlala neqela ebelikhokela kwisizini ephelileyo. 
IChiefs ibe zintshatsheli ze MTN 8 kwisizini ephelileyo emva kokubetha intshaba zabo i-Orlando Pirates kumdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi kwibala iMoses Mabhida. 
IChiefs ibibambe iinkomfa noonondaba ukuthetha ngalo mdlalo wanamhlanje, nalapho umqeqeshi uKomphela ebethetha ngendlela aziva ngayo nento enokulindelwa ngabalandeli beKaizer Chiefs. UKomphela ukuchazile ukuba ukukhusela lendebe yenye yenjongo zakhe eziphambili, neliqela. 
“Ingwe ayiwatshintshi amabala ayo, kufuneka siwenzile umsebenzi wethu kwaye ndilazi ukusuka nokuhlala eliqela,” utshilo uKomphela. 
UKomphela uye walishiya iqela leMaritzburg United ebutsheni buka Juni, emva kokufumana isithuba sokuqeqesha kwiChiefs. USteve uthi akayithatheli phantsi iMaritzburg neqeqeshwa nguMandla Ncikazi obengumncedisi wakhe kwisizini ephelileyo.  
“Banomceli mngeni nabo, kuba batshintshe umqeqeshi kunye nabadlali, kukho amaqela angoompondo-zihlanjiwe bodwa kwiMTN 8, kwaye ndizakuba nabantu ababekade benga baqeshi bam kwaye uMandla Ncikazi ngumqeqeshi onesakhono kakhulu,” utshilo uKomphela ethetha noonondaba, eRhawutini. 
IChiefs ivule kakubi kule sizini kuba babethiwe yi-Orlando Pirates kumdlalo wendebe iCarling Black Label wangoMgqibelo. UKomphela uthi banethemba kakhulu ngolu khuphiswano, kwaye bazakusebenza nzima ukubuyisela isidima sabo. 
“Ndiyabulela ukuba ndifumene ithuba elaneleyo lokuba ndingene kweliqela,” utshilo. “Imidlalo yethu yaphambi kokuvula kwesizini indinike ixesha elaneleyo lokuba ndifumane iziphumo endingakwazi ukusebenza ngazo kule sizini. Andikho phantsi konxinezelelo, siwulindele umdlalo wangokuhlwa.” Ikapteni esandula kwenyulwa yeChiefs uSiphiwe Tshabalala nodlala ecabangeni uthi uqinisekile ukuba nje ngabadlali sele bewulungele umdlalo wangomso. “Sizintshatsheli ezikhuselayo . Isizini ephelileyo ibinzima, kodwa kulena kuzakuba nzima kakhulu. Sifuna ukukhusela intshinga yethu,” utshilo uShabba.

headline: UMolefi Ntseki ucela uluntu luxhase aBafana Bafana phambi komdlalo weMandela Challenge
text:
Babila besoma abadlali beqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika lebhola ekhatywayo enkampini eseWolfson Stadium, eBhayi – apho balungiselela umdlalo wangempelaveki. IBafana Bafana iza kuswantsulisana nelizwe laseMali emdlalweni weNelson Mandela Challenge okulindeleke ubeshushu eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngeCawe. Umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana, uMolefi Ntseki, uhlabe ikhwelo eluntwini ngelithi mabeze ebaleni bazo kuxhasa iqela labo emdlalweni ongempelaveki. Amalungiselelo weqela lesizwe akahambi kakuhle ngenxa yokonzakala yentaphane yabadlali. UBongani Zungu noThamsanqa Mkhize ngabanye babadlali abakhululweyo ngenxa yokonzakala. Kanti abadlali abafana noPercy Tau, uErick Mathoho, uDean Furman noRonwen Williams akukaqinisekwa ncam ngokuphila kwabo. 
Kodwa nangona kunjalo, uNtseki uqhubela phambili nokusebenza nabadlali abakhoyo kwaye uthi ufuna iqela lakhe liphumelele ngeCawe. UMzantsi Afrika uza kufumana umdlalo wokuqala oko kuthe kwaqeshwa uNtseki endaweni kaStuart Baxter emva kokuba iZambia neMadagascar zigqibe kwelokuba zingadlali nawo ngenxa yokuhlaselwa kwabantu bamanye amazwe okwenzeke eGoli kwinyanga ephelileyo. UNtseki uthi ufuna ukusondeza iqela lesizwe ebantwini emva kokukwaywa kwalo ngabantu abaninzi ngenxa yokungakwazi ukuqhuba kakuhle kwiitumente ezinkulu. “Kubalulekile ukusondeza iqela lesizwe ebantwini ngoba lelethu sonke. Ukusondela ebantwini yeyona nto efunekayo ukuze bakwazi ukulixhasa iqela. Sisondela emidlalweni ehlakulela iAFCON 2021, inkxaso yabantu ibalulekile. Ndiyabacela abantu beze ebaleni bazo kusibukela naxa sizilolonga,” utshilo uNtseki ethetha neentatheli. 
–Isolezwe (laKwaZulu-Natal).

headline: UMaso noVelaphi bawabeke endaweni entle Amavarara kwiNedbank Cup
text:
Luvuyo lodwa ebantwini baseChris Hani naseMpuma Koloni jikelele emva kokuba Amavarara ebethe iSuper Eagles ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye emdlalweni weNedbank Cup obutshisa eSisa Dukashe Stadium emalanga namhlanje. UMzunani Mgwigwi wonelisekile ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo emva kokuba Amavarara edlulele kumjikelo wesibini weNedbank Cup kwilinge lawo lokuqala. Amagowuli weqela laseKomani afakwe nguSihle Maso noKhakha Velaphi kwisiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo. Nangona Amavarara abuye nempumelelo – kodwa ibithande ukuwaxaka iSuper Eagles kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Amavarara alandele iChippa United engombe iTS Galaxy ngamagowuli amathathu yatsho yagxotha uDan Malesela obengumqeqeshi wayo. 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla Amavarara enkqenkqeza phambili ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni (2-0). Umdlalo uqale ngesantya esintsi. Ilelo nelo iqela belibonakala lingafuni ukwenza iimpazamo emdlalweni. Kubekho imingqandandana yamathuba iqela laseKomani elingawasebenzisanga kakuhle. Kodwa izinto ziye zajika emzuzwini wamashumi amathathu anesibini ngethuba uSihle Maso ebhakuzelisa umnatha ngentloko emva kwebhola egotywe nguThandolweDayimane – obengomnye wabadlali abadlale kakuhle kakhulu kwisigaba sokuqala. Emzuzwini wamashumi amane, uKhakha Velaphi ufake igowuli lesibini laMavarara emva kokufumana ibhola ebisuka kwisikhuthali esinguThandolwethu kwicala lasekunene. 
Ekuqaleni kwesiqingatha sesibini somdlalo, iSuper Eagles ifake Amavarara  phantsi koxinizelelo. Emzuzwini wesine siqalile, uThabiso Mokoena ufake ibhola lula emva kokugqwidiza kwaMavarara emva. Igowuli libakhuthazile abafana baseFree State; baquqe bebuyelela emhlabeni weqela laseKomani. UDayimane uqulule ibhola ethe qelele – kodwa ifike unozinti weSuper Eagles, uThemba Makate, ethe qwa ezipalini. Uphinde wasebenza uMakate ngethuba exhimfa ibhola enzima ebikhatywe nguPule Ntsane. Khange kube kudala, unozinti waMavarara, uKhanya Mini, uvale ibhola enzima emva kokungakwazi kwabadlali bakhe ukuchitha ibhola emva.  Kude kwaphela umdlalo iSuper Eagles ingakwazanga ukufumana igowuli lokulinganisa. Ngalo ndlela, Amavarara adlulele phambili kwiNedbank Cup. 
  
Amavarara: Khanya Mini, Pule Ntsane, Nkosomzi Mzazi, Sapholwethu Kelepu, Abongile Twani, Ayavuya Gocina, Nkosomzi Mbenyana, Sihle Maso, Thandolwethu Dayimane, Athenkosi Lafota. 
Amalalela: Ayanda Masiko, Baxolise Nqumashe, Anele Thwani, Thabo Letsika, Siphelo Sizane, Athenkosi Tonisi. 
Super Eagles: Themba Makate, Fusi Letsatsi, Boitumelo Tsotsi, Gift Mogorosi, Teboho Moloi, Maduna Vusimusi, Mojalefa Sekhoto, Pule Khasane, Thabiso Mokoena, Motsama Moloi, Bongane Mofokeng. 
Amalalela: Mbali Tshabalala, Ditsietsi Motsitsi, Sandile Mkhwanazi, Toka Moshaliba, Buti Mokele, Vusimusi Mrajane, Katlego Banda.

headline: Bashiyeke bethe khunubembe abalandeli beChiefs!
text:
IPolokwane City iqinise indawo yayo kwiTop 8 ngokubetha iKaizer Chiefs ngo’1-0 kumdlalo obutshisa ePeter Mokaba Stadium ngale ntlwa yanamhlanje. Ukubethwa kweChiefs kuthetha ukuthi isecicini lokuvala isizini ingaphandle kwamaqela amathathu aphambili kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League athi afumane ithuba lokumela uMzantsi Afrika kwimidlalo yeCaf – elona themba ibinalo njengokuba ingafumananga nto nakule sizini. Umdlalo ubumhle kodwa Amakhosi akakwazanga ukuwasebenzisa amathuba awafumeneyo kwakhona kulo mdlalo nto leyo eshiye abalandeli bethe khunubembe. 
  
IPolokwane City neKaizer Chiefs ziye kwixesha lokuphumla kungekho ebhalisileyo ebhodini emva kwesiqingatha sokuqala ebesisihle kakhulu. Amakhwenkwe kaSteve Komphela alawule umdlale zisuka umdlalo, anikelene ngebhola kakuhle kwiindawo eziyingozi kwaye akwazile ukudala amathuba ambalwa. UJoseph Molangoane ufumene ithuba elihle kwimizuzu yokuqala yomdlalo – kodwa ibhola yakhe iphume ecaleni kwepali. Esiswini iibhola bezityalwa nguGeorge Maluleka esebenzisana noKeagan Buchanan – obenethamsanqa lokuqala umdlalo namhlanje ngenxa yokungabikho kukaWillard Katsande. Kanti yona iCity ibityhala ngoRodney Mamagalela onamendu angumangaliso, uJabu Maluleke ongomnye wabadlali abakrelekrele kweli lizwe noWalter Musona.  
  
Akukho nto ingako iPolokwane City ezenzele yona kumhlaba weChiefs – kodwa yona kwicala lasekunene ibixakekiswe nguRamahlwe Mphahlele – logama uGeorge Lebese obegoba iibhola ezintle ekhangela uBernard Parker obefakwe enkonkxeni nguTshepo Tema noThapelo Tshilo. Unozinti weChiefs, u-Itumeleng Khune, usebenze sekuphela ixesha kwisigaba sokuqala ngethuba ebetha ngeminwe ibhola ebikhatywe nguSalulani Phiri. Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo, iChiefs bekufaneluba ifumene igowuli emva kokudlala kakuhle namathuba ewafumeneyo kwisiqingatha sokuqala. 
  
Umgangatho womdlalo uye wanyuka kwisigaba sesibini. Amakhosi abonakele exhinele ukubhalisa ebhodini. UMalongoane noLebese bathathe apho bebeyeke khona kwisigaba sokuqala – kodwa bafike kuvaliwe ngabadlali beCity. Nangona iRise and Shine iyisokolisile nje iChiefs kwimidlalo edlulileyo, kulo umdlalo bekubonakala ngathi idlalela ukungabethwa qha. Lo nto inike iChiefs ithuba lokugcina ibhola kuyo ixesha elininzi. UKomphela ukhuphe uParker, endaweni yakhe ufake uGustavo Paez. Yona iPolokwane ikhuphe uMusona, yafaka uRendani Ndou. 
 
Thapelo Tshilo of Polokwane City celebrates his goal with teammates during the Absa Premiership 2016/17 match between Polokwane City and Platinum Stars at the Old Peter Stadium, South Africa on 19 April 2017 ©Samuel Shivambu/BackpagePix 
 
  
  
URamagalela uthe gqolo eyikhathaza iChiefs phaya emva – kodwa nguNdou oyena uphantse wayonzakalisa, kuncede uKhune. UTshilo uvalele ibhola emnatheni ngomzuzu wamashumi asixhenxe anesine emva kwebhola ebisuka ekoneni. Konke oku kwenzeke ngenxa yefuthe elifakwe nguNdou ongene kwisigaba sesibini emdlalweni. Iquqe ibuyelela iPolokwane kumhlaba weChiefs ikhangela igowuli lesibini. URyan Moon ungene endaweni kaBuchanan, yena uWilliam Twala uthathe indawo kaMolangoane. Umdlalo uye waqina ngakumbi, omabini esiya phambili ingakumbi iPolokwane ephantse yafumana igowuli lesibini ngebhola ekhatywe nguMngomezulu kwimizuzu yokugqibela. 
 
  
  
Polokwane City: Chigova, Semenya, Hlongwane, Tema, Tshilo, Phiri, Mngomezulu, Seabi, Ramagalela, Walter Musona (Rendani Ndou), Maluleke. 
  
Kaizer Chiefs: Khune, Mphahlele, Mathoho, Gordinho, Masilela, Maluleka, Ekstein, Buchanan (Moon), Molangoane, Lebese, Parker (Paez).

headline: UMemela noLorch benze abadume ngazo emdlalweni wePSL
text:
Amagowuli amabini afakwe nguLuvuyo Memela noThembinkosi ancede i-Orlando Pirates ephumelele kakuhle kakhulu emva kokubetha iBlack Leopards ng’2-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premier Soccer League obushushu e-Orlando Stadium kubusuku banamhlanje. Emva kokufumana amanqaku amathathu emdlalweni wanamhlanje, iPirates ihamba phambili kwiPSL ngamanqaku amathathu – ishiya iMamelodi Sundowns eseYiphutha (Egypt) emdlalweni weCaf Champions League. Ihlasele zisuka emdlalweni iPirates, isebenzisa abadlali bayo abadume ngokuhlasela abafana noJustin Shonga, uLuvuyo Memela noThembinkosi Lorch – kodwa iinzame zayo zithintelwe nagabadlali beLeopards basemva abebephantsi koxinizelelo olukhulu. 
UMemela ubhakuzelise umnatha ngebhola ebibekwe phantsi emva kokuwiswa kukaHappy Jele kufutshane nomhlaba kanozinti. Azamile ukuxhesha AmaBhakaniya kubonakala ukuba azama igowuli lesibini – kodwa ngelishwa lawo, ayenzekanga lo nto kwade kwayiwa kwixesha lokuphumla. Ekuqaleni kwesigaba sesibini somdlalo, uWayne Sandilands uye waxakekiswa kakhulu ngabadlali beBlack Leopards abafana noKarabo Tshebe – ebekubonakala okokuba bakhangela indlela yokufumana igowuli lokulinganisa. ULorch uvalele emnatheni igowuli lokugqibela sekusondele isiphelo somdlalo. UDylan Kerr uvakalise ukungonwabi kwakhe yindlela abadlali bakhe abadlale ngayo. Kanti yena uMilutin Sredojevic uwamkele amanqaku amathathu evule ngawo umsantsa phaya phezulu iPirates.

headline: Umqeqeshi wePirates uyifungele iSimba SC emdlalweni osekhaya
text:
Umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMandla Ncikazi, ubuye engonwabanga yimpatho enikwe iqela lakhe ebaleni nakwindawo ebelihleli kuyo ngethuba liseTanzania. Emva kokuba iSimba SC ibethe iPirates ngegowuli elinye eqandeni, uNcikazi ubaxelele iindaba zabo abantu baseTanzania. Indlela athethe ngayo ibakhwinisile abaphathi beSimba. Kuthe gqi ipenela umdlalo usiya ekupheleni. UShomari Kapombe uyifakile ipenela, yaphumelela ngaloo ndlela iSimba. Emva komdlalo uNcikazi uthe iSimba ayiphumelelanga ngoba incedwe ngusompempe othathe isigqibo esingafanelekanga. Lo nto ifikele kwezinye izinto ekucacu ukuba zenzeke kungekangenwa ebaleni. 
“Bekungafanelanga ukuba sibethiwe apha. Njengabantu balapha eAfrika, mayiphele le nto yokuphathwa kakubi kwabantu xa bezokudlala apha eTanzania. Benisiphethe okwezilwanya phambi komdlalo, phofu kuzo zonke iindawo esiya kuzo siphathwa kakubi,” utshilo uNcikazi obebhodla idangatya. “Lo ngumdlalo ekufanele usimanye singama-Afrika – kodwa endaweni yoko siyaxhatshazwa. Imithetho ithi emdlalweni makubekho iVAR, namhlanje ibingasebenzi. Ingajongwa la penela, ayikho enjeya. Umdlali wethu ufike kuqala ebholeni. 
“UNdlovu wethu akayinikwanga ipenela phambi kwale yeSimba SC – kodwa usompempe khange azihluphe nangokuyijonga. Ayopenela leya ifakwe kuthi. Ibisebenza iVAR?” ubuzile uNcikazi obesisifu ngumsindo emva komdlalo. “Niyenzelani le nto kwamanye ama-Afrika xa eze kwiSimba? Ingaba nilindele impatho efanayo eMzantsi Afrika? Kufanele nibenentloni yindlela eniziphethe ngayo. EMzantsi Afrika iza kuphathwa kakuhle iSimba ngoba thina siyakwazi ukuphatha iindwendwe,” utshilo uNcikazi othe iPirates iza kulwela ukuphumelela ekhaya emva kokubethiswa ngusompempe. Emva kweentetha zikaNcikazi, abaphathi beSimba bamkile kwiCAF nakwiFIFA batsho besithi boyikisela ubomi babo xa beze eMzantsi Afrika.

headline: UPaez uncede iChiefs kwiNedbank Cup
text:
UGustavo Paez – ifolosi eyenza umsebenzi oncomekayo kwezi ntsuku – uzibonakalisile namhlanje ukuba ngokwenene angathembela kuye Amakhosi emva kokubuya namagowuli amabini kumdlalo angene njengelalela kuwo. IKaizer Chiefs ibethe iAcornbush ngo’2-1 ebunzimeni kumdlalo weNedbank Cup eKabokweni Stadium namhlanje emalanga. Ngomzuzu wamashumi amabini anesixhenxe i-Acornbush iphulukene nomdlalo wayo ophambili, uSandy Nyathi, onikwe ikhadi elibomvu ngenxa yokunyathela kakubi uWillard Katsande.  
Lo nto khange iyityhafise konke konke i-Acornbush ngoba iqhubele phambili nokuhlasela yade yafumana igowuli elifakwe nguMudzunga Sidumo ngentloko. Nangona iChiefs ibiyiyo elawula ibhola – kodwa side saphela isigaba sokuqala kulo mdlalo ingekalifumani igowuli lokulinganisa. Kwisigaba sesibini uSteve Komphela wenze iinguqu emdlalweni; ukhuphe uKgotso Moleko noSibusiso Khumalo, wafaka ezindaweni zabo uGustavo Paez noWilliam Twala abafike benza umahluko. Khange kubekudala emva koko, uPaez ungcangcazelise umnatha emva kokufumana ibhola kuBernard Parker. Kuthe xa kushiyeke imizuzu emithandathu, uPaez uphindile wafaka elinye kwakhona – atsho Amakhosi akwazi ukudlulela kumjikelo olandelayo weNedbank Cup. 
 
Fiston Abdoul of Bloemfontein Celtic during the 2017 Nedbank Cup Last 16 game between Bloemfontein Celtic and Mbombela United at Dr Molemela Stadium, Bloemfontein on 9 April 2017 © Frikkie Kapp/BackpagePix 
 
Kwelinye icala, iBloemfontein Celtic izibethele iMbombela United ngo’2-0 othuleyo kumdlalo obubanjelwe eDr Molemela Stadium. Amagopwuli amabini weCeltic afakwe nguFiston Abdoul Razak kwisiqingatha sokuqala nakwesesibini. Kulo mdlalo iSiwelele ayihambanga lula ngoba unozinti wayo unqande amanzi engena endlini.  
Ekugqibeleni kusebenze amava, iCeltic izibonakalisile ukuba ngamakhwenkwe amakhulu. Iye kulo mdlalo inamandla emva kokubambana neMamelodi Sundowns ngeqanda phakathi evekini. Ukuqhuba kakuhle kweCeltic kwiNedbank Cup kuzindaba ezimnandi emva kwesizini engahambanga kakuhle nasemva kotshintsho lwabaqeqeshi abaliqela kwakule sizini inye into engaqhelekanga kwiCeltic. Uthelekiso lwamaqela luzakwenziwa eGoli ngokuhlwa kwangoMvulo.

headline: SA Under-23: UMzantsi Afrika uzibekele indawo kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki!
text:
Abalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo bafumene iindaba ezincumisayo namhlanje ngethuba iqela lesizwe, iSA Under-23, lizibekela indawo kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki eza kubanjelwe eTokyo, eJapan, emva kokubetha iGhana ngo’6-5 kumapenela emdlalweni we-2019 Under-23 African Cup of Nations obubanjelwe kwisixeko saseCairo, eYiphutha. UMzantsi Afrika neGhana zigqibe amashumi alithoba emizuzu zibambene ngamagowuli amabini macala (2-2) emdlalweni. Lo nto iye yanyanzela uzompempe obephethe umdlalo awase kumapenela amaqela ngoba bekufuneka kubekho iqela eliza kuba lelesithathu kulawo aza kumela i-Afrika kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki kunyaka ozayo eTokyo. Amakhwenkwe kaDavid Notoane atsazise igazi kuqala emdlalweni emva kokuba uHabibi Mohammed weGhana egwaze ngomkhonto ekhaya ngebhola ebisuka kuMatlala Makgalwa. 
 
Nangona uMzantsi Afrika uye kwixesha lokuphumla uhamba phambili ngegowuli elinye – kodwa ulahle inkitha yamathuba ebinokongeza ebhodini. Kwisigaba sesibini, uHJK Helsinki Evan Mensah ufake igowuli lokulinganisa kunozinti woMzantsi Afrika, uMondli Mpoto. Emva koko, uMahlatsi ufake igowuli lesibini loMzantsi Afrika emdlalweni obunzima kakhulu. Abadlali beGhana banyuse umxakatho bakubona ukuba ixesha liyemka. Emzuzwini wamashumi asibhozo anesihlanu, uSamuel Gyabaa, ufake igowuli lesibini leGhana eliye lanyanzela umdlalo uye kumapenela. Baqhube kakuhle kakhulu abadlali boMzantsi Afrika – kodwa elona qhawe ibe nguMondli Mpoto othe wacika ipenela eyenze umahluko omkhulu. Abalandeli bebhola eMzantsi baza kuxola ngoba iGhana ibethe kabuhlungu aBafana Bafana ngo’2-0 emdlalweni ohlakulela iAfcon yooxholovane. Yimbali le kuDavid Notoane unikwe uxanduva lokusa iqela eTokyo engakhange enze namalungiselelo.

headline: Inyukele phezulu iPirates
text:
UTendai Ndoro wenze ezibukwayo ngokufaka amagowuli amabini ancede iqela lakhe.  
Inyukele phezulu i-Orlando Pirates kwiPSL emva kokungomba iGolden Arrows ngo’4-1 eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngoMgqibelo odlulileyo.  
Amanye amagowuli afakwe nguLuvuyo Memela no-Issa Sarr. Ikhokele ngamagowuli amathathu kwakwisigaba sokuqala iBucs.  
Iwulawule umdlalo iPirates, kodwa zijikile izinto emva kokukhutshwa ngekhadi elibomvu kukaLehlogonolo Masalesa. Izamile iArrows yade yafumana igowuli, kodwa ngelishwa ayikwazanga ukufaka amanye.  
Umdlali oye waqaqamba kula mdlalo nguAdwin Gyimah. Sekulithuba ngoku udonga lwasemva leBucs lingasavuzi njengakuqala.  
UGyimah ngomnye wabadlali ekuthenjelwe ngabo ngu-Eric Tinkler ngenxa yomsebenzi awenzayo. Nakulo mdlalo uGyimah udlale ngokukhuthala okukhulu wade wafumana iwonga, kodwa uncoma oogxa bakhe.  
“Umdlalo ubumnandi kakhulu. Besisazi indlela abadlala ngayo. Ibinxanelwe umdlalo i-Arrows kuba isendaweni embi kwiPSL. Umqeqeshi wethu uthe masifake ibhola emnatheni qha, senze njalo,” utshilo uGyimah.  
IPirates inalo ithuba lokuvala isizini iphakathi kwamaqela aphambili ukuba ithi gqolo iphumelela.

headline: Ityikitye abadlali ababini iChippa United
text:
Onke amaqela adlala kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League athe bhazalala kwilizwe lonke ekhangela abadlali. 
 Nayo iChippa United ikwelo phulo, kangangokuba yona ityikitye abanye abadlali ababini kwakhona.  
Umdlali wasemva weKaizer Chiefs, uZitha Macheke noGeorge Okpabio ngabadlali beChippa ngoku. Ezi ndaba zidizwe ngumphathi weli qela lizinze eBhayi, umnumzana Siviwe Mpengesi, kwikhasi lomnatha kalindixesha ophuma ngenyanga.  
UMacheke ngomnye wabadlali abangamashumi amabini abakhululwe yiChiefs ekupheleni kwesini. Kodwa ke le ndodana ichithe ixesha elithile idlala kwiChippa. 
 Le yenye yamajoni athembekileyo ekulindeleke ancede uDan Malesela ofuna ukwenza ezibukwayo kwisizini ezayo kwiPSL.  
UDavid Zulu ngomnye wabadlali abazakuthi badlalele iChippa emva kokuba Amakhosi ethe makahlale enye isizini kwakhona.  
UGeorge Akpabio yena ubuyela kwiiChilli-boyz okwesibini. Kunyaka ophelileyo waya kudlalela iqela laseTurkey.  
Kulindeleke ukuba le ndodana iminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithathu incedise kakhulu iChippa ekufakeni amagowuli. 
Emva kokuba iiChilli-boyz zivale isizini ephelileyo kwindawo yesithandathu okokuqala kwimbali yazo; uMalesela uthe kwisizini ezayo ufuna iqela lakhe lilwele indebe.  
Ngumsebenzi onzima kakhulu lowo ngoba kufuneka abenabadlali abakulungeleyo ukuwenza lo msebenzi.  
Yiyo lo nto eqokelela abadlali acinga ukuba bazakumelana nendlela asebenza ngayo kweli qela.  
Izinto zizakuthanda ukuba nzima kwiChippa ngoba ikhuphisana namaqela kwiPSL anezipaji ezinzulu, yona ibe ingenabo abaxhasi. Kwelinye icala ijongene nomcelimngeni wabadlali abaphambili abafunwa ngamaqela amakhulu.  
Amakhosi ne-Orlando Pirates kuthiwa afuna uThamsanqa Sangweni noJoseph Molangoane.  
UMpengesi uthi iqela elibafunayo kufuneka likhuphe imali, kodwa akanayo injongo yokubathengisa.

headline: UMahlatse unethemba lokudlala kwiChippa
text:
Phakathi kwabadlali abaliqela abafunyenwe yiChippa United phambi kokuqala kwale sizini kukho uMahlatse Makudubela – omnye wabadlali abanokuyithatha ibhola yelizwe bayibeke kwinqanaba eliphezulu xa enokunikwa ithuba lokudlala. 
 Lo mdlali ugaleleke kwiiChilli Boys kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo ngemboleko esuka kwi-Orlando Pirates – apho angakwazanga ukufumana ithuba lokudlala phantsi kwabaqeqeshi abaliqela kwisizini edlulileyo.  
Nangona engekadlali kangako – kodwa yena uMakudubela usendaweni emlungeleyo ngoba indlela adlala ngayo ihambelana ngqo nomdlalo weChiefs. Kukuye ke ukuba uyalisebenzisa ithuba alifumanayo kuTeboho Moloi. 
 Phambi kwekhefu lemidlalo yeFIFA, uMakudubela unikwe ithuba xeshikweni iChippa iqubisene neGolden Arrows kwaye uzimisele ukulisebenzisa kwakhona ithuba elivelayo. 
“Kube mnandi kakhulu kum xa ndifumana ithuba lokudlala. Lo nto iza kundinceda ukukhulisa ukuzithemba kum,” utshilo uMakhudubela kwikhasi lomnatha leChippa. 
Le ndedeba iyakuvuyela kakhulu ukudlalela iChippa United nokudlala phantsi kukaMoloi ongene endaweni kaDan Malesela kwinyanga edlulileyo. 
 “Kuyandonwabisa ukuba seBhayi. Zininzi izinto endizifundayo apha phantsi kwalo mqeqeshi. Kwabalula kum ukuza apha ngoba ndandisazi uMalesela. Yiyo lo nto ndingazange ndilibazise xa usihlalo uSiviwe Mpengesi noKoutroulis besiza naloo mbono. Mna nomqeqeshi sifuna into enye: impumelelo. Singayenza lo nto kwaye ndizimisele ukwenza elam igalelo kweli qela,” utshilo uMakhudubela. 
NgeCawe ngentsimbi yesithathu, iChippa yamkela iCape Town City kumdlalo wePSL ozakube useSisa Dukashe Stadium.  
IiChilli Boys zikhangela indlela yokuqokelela amanqaku emva kwemidlalo emine eziyidlale ntanganye phantsi kukaMoloi.  
Ukuba abadlali bakaTebza bazimisele, banalo ithuba lokuyibetha iCity. Amakhwenkwe kaBenni McCarthy asaphazamisekile ngokwasengqondweni emva kokubethwa kwiMTN 8 nayiBloemfontein Celtic ngoLwesibini kule veki. 
 Imidlalo yeChippa izakudlalelwa eMdantsane ngoku emva kokupasiswa kweSisa Dukashe nguRonnie Schlos kwiveki ephelileyo.

headline: Ushiyeke edanile uHugo Broos kukubetha kwaBafana Bafana
text:
Umqeqeshi weqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika uvakalise ukudana kwakhe emva kokubethwa kweqela lakhe izolo ebusuku. ABafana Bafana babuyela ekhaya bemongoza emva kokubethwa ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye (2-1) emdlalweni wokuqala obuseStade Prince Moulay Abdallah, eRabat, ohlakulela indlela eya kwiAfrican Cup of Nations kunyaka ozayo. UMzantsi Afrika utsazise igazi kuqala izolo emzuzwini wesibhozo kwisigaba sokuqala ngebhola entle efakwe Lyle Foster odlalela iqela laseBelgium, eYurophu. Nangona iMorocco ibihlasela macala onke – kodwa ayikwazanga ukugqobhoza kwisigaba sokuqala. Lo nto ibanike ithemba abalandeli boMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi emva komsebenzi omhle owenziwe nguRonwen Willians ezipalini. Nguye othintele ukungena kwamagowuli emva kokuyekelela koogxa bakhe basemva. 
Amathuba okuba iMorocco ifumane igowuli okanye amagowuli ebekhona. Into engakwazanga ukuyenza kukuwasebenzisa kwisigaba sokuqala. Kwisigaba sesibini ibuye ifuna into enye, igowuli lokulinganisa. Kuthe kwakucaca ukuba igowuli lokulinganisa ayilifumani, amandla abadlali beMorocco aye ehla. Nakubeni kunjalo, aBafana Bafana abakwazanga ukongeza okanye ukufumana igowuli lokuphumelela. Zijikile izinto ngethuba iMorocco ifumana igowuli elifakwe nguYoussef En Nesyri kwisigaba sesibini. Kuthe xa kuphela ixesha lomdlalo, uAyoub El Kaabi ubhakuzelise umnatha kwaphela ngoMzantsi Afrika. UHugo Broos uxelele iintatheli ukuba iziphumo zomdlalo asinto ebeyifuna. 
“Ayizoziphumo ebesizifuna ezi sizifumeneyo,” utshilo uBroos emva komdlalo. “Emva kwexesha elide, bendicinga ukuba singawuphumelela umdlalo. Namva kokuba befumene igowuli, bendingenayo ingxaki yokufumana inqaku elinye. Into endiphoxileyo ligowuli lesibini elingene sekuphela ixesha lomdlalo. Andiphoxekekanga kodwa yindlela iqela elidlale ngayo kwaye siyayazi ngoku into efunekayo xa sidibana neMorocco emdlalweni wesibini. Sikwazile ukulwa neMorocco ebinamandla. Ndiyathemba ukuba siza kuyibetha kabini iLiberia xa sidibana nayo,” utshilo uBroos. UGroup K umanazwe amathathu emva kokuguzulwa kweZimbabwe ngenxa yemiba yayo neFIFA. Nangona kukho ilizwe elingekhoyo, mabini amazwe aza kuya kwiAfrica Cup of Nations ekunyaka ozayo.

headline: UPeter de Villiers ngumqeqeshi omtsha weZimbabwe
text:
Owayefudula eqeqesha Amabhoko-bhoko, uPeter de Villiers, ubuyele kumbhoxo wehlabathi emva kokunikwa uxanduva lokuqeqesha ilizwe lasebumelwaneni – iZimbabwe. Le ndedeba yakwaDe Villiers ibuyela embhoxweni emva kokudinga umsebenzi kwinqanaba lehlabathi iminyaka esixhenxe yonke emva kokushiya iqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika. “Liwonga elikhulu kum ukuqeqesha iZimbabwe – kodwa ndisalinde kuthathwe isigqibo ngokusesikweni ziziphathamandla. Ndiqinisekile bakuthatha isigqibo esifanelekileyo. Ndisakufuna ukusebenzela umbhoxo, naphi na apho ndibizwa khona ndiza kuya,” ucatshulwe esitsho uDe Villiers phambi kwokwenziwa kwesibhengezo. 
Lo kaDe Villiers ngomnye wamadoda ahlonitshwayo embhoxweni eMzantsi Afrika. Egameni lakhe uDe Villiers unezinto eziliqela anokuzibalisa ngaye. Kwiminyaka emine eqeqesha iiBoks, le ndoda yagqugqisa kumazwe afana neNew Zealand, eNgilane, e-Ireland nakwiTri-Nations ngo-2009. Amabhoko-bhoko aphumelela amashumi amathathu wemidlalo yovavanyo kwengamashumi amane anesibhozo. Lo mqeqeshi wagqibelisa kwiiBoks emva kokubeethwa kwazo ngo’11-9 ziiWallabies kwindebe yehlabathi ngo-2011. Kule minyaka idlulileyo, uDe Villiers ebesoloko esebenza njengomcebisi kumaqela athile eNtshona Koloni kanti ekwayiyo nengqonyela yeqela lombhoxo kwiYunivesithi yela phondo.

headline: Anthony Laffor: Asazinto ngeMedeama SC
text:
Iqela laseGhana, iMedeama SC, elizodlala neMamelodi Sundowns kwiCaf Confederation Cup lifana nencwadi evalekileyo ngokutsho komdlali siswini weli qela * -Anthony Laffor.  
ULaffor uvalele amagowuli amathathu eyedwa ngethuba iSundowns ithatha indebe ye-Absa Premier Soccer League emva kokubetha AmaTuks ngo’3-0 kumdlalo obuseTuks Stadium ngoLwesithathu ebusuku. IiBrazillians zamkela iMedeama kukhuphiswano leConfederation Cup eLucas Moripe Stadium ngokuhlwa ngomso ngentsimbi yesithandathu emalanga. “Sithembele kubantu abaye eGhana, apho bebejyoonga indlela abadlala ngayo. Sizakujonga imidlalo yabo eshicilelweyo ukuze sazi ukuba badlala njani. Ngabo abazakusixelela ukuba badlala njani. Kobalula xa sidlala umlenze wesibini,” utsho uLaffor. 
Lo mdlali uphambili kwiDowns uthi bazimisele kakhulu ukudlulela kumjikelo olandelayo kolu khuphiswano. IDowns ingena kolu khuphiswano emva kokuba ikhutshwe kwiChampions League kwinyanga ephelileyo.

headline: UBhungu noNcitha bancothula italente ekuhlaleni
text:
Inkampani eququzelela imilo yamanqindi iNcitha-Bungu Promotions ibisindleke itumente yokunceda imbethi-manqindi ezisakhulayo kudidi lwabahlawuyo ngeCawe, eMdantsane Indoor Sport Centre.  
Ethetha nephephandaba Isolezwe lesiXhosa, owayesakuba yintshatsheli yehlabathi izihlandlo ezilishumi elinantlanu, uVuyani “The Beast” Bungu, nongomye wabaphathi bale nkampani ebambisene nenye imbethi-manqindi yodumo uWelcome Ncitha, unabe wathi “Siyavuya noWelcome kuba itumente iqhube kakuhle kakhulu, injongo zethu ibizezokuba sijongane nezimbethi-manqindi zisakhasayo, singazifanisi nabanye abaququzeleli abajonga imbethi-manqindi ezaziwayo. Kumava esinawo emanqindini sibone iyindima yethu ukuncedana nezi mbethi-manqindi zisakhasayo kwaye zingajongelwanga ntweni, ekugqibeleni ngumsebenzi lo kubo,abanye ababeka isonka etafileni ngokuncinci abakwenzayo kwimilo ekumila kunje.”  
“Ezinye zezimbethi-manqindi zizilolonga ithuba elingango nyaka umntu engafumani mlo,kuyilo nto ke besidibene apha. Asiphelelanga nje apha elokishini,sijonge ukusa itumente ezikumila kunje kwindawo ezisemaphandleni,siyayazi intlungu yezimbethi-manqindi.” Kumlo omkhulu wosuku, uSimthembile Luzipho ebequbisene noMbulelo Besta kumlo onemijikelo elishumi. ULuzipho ozilolonga e-Africa Boxing Gym uwuphumelele ngokucacileyo umlo ngokuthi neejaji zimnike amanqaku ngolu hlobo: Dunjwa;72-80, Thandi; 76-78, Matika; 74-72. Ephawula ngomlo wakhe kudliwano-ndlebe, uLuzipho uthe: “Ndiziva ndonwabe kakhulu kuba ndiziphindezele kuBesta, wandibetha kuqala. Yena uyimbethi-manqindi enamava kwaye uyakwazi ukunyamezela, into endizincede ngayo kukuba ndingasondeli kuye – ndilwe ngaphandle.  
“Ndize kulo mlo ndizilolonge ngeyona indlela, nemijikelo ithe chatha kunomlo wangaphambili,umgangatho ubuxhomile.  
Njengayiphi imbethi-manqindi ndinephupha lokuzibona ndiphakamisa intshinga yoMzantsi Afrika okanye intshinga yehlabathi. Ndifuna ukuthi abathandi nabalandeli mabandinyamezele, ndizakuzilolonga kwakhona ndisebenze nangakumbi.”

headline: UYakheka Mpukane uzakhela ikamva emahasheni ezilalini!
text:
“Ndifuna ukuba yidyokhi – kodwa ndifuna nokufunda.” Lawo ngamazwi kaYakheka Mpukane, inkwenkwana eneshumi elinambini leminyaka (12) yaseSinqumeni, eDutywa. Noxa esemncinane ngeminyaka nangomzimba – kodwa izinto azenzayo xa eqabele ihashe zinkulu kakhulu kunaye. UYakheka, obeqabele ihashe ekuthiwa nguBazothini Abantu, uphume phambili emidyarhweni emibini kuBhomela, eDutywa, ekuqaleni kwale nyanga. Xa eqabele ihashe, uYakheka uyazinza alawule isantya sehashe ngomkhala nangemvulu yakhe ngobuchule ngokufanayo needyokhi eziqeqeshiweyo. Njengokuba abantu abaninzi bethatha ixesha elide ukuze bazazi iziphiwo zabo okanye izinto abafuna ukuzenza ebomini – yena uYakheka sele eyazi kodwa ufuna ihambe nemfundo. 
“Kudala ndiyidyokhi,” utshilo uYakheka ngelizwi eliqavileyo, ephendula I’solezwe lesiXhosa. “Ndingaphaya kweminyaka emibini ndiphalisa. UTat’ omkhulu wam wayephalisa, mna ndafundiswa nguye,” utshilo uYakheka. Into ephuma emlonyeni kaYakheka iphilile kwaye ucinga njengomntu omdala. Nangona ezazi ukuba uyidyokhi ekonwabelayo ukuphumelela – kodwa yonke lo nto ufuna ihambe nemfundo. “Ukubamba indawo yokuqala kundivuyise kakhulu. Eyona nto eyenza kube mnandi kakhulu kukuba uvuyelwa ngumntu wonke emva komdyarho. Xa ndimdala ndifuna ukuya kwinqanaba eliphezulu – kodwa ndifuna nokufunda. Akukho qeqesho esilifumanayo. Thina sijonga indlela abaphalisa ngayo badala kuthi. Ndikuthanda kakhulu ukuphalisa amahashe futhi andoyiki mntu,” uvale ngaloo mazwi. 
Uyisemkhulu, uMnu. uVukile Mpukane, uya naphi apho ayakhona umzukulwana wakhe. “Unyanisile, wafundiswa ndim. Kudala ndaphalisa. Into eyabangela ndimfundise kukuba nguye othanda amahashe. Kudala elila esithi mandithenge ihashe aza kuphalisa lona emidyarhweni. Lo mntana ulala ecaleni kwehashe. Xa lisesitalini; uphuma nokuba kukane ebusuku. Ukuphalisa yinto esegazini kuye (uYakheka) ngoba yinto azalwe isenziwa kowabo. Injongo yam kukumsa eGqeberha – apho aza kufundiswa khona. Ndifuna afumane uqeqesho ngoba ukuphiwe ukuphalisa amahashe,” utshilo uMnu. Mpukane.

headline: Lebese: ndonwabile kwiKaizer Chiefs
text:
Omnye wabadlali abaziintsika kwiKaizer Chiefs, uGeorge Lebese, utyikitye isivumelwano esitsha kutshanje nangona bekukho amarhe amoyamanisa neqela laseTurkey eliqeqeshwa nguStuart Baxter. 
Le ndedeba inamashumi amabini anesithandathu eminyaka izibophelele eminye iminyaka emithathu, oku kwenzeka emva kokuhamba kwabadlali abadlale indima ephambili kwimpumelelo yeli qela laseNaturena. 
“I’Kaizer Chiefs liqela elikhulu, ndinikwe iminyaka emithathu ndayamkela nam lo nto. Ndonwabile apha kwiChiefs kwaye ndinethemba lokuhlala ixesha elide,” utshilo uLebese.

headline: Baza kuyibek’apha kuKagiso Rabada
text:
Emva kokuphumelela kwesibheno sikaKagiso Rabada kule veki, abadlali beAustralia bayangcangcazela phambi komdlalo wovavanyo namhlanje.  
URabada uza kudlala ngomzimba okhululekileyo emva kokuba umbutho olawula iqakamba, i-ICC, uguqule isigwebo semidlalo emibini engadlali uRabada emva kokugilana ngegxalaba noSteve Smith ekuqaleni kwale nyanga.  
Ngenxa yokungoneliseki sisigwebo, iCricket South Africa, ichonge  ingcungela yegqwetha uDaluxolo “Dali” Mpofu ukuze ibe yiyo echophela isibheno.  
Ukuguqulwa kwesigwebo sikaRabada ziindaba ezimnandi kakhulu kwiProteas nakuMzantsi Afrika ngokubanzi ngoba ngoyena mdlali ekuthenjelwe kuye emva kokuvuthulula iAustralia kwimidlalo egqithileyo. Umqeqeshi weProteas, uOttis Gibson, ukholelwa kwelokuba umdlali wakhe usifundile isifundo emva kokurhoxiswa kwesigwebo.  
“Ndiqinisekile ufunde isifundo kule veki. Andiqondi ukuba uyakuphinda ayenze impazamo enje kwakhona. Kufuneka ayigade indlela abhiyoza ngayo. Andifuni kuthi unengxaki nokuziphatha ngoba ungumntu ohloniphayo kakhulu. Ebeza kuphoswa uKG, into ebangele iCSA ibhene kukuba sibone isigqibo se-ICC singenabo ubulungisa,” utshilo uGibson.

headline: Unethemba kwiqela lakhe uDe Villiers
text:
Emva kwesiqalo esingakhange sibesihle kuluhlu lemidlalo yosuku olunye, iiProteas kuzakufuneka zimise ingqondo xa ziqubisana ne-Australia, kumdlalo wazo wesibini ngomso. 
 NgoLwesihlanu abafana bakaRussel Domingo khange bakwazi ukumelana neWest Indies kumdlalo wokuqala wosuku olunye, babethwa ngoothinti abane.  
USunil Narine ngoyena mdlali utshabalalise amathemba eProteas, emva kokuba ewise oothinti abathandathu.  
Lo mdlalo ibilityeli lesibini apho iiProteas zibethwa yiWest Indies.  
Zikhona iindawo eliqhube kakuhle kuzo iqela lalapha ekhaya, kwaye ikapteni * -AB De Villiers unethemba phambi komdlalo wangomso. 
 “Bendicinga ukuba sizakugoduka nawo lo umdlalo kodwa khange sikwazi ukufumana amanqaku aneleyo ukuza nempumelelo. Besiqale kakuhle kulo mdlalo sibhatyaze emva kwemijikelo elishumi siqhokra,” utshilo uDe Villiers. 
 “Into ebalulekileyo kukuba siphucule indlela esinxibelelana ngayo njengokuba sibheka phambili kolu luhlu lwemidlalo. Kufuneka siwufunde umdlalo we-Australia, ayibalulekanga into yokuba sidlale ngokuzixhesha kuba sifuna ukuqokelela amanqaku. NgoLwesibini siza- kudlala umdlalo okwizinga eliphezulu xa siqubisana ne-Australia.” 
 I-Australia lelinye lamazwe anzima kwiqakamba, kwaye alibetheki lula. Kungoku nje iiProteas zisaziphulula amanxeba okubethwa yiAustralia kwindebe yehlabathi yeqakamba kunyaka ophelileyo. Umdlali ozakuphakamisa umdlalo weProteas kwicala lokugisibela ngu-Aaron Phangiso, wenze umsebenzi omhle kumdlalo weveki ephelileyo.

headline: Izityel’ itheko namhlanje iBees, eSisa Dukashe Stadium
text:
Amagowuli amathathu afakwe nguJoseph Chikila ancede iqela laseMpuma Koloni elufumene impumelelo yalo yokuqala kwitumente edlalwa ngamaqela akwi-ABC Motsepe League ekuzakuthi kuhluzwe kuyo amaqela amabini aya kwiNational First Division. Iinyosi (EC Bees) zibethe iMainstay United ngo’8-1 kumdlalo wesibini eSisa Dukashe Stadium namhlanje. Nakubeni amaqela omabini ebezimisele ukulungisa iimpazamo zawo emva kokubethwa izolo – kodwa abazanyiswe kakubi ngumoya obubhudlala eMonti. UChikila ngumdlali wesibini ofake amagowuli amaninzi kule tumente, ulandela uMpho Erasmus osele efake amagowuli amane kwakweli qela linye. Iqela laseBhisho lizuza le mpumelelo yanamhlanje emva kokuphoxa abantu abaninzi izolo. 
  
Iinyosi ziye kwixesha lokuphumla zinkqenkqeza phambili ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye. Eli qela laseBhisho liye emdlalweni liphantsi koxinizelelo emva kokubethwa kumdlalo walo wokuqala izolo. Namhlanje ibinye into ebisezingqondweni zabadlali – kukufaka amagowuli kangangoko. Ifolosi ekhutheleyo, uJoseph Chikila, ubhakuzise umnatha kumzuzu wamashumi amabini anesibini kwisigaba sokuqala. Kwimizuzu nje emine emva koko uChristoffer Balie ufake elokulinganisa. URedin Jansen ugwaze umkhonto ekhaya ngomzuzu wamashumi amathathu – ngalo ndlela yaba iBees ihamba phambili ngo’2-1 – kodwa kutshintshwe amacala ihamba phambili ngo’3-1. 
  
  
Omabini la maqela abuye ekhefini asukelana ngalaa ndlela ebesenza ngayo kwisigaba sokuqala. UChikila ufake igowuli lakhe lesibini, elesine leBees kumzuzu wamashumi amahlanu. Umqeqeshi weBees, uVuyisile Njedu, wenze iinguqu kwakhona ngokuthi afake uSiyabonga Booi endaweni kaMpho Maifo ofake igowuli kwisigaba sokuqala salo mdlalo. Kanti uNjedu ukhuphe uSive Mzolo emva kwamashumi amathathu emizuzu yomdlalo, wafaka uHopewell Dlamini – injongo ibikukuqinisa indlela iqela lakhe elidlala ngayo. USiphelele Jonase ufake igowuli leBees lesihlanu emva kokunikelana noSiyabulela Shai ongene kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. UChikili noDlamini bayingcwabile iMainstay ekufakwe amagowuli alishumi elinesibini onke kule tumente. Ugalele engxoweni naye umdlalo wasemva naye uYondela Ntingiso ngethuba efaka igowuli lokugqibela.

headline: IBidvest Wits ziintshatsheli ze-Absa Premier Soccer League
text:
Huntshuuuuu Bidvest Wits! Emva kweminyaka engaphaya kwamashumi amabini yasungulwayo i-Absa Premier Soccer league, namhlanje iWits izenzele imbali ngokuyiphumelela okokuqala kwimbali yayo emva kokubetha iPolokwane City ngo’2-0 kumdlalo obuseBidvest Stadium. Kuvunwa imbewu eyatyalwa ngabaphathi beli qela abaqesha uGavin Hunt kwiminyaka emine eyadlulayo ukuze abancede ngokuzalisekisa umnqweno wabo wokuphumelela le ndebe iphambili kwibhola yelizwe loMzantsi Afrika. 
  
Amagowuli afakwe nguJames Keene noDaine Klate ngawo aqinisekise impumelelo yeli qela laseGoli. Nangona uKlate wathi wadlala indima ebalulekileyo kwimpumelela eyazuzwa yiSuperSport United ne-Orlando Pirates kule ndebe kwiminyaka eyadlulayo – kodwa nakweli ityeli ubonisile ukuba ngokwenene usengomnye woomakhwekhwetha babadlali kwibhola ekhatywayo eMzantsi Afrika. 
 
Daine Klate (far right) celebrates goal during the 2016/17 Absa Premiership football match between Bidvest Wits and Polokwane City at Bidvest Stadium, Johannesburg on 17 May 2017 ©Gavin Barker/BackpagePix 
  
Isigaba sokuqala siphele iWits inkqenkqeza phambili emva kokufumana igowuli kwimizuzu yokuqala emdlalweni. UJames Keene, ifolosi eyingozi kakhulu phambi kwepali, ifumene ibhola egotywe kakuhle ekunene ayithathe wayibeka ekoneni ngentloko yakhe. Kuvele kwacaca kwasekuqaleni ukuba uGavin Hunt namakhwenkwe wakhe bazimisele ukuwuphumelela umdlalo kuba bekuvele kwacaca ukuba ngowona uza kubanceda ukuze baphumelele indebe ye-Absa Premier Soccer League. Khange iyekelele nayo kwelayo icala iPolokwane City – kodwa amandla wayo ebengaphantsi kwaweWits. Akubilula konke konke kumaqela amaninzi ukubethela iWits enkundleni yayo.  
  
UDaine Klate ufake igowuli lesibini leWits, ngalo ndlela yacaca ngakumbi indlela yeWits eya empumelelweni. Kwangoko nje emva kwegowuli lesibini, elogcuntswana labalandeli beWits liqale ukubhiyoza ngengoma namagubu wekwayala esoloko isonwabisa eBidvest Stadium. Uphelile umdlalo ingafumananga nelokubika iPolokwane City.

headline: UFuzile uya eBhayi eqinisekile ngokuphumelela
text:
Intandane yabathandi bamanqindi baseMpuma Koloni, uAzinga Fuzile, ithi iza kuqabela ngaphaya kwakhe umfo waseMexico. 
 UFuzile yenye yeembethi-manqindi ezilishumi elinesithandathu eziza kuthabatha inxaxheba kwitumente ezakube iseNongoza Jebe, eBhayi, emalanga ngeCawe.  
UFuzile uza kuxhimfana noRumulo Koasicha kumlo wentshinga ye-IBF Intercontinental. Inxele lakwaFuzile lithi liqinisekile ngokubuya nempumelelo ngeCawe.  
“Ndikhe ndayibukela imilo yakhe kuYouTube. Andimboni endinika ubunzima tu. Andimdeleli kodwa ndiqinisekile ukuba ndiza kumoyisa.  
“Emva kwalo umlo, ndijonge ukulwela intshinga yehlabathi,” utshilo uFuzile.  
Omnye umlo oza kujongwa kakhulu ngabantu uphakathi kukaPhila Mpontshane noKoos Sibiya waseRhawutini kudidi lweJunior Lightweight. 
USivenathi Nontshinga uza kuvana amandla noBenavides Calero Leyman waseNicaragua kumlo wentshinga ye-ABU. Ephufumla ngomlo wakhe, 
 uNontshinga uthethe wenjenje: “Ndikhe ndambukela uCalero, akayiyo imbethi-manqindi enobuzaza. Ndisithso nje andimdeleli kodwa ndiza kumbetha.” 
 Omnye umlo we-ABU uphakathi kuka-Asiphe Mtshili no-Ayabonga Sonjica kudidi lweJunior Featherweight. Kumlo oza kohlula abalandeli baseZiphunzane nabaseMdantsane, uLuyanda Ntwanambi uza kungquzulana noXolisile Voyi, emlweni onemijikelo emithandathu. USiyakholwa Khuse uza kuvavanyana noPhumlani Maloni kumlo okudidi lweNgcongolo.  
Yena uAsanda Gingqi uza kuzama ukuzisondeza endaweni entle yokulwela intshinga yoMzantsi Afrika kudidi loSiba xa eqhizana noTello Lethebe.  
USiko Moshani uza kuphekuzana noYanga Yaba. 
Iziphumo zetumente yeShowtime Promotions: UNozipho Bell ugoduke exwaye intshinga yeWBF emva kokubetha * -Unathi Myekeni ngamanqaku. 
 UMilisa Miller uyikhusele intshinga yakhe yoMzantsi Afrika kudidi lwentambanani emva kokubetha uThema Zuma ngamanqaku. 
 UNoni Tenge ubethe uMapule Ngubane ngamanqaku. URazel Mohammed udlale ntanganye noNomazithini Ndyambo.

headline: Angalahlekelwa ngumsebenzi umqeqeshi weBaroka FC
text:
Umqeqeshi weBaroka FC osengxakini enganikwa uphumaphele ukuba ufunyanwa enetyala liqela lakhe emva kwenkqubo yoluleko ezakuchotshelwa kwiveki ezayo. UKgoloko Thobejane uzakuthawuziswa yikomiti yoluleko yeBaroka emva kwezityholo ezithi wazintyintya ngomdiliya omfaxangiweyo (utywala) eBhasini emva kokubethwa kweqela lakhe yiFree State Stars ekuqaleni kwale nyanga. Isekela mqeqeshi lakhe uTshegofatso Machoene kunye noDelbert Lekoana kuthiwa nabo banqunyanyisiwe emva kwesehlo saseBhasini eyayisuka eGoble Park Stadium. Ukapteni weqela u-Olaleng Shaku no-Oscarine Masuluke kwithiwa bakwazile ukusiphepha isohlwayo. 
“Akukho nto ndiyaziyo ngokunxila kwabo eBhasini (Shaku noMasuluke). Bona bobabini abanqunyanyiswanga. Njengangoku bayazilolonga neqela. Andikweli nabadlali eBhasini, ndizihambela ngeyam imoto. Luxanduva lomqeqeshi ke ukuqinisekisa okokuba abadlali baziphatha kakuhle. Ukuba uthi kum bebesela utywala, andiyazi lo nto,” itshilo ingqonyela yeBaroka, uMorgan Mammila. 
Kubonakala ngathi nguThobejane uzakuphendula phambi kwekomiti yoluleko nangona ingathi yayinguye yedwa. “Into endingazuyithetha kukuba unqunyanyiselweni ngoba yinto yethu ngaphakathi leyo. Umzi nomzi unemiqathango yawo. Siyamhlonipha umqeqeshi kwakunye neqela. Asikwazi ukukhupha nje izinto eziyimfihlo. Into esinokuyithetha kukuba umqeqeshi unqunyanyisiwe. Akazukubakho xa sidlala neChippa United ngoMgqibelo ePeter Mokaba Stadium. Isekela mqeqeshi uMacDonald Makhubedu uzakuxhuzula imikhala encediswa nguThoka Matsimela,” utshilo uMammila. 
Nangona iBaroka FC ibiyiqale ngendlela encomekayo isizini ka-2017/18 emva kokusinda cebeshu ekuthotyiselweni kwisizini egqithileyo – kodwa izinto ziye zajika phambi kokuphela kuka-2017. Izinto ezinje ngale ivakalayo zingaliphazamisa iqela lizibhaqela lisengxakini kwakhona. Ingqonyela yeBaroka iyibethelele into ethi bafuna ukuqwalasela lo mba kuba bengafuni iphazamise umsebenzi weqela lonke. “Umqeqeshi uyazi ukuba simnqumamiseleni. Asizongilosi nathi, iimpazmo siyazenza – kodwa sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba iqela alichatshazelwa kakubi yile nto,” uvale ngalo mazwi uMammila.

headline: Aya edabini ngamandla onke akaBenni
text:
Kwisizini yayo yesithathu, iCape Town City iza kulwela ukuphakamisa indebe yesibini emva kokuyiphosa kwisizini edlulileyo.  
ICity indwendwela iMaritzburg United kumdlalo wokuqala weMTN 8 oza kube useHarry Gwala Stadium. Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo, umdlalo wona uza kutaka iintlantsi ngoba kudibana abaqeqeshi abaselula ngokweminyaka futhi abazimisele ukuzenzela udumo ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika. 
UBenni McCarthy, ongene kwisizini yakhe yesibini njengomqeqeshi kwiveki ephelileyo, unethemba lokuba izinto zakumhambela kakuhle kule sizini emva kokuba iqela lakhe labethwa yiSuperSport United kumdlalo wokugqibela weMTN 8 kunyaka ophelileyo. 
Umdlali weCity ofikayo ogama linguSurprise Ralani utsha zintambo kwaye unethemba lokungcamla impumelelo eMzantsi Afrika okokuqala emva kokuchitha iminyaka emininzi edlalela iqela laseSweden.  
Lo mdlali utyikitywe nguBenni emva kokupasa uvavanyo. “Ngumdlalo obalulekileyo lo weMTN 8. Hayi kum ndodwa, kwiqela lonke ngoba lakuva ukubethwa kumdlalo wokugqibela ukuba kunjani.  
Kwakukubi kubadlali ngoba babezimisele ukuphumelela. Ngoku sifumana ithuba lesibini; icekwa likuthi ngoku.  
Ndiyakulangazelela ukudlala ngoba ndineenyanga ezisibhozo qha ndilapha. Kungakuhle ukuba singayiphakamisa le ndebe,” utshilo uRalani ngethuba kuphehlelelwa iMTN 8 Cup kutshanje eGoli. 
Kuza kube kudlana iintsimbi ngoba iCity iya edabini ngamandla wayo onke emva kokubetha iSuperSport United ngo’2-0 kumdlalo wePSL wokuqala eKapa. 
 Kodwa kwelinye icala, uFadlu Davids uza kube efuna ukulungisa izinto emva kokuba iTeam of Choice ibethwe ngo’2-0 yiGolden Arrows kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Emva kokubethwa yiFree State Stars kumdlalo wokugqibela weNedbank Cup – eli lithuba elihle leMaritzburg lokuzama ukuphumelela indebe okokuqala kubomi bayo kwiPSL kwiminyaka elishumi elinesihlanu.

headline: UPaez noCastro baya etshatshalazeni ngoMgqibelo
text:
Amaqela adlala kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League abuyela enkomeni kule mpelaveki emva kokuthi khebevu iveki yonke ngenxa yemidlalo yezizwe.  
Umdlalo ophakathi kwamaqela amakhulu ufikile kwaye kulindeleke utake iintlantsi. Amakhosi amkela iintshatsheli zePSL, iMamelodi Sundowns, kumdlalo oseFNB Stadium ngo’20:15 ngoMgqibelo.  
Nangona iKaizer Chiefs ihleli kwindawo ephezulu kancinci kuneSundowns esenemidlalo emibini esandleni – kodwa yiDowns eya kulo mdlalo inamandla emva kokubetha iChiefs kumdlalo wokuqala.  
USteve Komphela usenethemba lokuphumelela indebe yePSL nangona ukhuphiswano lulushica kakhulu. Kunyanzelekile ke kambe ukuba iChiefs iyibethe iDowns kulo mdlalo ukuze kufezekiswe iphupha likaKomphela. Soze kubelula ukuyenza lo nto ngoba iSundowns iyakwazi ukumelana nemidlalo emikhulu kwaye izimisele ukuyikhusela indebe yayo ekupheleni kwale isizini. 
UGustavo Paez, otyikitywe yiChiefs kulo nyaka, ngumdlali othembisayo futhi osele ebonise ubukrelekrele nobuchule bokudlala ibhola kwimidlalo embalwa ayidlalileyo.  
Zikhona izinto azifundileyo uPaez koogxa bakhe kwaye uthi uzakulibala ngobuhlobo anabo noLeonardo Castro ngoMgqibelo.  
UCastro lixhadi likaPitso eliwonzakalisileyo amaqela amaninzi kwiPSL. Bobabini aba badlali ziifolosi ekuzakuthi kujongwe kuzo. UPaez uzinzile ngoku kwiChiefs nokuzithemba kufunqukile.  
“Ndikhululekile ngoku, oogxa bam nabalawuli bandincedisile. Ndijongana nomdlalo omnye ngexesha,” utshilo uPaez. 
“Mna nenkosikazi yam besityelele uLeonardo Castro kutshanje. Sithethile ngokubaluleka kwalo mdlalo. Sobabini sijonge kumdlalo wangoMgqibelo. Ubuhlobo buzakuphela, sifuna amanqaku amathathu. Ndiyibukele indlela abadlala ngayo,” utshilo uPaez. 
IDowns iya kulo mdlalo iqhwalela ngenxa yabadlali abonzakeleyo abafana noSibusiso Vilakazi, uDenis Onyango, uYannick Zakri noWayne Arendse. Kodwa inabo abadlali abahleli bekulungele ukudlala.

headline: UMapeza unethemba lokukrwitsha iSiwelele
text:
Kusetyenzelwa izinto ezimbini kwinkampu yeChippa United. 
 Ezo zinto kukuphepha izembe ngokupheleleyo kusekho imidlalo emininzi nokungena kwiTop 8. 
 Ukuba ubani angajonga indawo eyayikuyo iChippa emva kokudlala imidlalo elishumi, ngeke akholelwe ukuba yiyo le ikwindawo yeshumi ngoku. 
 Yonke lo nto yenziwe nguNorman Mapeza ofike kunyaka ophelileyo emva kokugxothwa kukaClinton Larsen oqeqeshe imidlalo emihlanu kuphela.  
Into ekwathiwa makayenze uMapeza: kukuqinisekisa okokuba iChippa iyasinda ezembeni esinde kulo kwiisizini ezimbini ezidlulileyo.  
Emva kokucholachola amanqaku apheleleyo phambi kokuphela kuka2019, ngoku iChippa isecicini lokuyenza lo nto.  
Emidlalweni emithathu kulo nyaka, iqela likaMapeza liqokelele amanqaku amane.  
Uwancomile ke kambe umqeqeshi amakhwenkwe akhe emva kokudlala ntanganye neMaritzburg United emdlalweni obuseSisa Dukashe Stadium kwimpelaveki egqithileyo. 
“Basebenzile abadlali. 
 Yinto enkulu kakhulu kuthi ukufumana inqaku elinye ngoba akululanga ukufumana amanqaku apheleleyo emidlalweni yePSL,” utshilo umqeqeshi oncwase ukufumanela iChippa United indawo kwiTop 8 xa kusongwa isizini.  
Njengokuba iChippa iza kudlala neBloemfontein Celtic ngo15:30 eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngeCawe, inethuba lokuphumelela ebaleni layo kwaye lo nto ingayibeka kwindawo yesine okanye eyesihlanu. 
 Umdlalo ngoweCeltic kodwa iwusa eBhayi ngoba iDr Molemela Stadium ayikho kwisimo esihle.  
Noxa kungeke kube lula ukubetha iCeltic ebethe iBlack Leopards ngo’4-2 kutshanje kodwa iChippa kufanele ilwe kuba iza kudlalela phambi kwabalandeli bayo. 
 “Kuza kuba nzima ukudlala neCeltic ngoba iqhuba kakuhle. Ndinethemba kodwa ukuba singalungisa iingqondo zethu siphinde siqinisekise ukuba sidlala ngokuzimisela emdlalweni,” utshilo uMapeza ethetha kwiSuperSport. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
Lwesihlanu: Maritzburg United vs AmaZulu @Harry Gwala Stadium, 20:00; Stellenbosch vs Baroka @Athlone Stadium, 20:00 
Mgqibelo: Black Leopards vs Kaizer Chiefs @Thohoyandou Stadium, 15:30; Orlando Pirates vs Highlands Park @Orlando Stadium, 18:00; Cape Town City vs Bidvest Wits @Cape Town Stadium, 18:00 
Cawe: Polokwane City vs Golden Arrows @Peter Mokaba Stadium, 15:30; SuperSport United vs Mamelodi Sundowns @Lucas Moripe Stadium, 15:30

headline: Amabhokobhoko angombe iPumas phambi kwabalandeli bayo eSalta!
text:
UMzantsi Afrika ziintshatsheli ezivunyiweyo zeRugby Championship. Amakhwenkwe kaRassie Erasmus abonakalise ukulungela kwawo iNdebe yeHlabathi ngokungomba iPumas (Argentina) ngo’46-13 phambi kwabalandeli bayo emdlalweni obuseSalta izolo. Amabhokobhoko aye emdlalweni ukuzithemba kufunqukile emva kokudlala kakuhle ngethuba equbisene neWallabies neNew Zealand emidlalweni ebiphambi kowayizolo. Omnye wabadlali beBoks abathe baqaqamba emdlalweni wayizolo nguHandre Pollard ofake amanqaku angamashumi amathathu ananye eyedwa. Elona qela elithe latsazisa igazi kuqala izolo yi-Argentina ngethuba ilala emgceni izihlandlo ezibini. Abuye ngamandla kodwa Amabhokobhoko emva koko aphumelela indebe awagqibela ukuyizuza ngethuba kusekho uPeter de Villiers ngo-2009. 
 
Ukuphumelela kweqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika akothusanga ngoba kungunozala womsebenzi omhle owenziwa ngabaqeqeshi neqela lonke, ingakumbi njengokuba kusondela ixesha leNdebe yeHlabathi. Izigantsontso zabadlali ezifana noTendai Mtawarira, uBongi Mbonambi noTravor Nyakane ziyibambe yema ngxi iArgentina nakubeni zohlwayiwe ngusompempe obephethe umdlalo. UMakazole Mapimpi ulele emgceni naye phambi kokukhala kwempempe okokugqibela emdlalweni emva kokudlalelwa ibhola kamnandi nguCheslin Kolbe noFrans Steyn. Kulindeleke uRassie Erasmus adunjelwe yintloko njengokuba uninzi labadlali ludlale kakuhle phambi kokuchonga iqela labadlali aza kuya nabo kwiNdebe yeHahlabathi yombhoxo eza kube iseJapan. —IOL Sport

headline: Ngoompetha bomnyazi abavunyiweyo iPE College
text:
Italente, ukuzimisela nothando lwebhola yomnyazi zezinye zezinto ezithe zagqama kwenye yeetumente ezinkulu kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni.  
Kwakusasa ngeCawe, amaqela omnyazi aphambili kweli phondo ebephekana esophulana eQonce kwibala ekuthiwa yiVictoria Grounds. Le tumente, eyaququzelwa yiKing Eagles ukusukela ngo-2014, ibuyile kulo nyaka emva kokuqhwalela kwayo ngenxa yokungabikho kwenkxaso. Kulo unyaka iye yaxhaswa yinkampani yamagqwetha, iMsamo Attorneys, ukuze iphumelele. 
 Le tumente ibizwe ngokuba yi-The Sizukiwe Mganu Memorial Tournament. UMganu, owasweleka ngo-2011 ngenxa yengozi yemoto, wadlala indima ebalulekileyo ekusekweni kweKing Eagles nakwibhola yomnyazi eQonce. 
Ngethamsanqa kulo unyaka, le tumente ibizinyaswe ngoorhasatsha bamaqela abalishumi elinanye kwibhola yomnyazi kweli phondo afana neKing Eagles, iSada United, iQugqwala, iJaguars, iPE College namanye aliqela. Bekudlana iintsimbi ebaleni, ilelo nelo iqela lidlalela ukuya kwimidlalo yokugqibela yetumente.  
Imini ibizolile, lo nto ibavumele abadlali ukuba badlale ngokukhululekileyo emidlalweni. Okuthe kwagqama kukuzimisela kwamaqela, ukuhlonelwa komdlalo womnyazi ngabadlali nabaqeqeshi emidlalweni ngokubanzi. Emva kwethuba elide amaqela ehluzana, kwimidlalo yokugqibela kuye amaqela aseQonce amabini abebanga ubusokhaya, iJaguars yaseMonti nePE College. 
Ekugqibeleni, iqela laseBhayi (PE College) lilo elitshatsheleyo emva kokugqugqisa kwimidlalo eliqela elithe layidlala. Liyifumene kufanelekile impumelelo emva kokubetha amaqela abezimisele kakhulu.  
Ngokuphumelela kwayo, iPE College igoduke namawaka amathathu eerandi (R3 000) nendebe.  
Indawo yesibini ithathwe yiJaguars efumene amawaka amabini eerandi (R2 000) neKing Eagles kwindawo yesithathu efumene iwaka leerandi.  
“Ndingatsho ukuba itumente ibintle kakhulu kwaye ibiphunyelwe – kodwa singabaququzeleli, siza kuzinika ithuba lokujonga indlela esinokuyiphucula ngayo kwilixa elizayo,” utshilo uNtlanganiso.

headline: UTade uwuqhawulwe umtshato obuphakathi kwakhe neMamelodi Sundowns
text: Emva kwexesha elide engadlaliswa, uEmiliano Tade, ucele uqhawulwe umtshato wakhe neMamelodi Sundowns. Ezi ndaba zibhengezwe yiSundowns ebutsheni bale veki kumakhasi wayo wonxibelelwano. UTade, 31, ofike eMzantsi Afrika wadlalela AmaZulu FC, utyikitywe yiSundowns emva kokwenza iziqwenga kwisithuba esingaphantsi konyaka. Isizini egqithileyo yePSL iphele engasalifumani ithuba lokudlala kwiSundowns – kanti nakule isizini, ebengabikho nakwiqela labadlali abangamalalela. Ngokwengxelo ekhutshwe liqela, uTade ucele ukukhululwa ngenxa yezizazu ezingachazwanga. “Ifolosi yeSundowns, uEmiliano Tade, ucele siqhawulwe isivumelwano sakhe sengqesho. Umongameli, isigqeba esilawulayo nabaqeqeshi bayalibulela igalelo elenziwe nguTade kwaye bamnqwenelela konke okuhle ebomini bakhe,” itshilo ingxelo ekhutshwe yiDowns. Akukacaci nokuba uza kuya kweliphi na iqela uTade – kodwa ngokomthetho, angabhaliswa liqela elitsha kunyaka ozayo xa kuvulwa inyoba yokuthengwiswa kwabadlali kwinyanga yokuqala. Nangona uTade wathathwa eqhuba kakuhle kakhulu esengumdlali waMaZulu – kodwa kwiDowns ufake amagowuli amabini kwimidlalo elishumi elinambini ayidlalileyo kwisizini egqithileyo.

headline: AmaBhokobhoko afuna ukuyicishilela iNew Zealand emdlalweni wokugqibela
text:
Zimbini iinguqu ezenziwe ngumqeqeshi weSpringbok phambi kowona mdlalo obalulekileyo weCastle Lager Rugby Championship ngempelaveki. Oku kuvele ngethuba uJacques Nienaber ebhengeza amagama wabadlali aza kuqala ngabo umdlalo xa AmaBhokobholo edibana etshatshalazeni neNew Zealand emdlalweni wesibini oza kube ubanjelwe eCBUS Super Stadium ngo-09:05 kusasa ngoMgqibelo. Amadoda aza kuqala umdlalo nguJasper Wiese no-Ox Nche, abangena kwiindawo ezishiywe nguFrans Malherbe noMarco van Staden abangazukudlala ngenxa yokonzala emdlalweni AmaBhokobhoko abethwe kuwo yiNew Zealand ngo’19-17 kwimpelaveki egqithileyo. UCheslin Kolbe, onethuba elide ngoku engasadlali ngenxa yokonzakala, ngeke abekho ngoba akakaphili ngokupheleleyo. 
Nangona kunjalo, uNienaber akaxhalabanga kwaphela kwaye uwuncomile umsebenzi omhle owenziwe ngabadlali bakhe emdlalweni ogqithileyo. “Sikwazile ukuyiphucula indlela esidlala ngayo kwiveki ephelileyo. Besiyifanele impumelele emva kwalowa umsebenzi,” utshilo uNienaber. “Sigqibe kwelokuba sisebenzise iqela elingatshintshanga ngaphandle kwabadlali abonzakeleyo. Ngelishwa, uCheslin akakwazi ukuqala umdlalo ngoba akakaphili ngokupheleleyo emva kokonzakala kwiiveki ezigqithileyo,” utshilo umqeqeshi. Emva kokubethwa emidlalweni emibini, uNinaber ukugqininisile ukubaluleka kweziphumo ezihle emdlalweni olandelayo. 
“Zisasikhathaza iziphumo esizifumene kwiiveki ezigqithileyo. Wonke umntu enkampini ukuqonda kakuhle ukubaluleka kokuvala imidlalo yeRugby Championship kakuhle. Umntu ngamnye kufuneka enze eyakhe indima ebaleni ukuze sikwazi ukufumana iziphumo ezihle. Sazi kakuhle ukuba umdlalo uza kubanzima kakhulu – kodwa into esikhuthazayo kukunxanelwa impumelelo. Kwiveki ephelileyo sidlale ngendlela yethu kwaye kufuneka sidlale umdlalo obhetele emdlalweni wangempelaveki. Siwulungele umdlalo kwaye siza kudlala ngokukhulu ukuzimisela,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uNienaber. UMatthew Carley waseNgilane uza kuphatha umdlalo wokugqibela ophakathi kweSpringbok neNew Zealand.

headline: ‘Asiyonto ngaphandle kwabalandeli’
text:
Emva kokuthi nqumama iveki yonke ngenxa yemidlalo yezizwe eziphantsi kweFIFA, amaqela adlala kwiAbsa Premier Soccer League abuyela emabaleni kwakhona ngempelaveki.  
Omnye wemidlalo ojongwe ngamehlo abomvu ngulowo uphakathi kweOrlando Pirates neChippa United emalanga (15:30) eOrlando Stadium ngoMgqibelo.  
Omabini amaqela aya emdlalweni ephantsi koxinizelelo kakhulu emva kokungakwazi ukuvelisa iziphumo ezincumisayo emidlalweni egqithileyo.  
Iqela laseMpuma Koloni, iChippa United, elingaphumeleli namnye umdlalo kule isizini kwemine eliyidlalileyo, liza kuzama ukufumana amanqaku amathathu ngempelaveki xa lidibana nePirates exikixwa ziingxaki ngakumbi phantsi kukaRulani Mokwena owathath’ iintambo emva kokuhamba kukaMilutin Sredojevic. 
Ukudlala nePirates kokwayo ngeke kube yinto elula kwiChippa kodwa uLerato Manzini uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa okokuba abadlali beqela lakhe bawulungiselele kakuhle umdlalo ozayo. 
 “Yah, ndingatsho ndithi sikulungele ukudibana nePirates. Bonke abadlali balinde umhla womdlalo.
