Sikuthatha njengenkuthazo ukudlala nePirates komnye wemidlalo emikhulu.  
Thina badlali siyiqonda ngokupheleleyo imeko elikuyo iqela. 
 Asikaphumeleli namnye umdlalo kule sizini kodwa lo nto ayichazi indlela iqela elidlale ngayo emidlalweni egqithileyo.  
Into esiphoxileyo emidlalweni egqithileyo ibe kukunqaba kwamagowuli.  
Lidlale umdlalo omhle, lidale amathuba futhi lihlasele kakuhle iqela kodwa eyona ngxaki ibe kukufaka ibhola emnatheni. Siwulungiselele kakuhle kodwa umdlalo,” utshilo uManzini. 
Nangona iChippa inengxaki yokungakwazi ukufaka amagowuli ayivimbe amanqaku apheleleyo emidlalweni eyidlale kakuhle, uManzini uzimisele ukwenza ezibukwayo emdlalweni ongempelaveki ukuba ulinikiwe ithuba lokudlala ngumqeqeshi wakhe uClinton Larsen.  
“IPirates idlala kakuhle noxa inengxaki efanayo nale yethu. Ndisoloko ndinomnqweno wokufaka amagowuli emdlalweni ngamnye esiwudlalayo kodwa akwenzekanga oko kwegqithileyo.  
Aza kuza amagowuli. Ndicinga ukuba umdlalo esiya kuwo uza kuba namagowuli amaninzi.  
Ukuba singaphumelela umdlalo ube mnye, lo nto ingasibeka endaweni entle.  
Ndifuna ukucela abalandeli bethu ukuba mabasixhase ngamaxesha onke ngoba asiyonto ngaphandle kwabo,” utshilo uLerato. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
NgoMgqibelo: Golden Arrows vs AmaZulu FC @Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium, 15:00; Orlando Pirates vs Chippa United @Orlando Stadium, 15:00; Kaizer Chiefs vs Polokwane City @FNB Stadium, 18:00; SuperSport United vs Cape Town City @Mbombela Stadium, 20:15. 
NgeCawe: Black Leopards vs Baroka FC @Thohoyandou Stadium, 15:00; Bloemfontein Celtic vs Stellenbosch @Dr Molemela Stadium, 15:00

headline: Lifikile ixesha lokukhula kweSpringbok Women, utsho uNolusindiso Booi
text:
Ayifikanga igalelekile itumente yehlabathi yombhoxo wamanenekazi. Ukusukela ngoMgqibelo umhla wesibhozo, amawakawaka abalandeli bombhoxo baza konwabela imidlalo yamazwe ehlabathi eswantsulisana kweyona tumente inkulu eNew Zealand. Iqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika lombhoxo, iSpringbok Women, liza kudibana etshatshalazeli neFrance emdlalweni ongoMgqibelo (ngomso). Lityeli lesithathu iSpringbok Women sithatha inxaxheba kwitumente yehlabathi. Zange ziwuhambele kakuhle izinto kweyokuqala – kodwa ngoku uNolusindiso Booi ubetha phantsi ngenqindi ngelithi lifikile ixesha lokuziqaqambisa koMzantsi Afrika embhoxweni wamanenekazi. 
UBooi uthe wayekhona kwitumente yokuqala kodwa wayesemtsha embhoxweni, uya kule ukhona umahluko ngoba ungomnye wabadlali abanexesha elide bedlalela iSpringbok Women. “Le yeyona ndiyivayo kunezinye ngoba sendikhulile ngokwasemdlalweni kwaye ndiyayazi nendlela iqela eliyihambileyo ukuze lifike kwindawo elikuyo ngoku,” utshilo uBooi. “Ngoku ndiyayazi indlela ebaluleke ngayo le tumente nendlela engawufunqula ngayo umbhoxo wamanenekazi ekhaya eMzantsi Afrika xa izinto zinokusihambela kakuhle. Ukwenza kwethu kakuhle kwitumente yehlabathu ikholelwa kwelokuba kungawakhuthaza amantombazana aselula ekhaya futhi bangabona ukuba likhona ikamba elihle xa umntu ekhethe ukudlala umbhoxo. 
“Eli lithuba lethu lokuziqaqambisa nyhani,” utshilo uBooi kwindibano yooKapteni abebedibenele eAuckland, eNew Zealand, ekuqaleni kwale veki. Kumaqela alishumi elinambini aza kudlala itumente yalo nyaka, uMzantsi Afrika awukho phakathi kwamaqela anikwa ithuba lokuphumelela indebe. Amaqela anamandla embhoxweni yiNgilane neFrance – kodwa uMzantsi Afrika unabo abadlali abanokuyiguqula lo nto. “Sakube sidlalela ilizwe lethu. Kufuneka senze umsebenzi obonakalayo ngaphezulu kokucula umhobe wesizwe nokubaleka ebaleni. Kufuneka sibabuyekeze abantu abasibukeleyo ngoMgqibelo. Siyazi ukuba iFrance inamandla – kodwa ke nathi inawo amandla,” utshilo uBooi.

headline: IFree State Stars iya eKapa kumdlalo wokugqibela
text:
Emva kokusebenzisa amathuba ewafumeneyo, iFree State Stars iya kumdlalo wokugqibela weNedbank Cup okokuqala emva kokuhlaza iKaizer Chiefs phambi kwabalandeli bayo. IFree State Stars ibethe iChiefs ngo’2-0 othuleyo kumdlalo obubukelwe ngamaqakawaka abalandeli eMoses Mabhida Stadium kobu busuku banamhlanje. Ukubethwa kweChiefs kuthetha ukuthi kuphele naloo ntlantsi yethemba lokufumana indebe ibikhona phambi kokuvalwa kwesizini. Amathuba emdlalweni ebekhona kakhulu kwizigaba zozibini zomdlalo – kodwa yiFree State Stars ekwazileyo ukuwasebenzisa. Umdlali ohlabe ngekrele Amakhosi entliziyweni nguHarris Tchilimbou. 
URyan Moon uphose inqwaba yamathuba kwisigaba sokuqala – akuphelelanga apho ngoba iChiefs iphose phantsi amathuba angaphaya kwesihlanu ebekufaneluba iwasebenzisile. UJoseph Molangoane, uBernard Parker noHendrick Ekstein akukho nto bangayizamanga – kodwa abadlali beFree State baqinisekise ukuba iChiefs ayicholi naphantsi emdlalweni namhlanje. UThela Ngobeni, unozinti owayefudula edlalela iChiefs, ube ngumqobo namhlanje endlaleni yayo eya empumelelweni. Lo nozinti unikwe iwonga loyena mdlali obalaseleyo emdlalweni emva kokuchitha nokuba iibhola eziliqela emdlalweni. 
Emva kokungena kwabadlali abafana noLeonardo Castro, uDumisani Zuma noRamahlwe Mphahlele akubangakho mahluko kwicala lamagowuli nangoba imigudu ibikhona. Nanamhlanje uSteve Komphela uyakukhala ngento enye awayekhala ngala kule minyaka mibini igqithileyo – ukungasetyenziswa kwamathuba ziifolosi zakhe phambi kweepali. Umqeqeshi weFree State, uLuc Eymael, uphume encume olukabhulankethe emva kokuthatha iqela alise kumdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi weNedbank Cup okokuqala kwimbali yalo.

headline: Iphumelele enye indebe iNobumba Cricket Club
text:
INobumba Cricket Club yenze edume ngazo kwakhona kwiqakamba. Eli qela liphumelele iNtabazivumile Tournament kutshanje emva kwenye eliyiphumelele phambi kokuphela kuka’2016.  
Le tumente ebixhaswa liSebe lezeMidlalo eMpuma Koloni, yiBoarder Cricket neBuffalo City Municipality – isingathwa unyaka nonyaka kwaye itsala umdla kakhulu wamaqela eqakamba asondeleyo eMzitshane abalelwa phaya kwishumi elinesibini. Isiphathamandla seNobumba Cricket Club, umnumzana Raymond Booi, uchulumance kakhulu emva kokuba iqela lakhe lidlule kumaqela aziwayo kwiqakamba afana neMCC Club, iZinyoka, iQanda, iMdingi, iMzitshane, uNomgwadla, iPiri Sport, iKwelerhana nePeddie Special. 
“Itumente ibikwizinga eliphezulu kakhulu – kwaye ibixhaswe lisebe lezeMidlalo noLonwabo kweli phondo lethu, umasipala iBuffalo City, neBoarder Cricket,” utshilo uBooi. 
“Impumelelo esiyifumeneyo siyayivuyela kakhulu. Le nto siqale ekupheleni konyaka ophelileyo eMzitshane – apho ziphumelele itumente yokuqala. Eyona nto esigcobisayo ezintliziyweni zethu kukuba italente ikhona futhi iyakhula. Into esiyiboniswe ngabadlali bethu sisimilo esimangalisayo nokuzinikela emdlalweni wabo. Iyasikhuthaza thina lo nto ngamandla,” utshilo uBooi. 
Abantu abaninzi abasemidlalweni eMpuma Koloni kuyanyanzeleka bathubeleze ebunzimeni ebuthez’amandla maxa wambi ngenxa yokunqongophala kwamabala nokuswela inkxaso ngokwasezimalini. Nabo abadlali bakaNobumba abohlukanga kwabanye abahamba nzima – kodwa bazixelele ukuba lo nto bazakuyithatha njengento emomelezayo umntu endaweni yokumqoba amandla.  
“Yeyiieyona nto isibhokodisayo thina kukwicala leenqwelo zokuthutha iqela. Ukubasa kwiindawo zokudlala kutyabula imali. Kubenzima ke nangapha kwicala lezixhobo zokudlala ngoba izinto ezisetyenziswa kwiqakamba ziyabiza kakhulu. Ngaphakoko asisokoli kwicala labadlali beqakamba ngoba abantwana bethu basoloko bekulangazelela ukudla ngamaxesha onke.

headline: UPeter Shalulile usebenzela ukuqwabaza irekhodi likaMbesuma
text:
Ifolosi yeMamelodi Sundowns, uPeter Shalulile, ithi izimisela ukufaka amagowuli angaphezulu kunalawo awafake kwisizini egqithile. UShalulile, waseNamibia ngokuzalwa, yeyona folosi eyingozi neyoyikwazyo ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika ngenxa yendlela emangalisayo efaka ngayo amagowuli. Emva kwebathwana lemidlalo elithoba yeDStv Premiership neMTN8, uShalulile ufake amagowuli asixhenxe kwaye uthi ufuna kuthi kuphela isizini abe ewafake ngokuphindeneyo. Kwisizini yakhe yesibini, uShalulile ubhakuzelise umnatha amatyeli angamashumi amabini anethoba emidlalweni engamashumi amane anesibhozo. 
Yiyo lo nto abantu abaninzi bengothukanga xa efumana iwonga lomdlali wenyanga oqaqambileyo kwiPSL kwiveki ephelileyo. “Ekupheleni kwesizini, ndifuna ukuba senkcochoyini neqela kuzo zonke iindebe kwaye ndinethemba lokufaka amagowuli angaphezulu kwendiwafake kwisizini egqithileyo,” utshilo uShalulile emva kokwamkela iwonga. Njengokuba indedeba yaseNamibia izimisela ukuqwabaza irekhodi likaCollins Mbesuma esengumdlali weKaizer Chiefs xa kuphela isizini, kwakufuneka ifake okungenani amagowuli angamashumi amabini anesihlanu. Ingenzeka lo nto? Ewe, ukuba indlela adlala ngayo ayiguquki, uShalulile angayenza ngoba ugqongwe ngabadlali abasemgangathweni ophezulu. 
“Akukho nto itshintshileyo, ndisengula Shalulile ozinikeleyo emsebenzini wakhe omamela abaqeqeshi bakhe. Kugquba umoya omhle enkampini, siyasebenzisana kwaye siyahloniphana. Sisoloko silangazelela ukuqhuba kakuhle emidlalweni yethu. Ndicinga ukuba nantoni ingenzeka kule isizini,” utshilo uShalulile. Emva kokubambana ne-AS Maniema Union ngo’2-2 emdlalweni weCAF Champions League, iSundowns iya emdlalweni wesibini inomsebenzi ofuna ukwenziwa nangona inegowuli lebhasela elifumene emdlalweni obukude nekhaya. Kwiveki ezayo, iDowns iza kudlalela ukuphumelela iMTN8 Cup enethuba ingasayifumani.

headline: Baxter: Sifuna ukuphumelela indebe kule sizini
text:
Umqeqeshi weSuperSport United uStuart Baxter ukungqinile ukuba ifolosi yakhe uJeremy Brockie ikulungele ukudlala kumdlalo wangokuhlwa ngomso weNedbank Cup, phakathi kweSuperSport neMpumalanga Black Aces e-Attridgeville. 
UBrockie khange adlale kumdlalo weCawa ophelileyo, nalapho iSupersport yabetha khona iPlatinum Stars ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni. Le nzalelwane yaseNew Zealand inamagowuli alishumi elinesihlanu egameni layo kule sizini, uzakube ekhona kumdlalo weSuperSport kunye naMaZayoni. “UBrockie ebengekho kumdlalo wethu nePlatinum Stars ngenxa yezizathu zakhe ezithile, ukhona ngoku,”utshilo uBaxter. 
ISuperSport ihleli kwindawo yesixhenxe kwiPSL, ngelixa iBlack Aces ikwindawo yesihlanu. Ngenxa yesi sizathu, uBaxter ukholelwa ukuba iqela lakhe lilo elijongelwe phantsi ukuya kulo mdlalo, kodwa usenalo ithemba lokuba angaphakamisa indebe kwisizini yakhe yokuqala kwiSuperSport. 
Liphupha lakhe nawuphi na umqeqeshi ukuphakamisa indebe. Abafana bam bafanelwe kukufumana indebe noba inye kule sizini, emva kokusebenza nzima,” utshilo uBaxter. Ithemba likaBaxter lizakube lilele kubadlali abafana noKingston Nkatha nowafaka elinye lamagowuli eSuperSport kwiveki ephelileyo. 
UCollins Mbesuma uzakuba lithemba elikhulu leAces kulo mdlalo, njengoyena mdlali uhamba phambili ngamagowuli kule sizini kulindeleke ukuba afake uxinizelelo kubadlali bangemva beSuperSport.

headline: URoger De Sa ngumqeqeshi omtsha wePlatinum Stars
text:
Emva kwesithuba nje seeveki ezintantu isizini ye-Absa Premier Soccer League ka-2017/18 sebebabini abaqeqeshi abanikwe uphumaphele kumaqela abebewaqeqesha. Owokuqala umqeqeshi ugxothwe yiFree State Stars emva kwemidlalo nje eminibi eyidlalileyo. Kwalandele uMngesi, uPeter Butler, naye emva kwemidlalo nje emibini. UButler uqeshwe yiDikwena phambi kokuqala kwale sizini endaweni kaCavin Johnson – owahambayo emva kokungahlaziywa kwesivumelwano sakhe sengqesho. 
Namhlanje iPlatinum Stars ibhengeze uRoger De Sa njengendoda ezikuxhuzul’ imikhala kweli qela ukusukela ngoku ukuya phambili. UDe Sa ukhe wathi khebevu okwethutyana emva kokulahla kwiMaritzburg United ebeyiqeqesha kwisizini ephelileyo. Lo mqeqeshi mtsha kuzawunyanzeleka ayitshaye isaqhuma futhi aqinisekise ukuba uguqula imeko yeli qela laseMntla-Ntshona ngoba alikwazanga ukuphumelela kuyo yomibini imidlalo eliyidlalileyo kule sizini. Kumdlalo weStars olandelayo izakudibana neSuperSport United kumdlalo wePSL ngokuhlwa ngoLwesibini, eLucas Moripe Stadium.

headline: Ingqonyela yeCricket South Africa igxothiwe
text:
Namhlanje iCricket South Africa yothuse umzi ngethuba ibhengeza ukohlukana kwayo nengqonyela [yayo] umnumzana uHaroon Lorgat. La maqela omabini kuthiwa avumelene ngokuba awaqhawule amatyathanga entsebenziswano ngesihle. Umongameli weCSA, uChris Nenzani, ungqinile ngokwenene okokuba ingqonyela yalo mbutho ulawula iqakamba eMzantsi Afrika ikhululwe ngesihle. 
“Sizamile amatyeli ambalwa ukusombulula ukungaboni ngasonye obekukho phakathi kwesigqeba esilawula iqakamba kunye noMnumzana uLorgat – kodwa akwalunga nto. Amalungu esigqeba atsho ngazwinye okokuba makakhululwe umn. Lorgat ngesihle. Ibiyinto enzima kakhulu ukuyenza ngoba siyamazi umnu. Lorgat ukuba unegalelo elikhulu alenzileyo kwiqakamba yeli lizwe. Yena nesigqeba esilawulayo basebenze kakuhle kakhulu ekubuyiseleni uzinzo kwiCSA ebisezingxakini emva kweminyaka emihlanu ebinzima kakhulu,” utshilo uNenzani. 
“Sonke siphoxekile yindlela izinto ezenzeke ngayo – kodwa ke sijonge phambili kumsebenzi weCSA ohliywe nguLorgat. Egameni lombuthu olawula iqakamba ndifuna ukuthi siyambulela uHaroon nomsebenzi wakhe omhle awenzileyo, ndiphinde ndimnqwenelele okuhle kodwa ebomini bakhe,” utshilo uNenzani. 
“Ndifuna ukuthatha eli thuba ndibulele isigqeba elilawulayo ngokundixhasa kule minyaka ndiyihleli kwiCSA. Liwonga kum ukukhokela iqumrhu elinje ngeli kwaye ndiyazingca ngomsebenzi esiwenzileyo kule minyaka imbalwa edlulileyo. Kulilishwa ukwahlukana phantsi kweemeko ezinje. Ndifuna ukubulela abasebenzi, abadlali, abaxhasi bethu, abantu namajelo endaba ngokusixhasa ngethuba ndisebenzela iCSA,” utshilo uLorgat. 
Usekela-mongameli weCSA, uThabang Moroe, uzakuthatha iintambo ngoko nangoko emva kokuchonga sisigqeba njengengqonyela ebambeleyo logama kusakhangelwa ingqonyela entsha.

headline: Amabhokobhoko abolekise ngesine sabadlali
text:
Amabhokobhoko akhuphe abadlali abane abadlala kwiqela lesizwe ukuze bayokuncedisa iSA “A” side kumdlalo wayo wokuqala kwemibini ne-England Saxons.  
Lo mdlalo uzakudlalelwa eToyota Stadium, eBloemfontein ngoLwesine. 
Umdlali ogabangxayo uScarra Ntubeni, uSikhumbuzo Notshe, uNic Groom kunye nomdlali okhabayo uGarth April, bayinxalenye yabadlali abangamashumi amathathu ananye abaziqeqeshayo. Badibene nomqeqeshi uJohan Ackerman izolo ngokuhlwa . 
Aba badlali bobane kulindeleke ukuba baphinde badibane nabanye abadlali beSpringboks eKapa, ngoMgqibelo nalapho iiBoks zizakube zidlala umdlalo wokuqala wovavanyo ne-Ireland. 
UNtubeni ngomnye wabadlali abangenikwa thuba ngokwaneleyo kwiSpringboks, kwaye ukubizwa kwakhe kwiSA “A” kucacisa mhlophe ukuba angangabikho kulo mdlalo wangomso.  
Ngomso * -Allister Coetzee kulindeleke ukuba abhengeze abadlali abazakudlala.

headline: UMzantsi Afrika uthe ngcu phezulu kwiqakamba yehlabathi!
text:
“Lo unyaka mhle kakhulu kuthi ngokulinganayo nembali yethu kwimidlalo ye-ODI Cricket,” itshilo ingqonyela yeCSA, uHaroon Lorgat. 
“Unyaka uphelile ngqo ngoku ukusukela iqela lethu labuyela kwindlela elalidlala ngayo yesiqhelo. Umsebenzi walo uyancomeka kakhulu, libuyele esimeni salo iqela kwaye kuye kwagqama nabadlali bethu kakhulu. Ukuphumelela imidlalo elandelelanayo ngolu hlobo yinto engafane yenzeke lula, thina siyenze izihlandlo ezibini ngethuba sidlala ne-Australia neSri Lanka – iintshatsheli zengaphambili kwihlabathi. Oku kwenzeka kakuhle sisiya kutyelelo lwaseNew Zealand, e-Australia nemidlalo ye-ICC Champions,” utshilo uLorgat. 
“Sithi halala kukapteni weli qela u-AB de Villiers, ukapteni olibambela, uFaf du Plessis, umqeqeshi uRussel Domingo nabaphathi bonke beqela ngokwenza umsebenzi oncomekayo. UDu Plessis udlale kakuhle kakhulu, kangangokuba ngoku ungumdlali wesibini owenze imitsi engamakhulu amane (400) elandela uHashim Amla kwimidlalo ye-ODI. Silinqwenelela okuhle kodwa iqela njengokuba lisendleleni esinge e-Australia,” utshilo uLorgat.

headline: UMitsubishi angaxhasa ihashe laseDutywa!
text:
Ukuba izinto zihambe kakuhle, * -Andazi, angalihashe lokuqala lasezilalini elixhaswa yinkampani yabucala apha eMpuma Koloni.  
Ingxelo ithi inkampani eyenza iimoto, uMitsubishi, yiyo ebilayisha eli hashe ukuya kumdyarho omkhulu kaNgumbela obuseDutywa kutshanje.  
Lo mdlalo wamahashe mkhulu kakhulu nangona ungahoywanga ziinkampani zabucala kuba ungasoloko ukhutshwa kumajelo eendaba.  
Umdla kaMitsubishi uza emva kwendumasi eyenziwa leli hashe ngo’2016 kwiBerlin November – apho laqhumisela ngothuli onke elalikhuphisana nawo. 
Ukugqwesa kwalo eli hashe akothusi ngoba liqeqeshwa ngabantu abathanda amahashe futhi abaneengcambu ezinzulu kumdlalo wamahashe. 
 Ukunyathelwa kwalo, ukolula kwalo xa libaleka kuntama uqeqesho oluphezulu lukaNkunzi Ntantala noTensenti Ntantala. Bazalwa kunye bakuncanca kooyise ukudlalisa amahashe. 
 “Ndaqala ukuphalisa ngexesha lootat’uMyendeki. Babenamahashe amade ke bona, ngelo xesha mna ndabangumlandeli wabo. Kwathi ke bakutshona abootata, ndathi icekwa lishiyeke nam. Ndathenga ihashe elide phaya ngoo’92. Ukusukela ngoko zange ndiyeke noxa bendingaqhubi kakuhle ngamanye amaxesha,” utshilo uNtantala. 
Nangona kumnandi ukuphalisa – kodwa iimpokotho zabo zishiyeka zivuthulukile ziindleko zamahashe.  
“Eyona nto isibethayo kukuba amahashe azindleko. Indlela asibetha ngayo ekutyeni nakwindlela yokuwasa kwiindawo zemidyarho imbi kakhulu. Uqhuba kakuhle * -Andazi gqitha,” utshilo uNtantala. 
UNtantala uthe ngoMitsubishi: “Apha (Mpuma Koloni) alikho ihashe elimbethayo * -Andazi. Waqhuba kakubi kanye qha – kodwa yaba yingxaki yedyoki naleyo. Andinakuxoka, bendiqala ukubona umntu ezokulayisha * -Andazi ngoMnumzana uMakuliwe wakwaMitsubishi – othe gqi okomntu ofuna ukuncedisana nathi. Akakaveli ngokupheleleyo – kodwa wathi uzimisele ukuhamba nathi,” uvale ngelo uNtantala. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za

headline: Clayton Daniels: Le yiSuperSport United  esiyaziyo!
text:
Umdlali wasemva kwiSuperSport United, uClayton Daniels, uthi uziqhenya kakhulu emva kokuba iqela lakhe liguqise phantsi i-Orlando Pirates. Amatsatsantsa a Pitori abethe iPirates ngegowuli elinye eqandeni (1-0) emdlalweni we-Absa Premier Soccer League odlalelwe eMbombela Stadium ebusuku ngoLwesithathu. Ibiyimpumelelo yeSuperSport United yesithathu imidlalo ilandelelana kulo nyaka. Loo mpumelelo izuzwe liqela lasePitoli iyithathe layilahla kwindawo yesine kwiPSL. Ziindaba ezimnandi ke ezo kakhulu kuKaitano Tembo – obephantsi koxinizelelo ekupheleni konyaka ka-2018 ngenxa yokungaqhubi kakuhle kweqela. 
Kubonakala ngathi izinto ziguqukile ngoku kwiSuperSport United. Lo nto ibonakala kwindlela edlala nephumelela ngayo imidlalo. “Kudala sisebenza ngokuzimisela xa sizilolonga, noko ngoku ingathi izinto ziyalunga. Wonke umntu odlalela iSuperSport uyazingca ngokuyidlalela ngoku. Sonke silwile emdlalweni. Umqeqeshi uthe ukuba ndisendaweni elungileyo, ndingalifaka igowuli. Yinto esizilungiselela yona leyo xa sizilolonga. Sibulela umqeqeshi ngokusinika ithuba lokudlala. Umdlalo ubumhle ngeyona ndlela emangalisayo. Le yiSuperSport United esiyaziyo,” utshilo uDaniels obethetha noSuperSport TV emva komdlalo afake kuwo inqaku elinike iSuperSport United impumelelo ebiyidinga kakhulu. 
Amatsatsantsa a Pitori azuze amanqaku angamashumi amathathu anesibini kwimidlalo engamashumi amabini ukuzakuthi ga ngalo mzuzu kule sizini. UDaniels uthi iqela lakhe linalo ithuba lokulwela indebe yePSL njengokuba likwindawo yesine ngoku. “Sibethwe kukonzakala kwabadlali bethu abathile ekuqaleni kwale sizini eqhubayo. Kuye kwathengwa ke nabadlali abenze umahluko omkhulu. Namhlanje sibone uJamie Webber engena endaweni kaTeboho Mokoena futhi wadlala kakuhle. Ndizingomba isifuba ngaye. Kufuneka sinyukele phezulu – kodwa siqinisekise ukuba sijongana nomdlalo omnye ngexesha,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uDaniels emva komdlalo.

headline: Ibuye ngevudu kwakhona iKhiwa’s Tournament kwaNomcamba Ground
text:
Zonke iindlela ziya eNgqeleni ngempelaveki apho kukho umdliva wemidlalo entlobontlobo yeKhiwa’s Tournament. Imidlalo yebhola ekhatywayo nemidlalo yomnyazi iza kubanjelwa kumabala odumo kwaNomcamba Sport Ground ukusukela ngoMgqibelo kusasa ukuya ngeCawe emalanga. Emva kwesiqendu sokuqala sonyaka ophelileyo ebesisihle, iKhiwa’s Tournament ibuye ngelinye ivudu kwakhona kwaye abantu baza konwatyiswa ngomculo ziimvumi ezifana noBethusile Mcinga noDJ Casper. Kulindeleke ukuba umgangatho wemidlalo emabaleni ubenochatha kulo nyaka ngoba nemali ezakufunyanwa ngamaqela aphambili inyukile kakhulu. 
“Kulo nyaka, iqela eliphumeleleyo liza kugoduka namashumi amabini amawaka erandi (R20 000), elesibini lifumane ishumi elinesihlanu lamawaka erandi (R15 000) lize elesithathu lifumane ishumi lamawaka erandi (R10 000). Ngaphezulu koko, amaqela aphumeleleyo, ebholeni nakweyomnyazi, aza kuthiwa jize ngeekiti ezintsha kraca,” utshilo umququzeleli, uBulelani Mancotywa. Nangona abantu besanikwe umtyhi wokudibana kwiindawo zoluntu – kodwa uMancotywa uthi ukhuseleko lwabantu yinto ephambili kubo bengabaququzeleli betumente. “Utywala abuvumelekanga kwaphela kwitumente yethu. Sikhuthaza ukhuseleko kakhulu njengokuba kukho iKhorona. Abantu mabazikhusele ngokuzogquma ngeeMaskhi,” utshilo uMancotywa. 
Phakathi kwamaqela aza kuba yinxalenye yetumente kulo nyaka kukho uMthatha Citizen, Ayakha FC, iLibode Taxi Rank, iKaizer FC, iYoung Brothers, iCanzibe Eagles, iQava FC, iGcaleka FC, uTintsila FC namanye amaninzi. Kanti uKhiwa uzimisele ukunika abantu abatsalanzima izipho kuphinde kuxhotyiswe ulutsha ngamazwi wenkuthazo ziindwendwe zakhe ezihloniphekileyo. “Asijonganga okwenzeka ebaleni kuphela. Siza kube sisipha abantu abahleleleke iziqhuma zokutya. Kulo unyaka, sifuna ukupha abantu abangamashumi amahlanu. Phambi kokuqala kwemidlalo, iindwendwe zethu eziquka uMnu. Putco Mafani no-Ace Ncobo, ziza kufumana ithuba lokuthetha nolutsha ngezinto zobomi,” uvale ngaloo mazwi umququzeleli.

headline: UMzantsi Afrika wonzakaliswe nguRocha, ePraia!
text:
Ilizwe laseCape Verde libethe uMzantsi Afrika okokuqala ngo’2-1 kumdlalo ohlakulela indebe yehlabathi yango’2018 kwisixeko sasePraia, kwibala elibizwa ngokuba yi-Estadio Nacional kubusuku banamhlanje. Le yimpumelelo yokuqala yeCape Verde kwimidlalo yamazwe akuGroup D. UMzantsi Afrika awukwazanga konke konke ukudlala ibhola ephucukileyo kwibala elingayo ingca obudlalelwa kulo umdlalo. ABafana Bafana bathezwe amandla ngakumbi sisenzo esingaqiqwanga ngu-Eric Mathoho akhabe kuso umdlali ngaphandle kwebala esikhokelele ekukhutshweni kwakhe kulo mdlalo. 
UMzantsi Afrika uye kwixesha lokuphumla uhamba emva ngo’2-1. Umdlalo uqale ngezinga eliphantsi – kodwa yifolosi elithemba kwezi ntsuku, uTokelo Rantie, ungcangcazelise umnatha kumzuzu weshumi elinesine kwisigaba sokuqala emva kokunikelana kakuhle kwabadlali boMzantsi Afrika. Nangona amakhwenkwe kaStuart Baxter ekwazile ukukhokela ngegowuli kulo mdlalo – kodwa ebengadlali kakuhle konke. Umdlalo ubulawulwa yiCape Verde – mhlawumbi kungenxa yokuba abadlali bayo bebedlalela endaweni abayiqhelileyo. UNuno Rocha ufake igowuli lokulinganisa emva kokuba abadlali boMzantsi Afrika bengakwazanga ukuchitha ibhola egotywe kwicala lasekunene. URocha ubhalise elesibini ngebhola ebibekwe echaphazeni emva kokuba uDean Furman ephazamise uRyan Mendes ngaphakathi kumhlaba kanozinti. 
Kuye kwanyanzeleka okokuba enze unguqu umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana emva kwemizuzu embalwa kwisigaba sesibini. ULebogang ongakhange agqame kakuhle kulo mdlalo, endaweni yakhe kungene uBradley Grobler – ofike wabashukumisa abadlali beCape Verde abadlala emva. UBongani Zungu, ongabonakalanga kakuhle kulo mdalo, ukhutshiwe kwafakwa uKamohelo Mokotjo. UMzantsi Afrika uphantse wafaka igowuli lesibini ngethuba u-Eric Mathoho egquba ibhola exhimfwe ngenqindi nguDias nangona usompempe ebesethe kukho umdlali olaleleyo. Izinto ziye zambi kwiqela lika-Eric Mathoho ekhutshwa ngekhadi elibomvu emva kokukhaba umdlali weCape Verde ngaphandle kwebala. Kumzuzu wamashumi asixhenxe, uKeagan Dolly, utsale imbumbulu yebhola – kodwa uye wayibamba unozinti. URonwen Williams uvale ibhola ebimbi emva kokuhlasela kwefolosi yeCape Verde. Wenze umsebenzi omhle uPercy Tau nangona engayifumananga kakuhle ngentloko ibhola ayifumene kuMphahlele. UMzantsi Afrika unethemba lokuguqula izinto ngoLwesibini weveki ezayo xa kudlalwa umlenze wesibini eMoses Mabhida Stadium. 
Cape Verde: Dias. Almeida, Stopira, Rodrigues, Vally, Soares, Rocha, Babanco, Fernandes, Tavares, Mendes. 
South Africa: Ronwen Williams, Tebooho Langerman, Eric Mathoho, Thulani Hlatshwayo, Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Dean Furman, Bongani Zungu, Keagan Dolly, Temba Zwane, Lebogang Manyama, Tukelo Rantie.

headline: ICape Town City yonzakaliswe kakubi yiSuperSport
text:
Nangona iCape Town City ibize kakuhle kwaye kubonakala ukuba ilwela ukuphumelela indebe ye-Absa Premier Soccer League – kodwa ngoku iphelelwa ngamandla okwenkomo enombathalala. Kobu busuku yonzakaliswe kakubi yiSuperSport United ngo’4-2 kumdlalo we-Absa Premiership obubanjelwe eLucas Moripe Stadium. Eli qela laseKapa lize kulo mdlalo lifuna amanqaku apheleleyo ukuze lifake uxinizelelo kwiBidvest Wits ebethwa ngumoya phezulu kwiPSL – kodwa endaweni yoko ligoduke lonzakele futhi kunciphe namathuba walo okufumana indebe yesibini kule isizini. 
  
Ngamakhwenkwe kaStuart Baxter abenesiqalo esithembisayo kulo mdlalo. Into aziphoxe ngayo kwimizuzu yokuqala yomdlalo kukwenza impazamo ekhokelele kwigowuli lokuqala elifakwe nguLehlohonolo Majoro. Unozinti weCity, uShu-Aib Walters, unqande amanzi engena endlini amatyeli aliqela kulo mdlalo ngenxa yokubhutyuza kwabadlali emva. UThabo Mnyamane ufake igowuli lokulinganisa emva kokuhlakaza abadlali beCity nonozinti wabo. Ukusukela ngoko, iSuperSport khange iphinde iyeke ukuzama. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla ebambene ngo’1-1 la maqela.  
  
Isigaba sesibini sesona besinomtsalane ngoba bekukho amagowuli amaninzi – kodwa ekugqibeleni kuphumelele iSuperSport United ehleli kwindawo yesine kwiPSL emva kwalo mdlalo. Ngoku iCitizens ilwelwa indawo yesithathu ngoba amathuba wokufumana iWits ambalwa kakhulu ukuba iyawuphumelela umdlalo wayo ngomso. UTeboho Mokoena ufumene iwonga lomdlali oqaqambileyo emva kokudlala indima ephambili kulo mdlalo. 
  
  
  
SuperSport United: Williams, Boxall, Gould, Daniels, Bhasera, Furman, Letsholonyane, Mokoena, Phala, Mnyamane (Modiba 72′), Brockie. 
  
Cape Town City: Walters, Mkhize, Gumede, Mokeke, Seedat (Edmilson 87′), Putsche, Nodada, Manyama, Moseamedi, Masina (Jayiya 78′), Majoro.

headline: Abafana Bes’sthende bajolise iintolo zabo kwiRoyal AM kwidabi laKwaZulu-Natal
text:
Idabi lobukhaya lephondo laKwaZulu-Natal kulindeleke livelise umdlalo usemgangathweni ophezulu ngempelaveki. Abafana Bes’thende baza kutshula iintolo zabo eziloliweyo kwiRoyal AM emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ekulindeleke utake iintlantsi eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium ngentsimbi yesithathu ngomso. Nangani isizini isecicini lokuvalwa – kuninzi kakhulu okusadlalelwa ngamaqela akwiDStv Premiership. Yona iGolden Arrows ilwela ukuqinisekisa indawo yayo kwiTop 8. Kanti yona iRoyal AM, ezenzele igama ngokugraya amaqela kwisizini yayo yokuqala, ilwela ukufumana indawo yesibini ukuze idlale kwiCAF Champions League okokuqala. 
Umqeqeshi weGolden Arrows, uVusumuzi Vilakazi, uxelele iintatheli ukuba iqela lakhe lizimisele ukuyibhoboza ngotolo lifumane amanqaku apheleleyo emdlalweni wangempelaveki. Nakubeni yayiqale isizini ngendlela encumisayo phantsi kukaLehlohonolo Seema, iGolden Arrows ikhe yagqwidiza kakhulu kodwa ngoku ifuna indawo kwiTop 8 njengakwisizini egqithileyo. “Umdlalo ophakathi kwethu neRoyal AM ngeke ubelula ngoba kaloku lidabi lobukhaya. Emdlalweni wokuqala sabambana nayo – kodwa izinto ziza kwahluka kulo siya kuwo ndiqinisekile. Sifuna amanqaku amathathu ukuze single kwiTop 8. Umdlalo kuthi ubaluleke kakhulu ngenxa yeso sizathu,” utshilo uVilakazi. 
Abafana Bes’thende bahleli kwindawo yethoba benamanqaku angamashumi amathathu anesithandathu. Yona iThwihli Thwahla (iRoyal AM) ikwindawo yesithathu emva kweCape Town City eyamkela AmaZulu emdlalweni wayo olandelayo. “Sijongene nomdlalo onzima kakhulu. Yiyo lo nto sizimisele ukusebenza ngokuzimisela ukuze siphumelele. Iyingozi kakhulu iRoyal AM xa ihlasela, kubalulekile kuthi ukuzikhusela. Siyabazi emva ayiqinanga iRoyal AM,” utshilo uVilakazi oqeqesha ngokubambisana noMabhuti Khenyeza. Omabini amaqela awayiphumelelanga imidlalo yayo egqithileyo. Yonke imidlalo yeDStv Premiership kule veki iza kudlalwa ngexesha elinye ngoMgqibelo emalanga.

headline: Erasmus ufuna umsebenzi ococekileyo
text:
Umqeqeshi waMabhokobhoko, uRassie Erasmus, wenze iinguqu ezintathu phambi komdlalo wangomso (Lwesihlanu).  
Amabhokobhoko azakube ekhangela impumelelo yawo yesibini xa edibana ne-Italy emdlalweni weNdebe yeHlabathi ngentsimbi yeshumi elinambini emin’ emaqanda.  
Nakubeni kulindeleke anyuke umnqantsa nje amakhwenkwe kaErasmus xa edlala ne-Italy – kodwa aya kuwo ekhuthazekile emva kokubethela oogqirha nezicaka iNamibia ngo’57-3 emdlalweni obubanjelwe kwisixeko saseToyota, eJapan, kwiveki ephelileyo. 
 URassie ugqibe kwelokuba abuyise iziqwayi zakhe zabadlali abanamava ngenxa yokubaluleka kumdlalo emva komhlaba obusihla kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Abadlali abafana nokapteni uSiya Kolisi, uBongi Mbonambi noTendai Mtawarira baza kuqala umdlalo ngomso.  
Injongo ka-Erasmus kukuqinisekisa okokuba iqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika lifumana indawo yalo xa kufika ixesha lokuba imidlalo yeNdebe yeHlabathi iye kwisigaba esilandelayo. 
“Umdlalo osiya kuwo kulawulwa ngabadlali baphambili. 
 Kungoko ke sifuna ukuqinisekisa nathi okokuba siwulungele ngokupheleleyo umlo.  
Eyona nto eza kuba nzima iphaya phambili – anditsho kuba sinabadlali esingabathembanga emva.  
Ubaluleke kakhulu kuthi umdlalo ozayo kwaye kuza kufiwa kuwo. 
 Sizimisele ukwenza nokuba yintoni eyakuthi isinike impumelelo emdlalweni.  
Siza kwenza njalo ngoba sifuna ukuya kumjikelo olandelayo wetumente yehlabathi,” utshilo uErasmus ngethuba ethetha neentatheli ekuqaleni kwale veki kwelaseJapan.  
Nangona kubonakala ukuba likhona ixhala kwinkampi yamaBhokobhoko ngenxa yendlela edlala ngayo i-Italy – kodwa uErasmus uthi abadlali bakhe bakulungele ukuqubisana nayo nayiphi na into enokwenzeka emdlalweni. 
“Abantu banokucinga ukuba senza nje xa senza iinguqu ezimbi emva, injongo yethu kukuqinisekisa okokuba siya edabini sinezixhobo ezaneleyo.  
Sinabadlali abangamashumi amabini anesithathu ekulindeleke badlale emidlalweni nanini na,” utshilo uErasmus. 
 Umqeqeshi uza kuchulumanciswa bubukho bukaJesse Kriel owonzakele emdlalweni uMzantsi Afrika obethwe kuwo yiNew Zealand ngo’23-13. 
Abaqala umdlalo: Willie le Roux, Cheslin Kolbe, Lukhanyo Am, Damian de Allende, Makazole Mapimpi, Handre Pollard, Faf de Klerk, Duane Vermeulen, Pieter-Steph du Toit, Siya Kolisi, Lood de Jager, Eben Etzebeth, Frans Malherbe, Bongi Mbonambi, Tendai Mtawarira. 
Amalalela: Malcolm Marx, Steven Kitshoff, Vincent Koch, RG Snyman, Franco Mostert, Francois Louw, Herchel Jantjies, Frans Steyn.

headline: Linyukele phezulu iqela likaBenni McCarthy
text:
Uncume waveza nelokugqibela izinyo uBenni McCarthy emva kokuba iqela lakhe libethe iMamelodi Sundowns ngo’1-0 kumdlalo wokugqibela we-Absa Premier Soccer League obubanjelwe eLoftus Versfeld Stadium. 
 Igowuli lempumelelo lifakwe nguNana Akosah-Bempah kwisiqingatha sokuqala emva kokufumana ibhola entle egotywe ngu-Aubrey Ngoma.  
Eli ibilityeli lesithathu iCity ibetha iSundowns kwimidlalo yePSL ukusukela kwisizini edlulileyo.  
Ngoku iqela likaMcCarthy libambe indawo yesibini linamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesine emva kokudlala imidlalo elishumi nantlanu.  
Lo nto imchulumancise kakhulu umqeqeshi weCitizens ebikhe yakhathazwa kukungaphumeleli emidlalweni eliqela emva kokubethwa kumdlalo weMTN 8 yiSuperSport United  kwisithuba seenyanga ezimbini ezidlulileyo. 
Umdlalo ubukwizinga eliphezulu futhi kucaca ukuba kudibene amakhangala ekudala ezondana.  
AmaSandawana abeke ibhola phantsi, ahlasela macala onke – kodwa akacholanga naphantsi kubadlali beCity abebeluqilima bekhokelwa nguRobyn Johannes othe wafumana iwonga loyena mdlali oqaqambileyo kulo mdlalo.  
NguJohannes oqinisekise ukuba ubuncothula neengcambu ubungozi bukaPercy Tau noThemba Zwane xa behlasela.  
Ethetha emva komdlalo, uJohannes uthe: “Ukudlala neSundowns akululanga. Khumbula ukuba lelona qela liphambili kweli lizwe – kodwa size apha sibalungiselele. Sikwazile ukukhupha uHlompho Kekana noTiyani Mabunda emdlalweni saqonda ukuba sigqibile. Ndiyavuyisana noogxa bam ngokufumana amanqaku amathathu kwakhona.” 
Inyanga ephelileyo khange imphathe kakuhle konke uMcCarthy ngoba iqela lakhe belisoloko liphisa ngemidlalo ebekumele liyiphumelele – kodwa ngoku uya eKrismesini ekhululekile. 
 Iqela lakhe libuyele kwindawo elalikuyo kakade ekuqaleni kwesizini.  
“Ndiyabancoma kakhulu abadlali bam, badlale kakuhle kakhulu. Ndicinga ukuba ngesilifumene nelesibini igowuli ukuba besiwasebenzisile amathuba – kodwa andibakhalazeli abadlali bam. Injongo yethu ibikukuqinisekisa ukuba iDowns ayikwazi ukudlala esiswini,” utshilo uMcCarthy.

headline: Uphantsi kolawulo lweDowns uGroup B
text:
Amathemba eMamelodi Sundowns okugqugqisa kwizwekazi le Afrika aphezulu emva kokuba iguqise phantsi iqela laseYiphutha. IDowns ibambe ngesixhanti iZamalek enkundleni yayo kumdlalo weCaf Champions League ebusuku ngeCawe.  
Esi ingasisiqalo sendlela ende ezakuhanjwa yiSundowns ezimisele ukulandela ekhondweni le-Orlando Pirates eyaphumelela iCaf Champions League ngo’1995 ngokuthi ibuye noloyiso ekupheleni kolu khuphiswano xa kuphela lo nyaka.  
Amagowuli eSundowns afakwe nguKhama Billiat kwisigaba sesibini nomdlali siswini uTiyani Mabunda ovalele emnatheni ibhola ebethe epalini yabuyela ngaphakathi ebaleni.  
Umdlalo ubunzima kakhulu ngoba bekufuneka kukho eliphumelelayo, kodwa okuye kwacaca kukuba iqela likaPitso Mosimane liye eCairo lizilungiselele ngokupheleleyo, ingakwicala labalandeli ababayingxaki xa amaqela alapha eMzantsi Afrika etyelele amanye amazwe alapha kwizwekazi leAfrika.  
Umdlalo uqale ngesantya esiphezulu, kubonakala ukuba omabini la maqela afuna impumelelo, kodwa yiSundowns etsazise igazi kuqala.  
Amasandawana aye kulo mdlali omelele ngamava awafumene ngethuba edlala olu khuphiswano. Kubekho ukungasebenzisani kakuhle phakathi kukaThabo Ntethe nonozinti uDennis Onyango okukhokelele ekufakweni kwegowuli.  
Njengokuba iMamelodi Sundowns ibethe i-Enyimba neZamalek kuGroup B, ngoku yiyo [iSundowns] enethuba elicacileyo lokudlulela kwimidlalo ephambi kwamagqibela kankqoyi eCaf Champions League ekupheleni kwalo nyaka ngoba la maqela mabini ikhuphisana nawo sele ephulukene nomdlalo iqela ngalinye. Ezi ntshatsheli ze-Absa Premier Soccer League kulindeleke ukuba zamkele iZamalek eyaphumelela iCaf Champions League izihlandlo ezihlanu ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesixhenxe kule nyanga eLucas Moripe Stadium.  
Impumelelo efunyenwe ziBrazillians izinika amandla futhi ukudlala kakuhle kwabo kude kube sekugqibeleni kwakuthi kuphakamise igama loMzantsi Afrika ngokubanzi.

headline: AmaDatshi ophule iintliziyo zeSenegal ephise ngomdlalo kwisigaba sesibini
text:
Ayiqale kakuhle itumente yehlabathi yebhola ekhatywayo AmaDatshi ngokuphumelela umdlalo wawo wokuqala kaGroup A. Oku kwenzeka emva kokuba ophule iintliziyo zabalandeli beSenegal eguqiswe phantsi ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni (2-0) emdlalweni weNdebe yeHlabathi obuse-Al Thumama Stadium, eDoha, ngorhatya lwanamhlanje. Into ebuhlungu neyakuxikixa iingqondo zabadlali beSenegal kukuba babethwe emdlalweni abawudlale kakuhle kakhulu. Amagowuli avele emva kokuphazamiseka kweengqondo zabo umdlalo usiya ekupheleni. Noxa iqela lika-Aliou Cisse lidlale kakuhle emdlalweni – kodwa bekucaca ukuba ithemba lakhe alikho, uSadio Mane – ophosiweyo yitumente yehlabathi yalo nyaka ngenxa yokonzakala. 
Noxa umdlalo ubumhle futhi ubambene kwisigaba sokuqala – kodwa akukho mathuba acacileyo amaqela awadalileyo kwisigaba sokuqala. Ithuba lokuqala lamakhwenkwe kaLouis van Gaal lize emzuzwini weshumi elinethoba ngethuba ibhola kaFrenkie de Jong ibanjwa ngunozinti weSenegal ngaphandle kokusokola. USarr (Ismaila) uzamile ukukhabela ibhola entle ezipalini – kodwa uVirgil van Dijk uye wayichitha ngentloko ibhola yakhe. Siphelile isigaba sokuqala kungekho qela elikwazileyo ukubhalisa ebhodini. Kwisigaba sesibini, iSenegal idlale umdlalo ophucukileyo kakhulu. 
Ibhola ibiyibeka phantsi, inikelana kakuhle ukuya phambili – ukugqobhoza emva kwiNetherlands engakwazanga ukuyenza. AmaDatshi alifumene igowuli elifakwe nguCody Gakpo emva kwexesha elide esokola. Iintshatsheli ze-Afrika zizame ukuphindisa ngonyawo lukaPape Gueye – kodwa unozinti weDatshi uye wayichitha ibhola yakhe. Emizuzwini yokugqibela emdlalweni uDavy Klaassen fake igowuli elibe sisikhonkwane sebhokisi yeSenegal emva kokuba uEdouard Mendy engakwazanga ukufika ngamangqindi ebholeni. Ngoku iSenegal kufuneka ibethe iQatar ebethwe ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni yiEcuador emdlalweni wokuvula iNdebe yeHlabathi izolo. Yona iNetherlands iza kuqubisana ne-Ecuador emdlalweni olandelayo.

headline: UPitso ufuna ukunikwa ithuba emva kwetumente ebiseQatar
text:
Inzalelwane yaseMzantsi Afrika, uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane, iphinde yenza imbali kwakhona ebholeni ekhatywayo. Kutshanje, uJingles uthathe iAl Ahly wayisa kwiClub World Cup ebibanjelwe eQatar. Kulapho iqela lakhe libambe indawo yesithathu emva kokubetha iPalmeiras kumapenela emdlalweni wokugqibela. Phambi koko, iAl Ahly ibethe iAl Duhail phambi kokukatswa ngo’2-0 yiBayern Munich. Nangona iAl Ahly iye eQatar igxeleshe indawo yesibini okungenani – kodwa ukufumana imbasa yeBronze kwitumente yehlabathi ibe yinto enkulu kumqeqeshi. Ebengaqali uMosimane ukuya kwitumente yehlabathi yamaqela ebhola ekhatywayo. Kwiminyaka egqithileyo wasa iMamelodi Sundowns emva kokuphakamisa indebe yeCaf Champions League. Ngoku uPitso ngumqeqeshi wokuqala eMzantsi Afrika oye kabini kwiClub World Cup nophakathi kwabambalwa abanokuthelekiswa namadoda afana noJurgen Klopp noPep Guardiola xa kuthethwa ngokuphumelela iindebe ezibalulekileyo kumaqela wabo. 
Abathile eYiphutha, khange bayeke ukuyigxeka indlela ayidlalisa ngayo iAl Ahly – elona qela likhulu kwizwekazi leAfrika yonke. Kodwa nangona kunjalo, uMosimane uthe izinto zithatha ixesha. Lo nto yenzeke nakubaqeqeshi behlabathi abaziwayo. “Emva kokufika eQatar, ndathi injongo yethu kukubuya nendebe. Ngesaya kwisigaba sokugqibela ukuba sasithelekiswe namanye amaqela endaweni yeBayern Munich. Kumthathe iminyaka emihlanu yonke uKlopp ukuze aphumelele. Kwaba njalo nakuGuardiola owathatha iminyaka emine. Nam ndiyalidinga ixesha elingako. Ziinyanga ezintlanu qha ndingumqeqeshi apha, kodwa ke iyandixhasa ibhodi yeqela ekhokelwa nguMahmoud El-Khatib. Kufuneka sifumane abanye abadlali. Asikwazanga ukufaka amagowuli oneleyo kwiClub World Cup. Lo nto ithi kufuneka siqinise indlela iqela elihlasela ngayo. Amagowuli yeyona nto ebalulekileyo ebholeni ekhatywayo,” utshilo uMosimane osele ephumelele iindebe ezintathu eYiphutha.

headline: UMalesela unethemba lokubetha iPirates
text:
Umqeqeshi weChippa United uDan Malesela, uthi uqinisekile ukuba iqela lakhe lingakwazi ukubuya namanqaku xa lidlala ne-Orlando Pirates kumdlaolo wePSL ngokuhlwa ngoLwesithathu.  
UDan ukuthethe oku emva kokuba iChippa ibambene neGolden Arrows ngeqanda macala kumdlalo ubudlalelwa eMonti emva kwemini ngoMgqibelo. 
 “Noko ndanelisekile, sibenelishwa nje ukungafaki magowuli. Asikwazi kufumana manqaku kule ndlela ziyiyo izinto ngoku, ndanelisekile ngumdlalo wanamhlanje. Asiyonto besiyifuna kodwa silifumene inqaku asibethwanga,” utshilo uMalesela. 
 “Kwisiqingatha sesibini besilifuna ngamandla igowuli, abadlali khange bakwazi ukunikana kakuhle ibhola bebengxamile.” 
 Mayelana nomdlalo ozayo we-Orlando Pirates uMalesela uthi ubonile ukuba abadlali bakhe bayakwazi ukuwenza amathuba , kwaye bayakwazi ukufaka uxinizelelo kwamanye amaqela. “Ngokucacileyo iPirates izakudlala umdlalo ovulekileyo, kwaye siza- kuzifumana iziphumo.” 
 UJoseph Malongoane ebedlala ngokuzimisela kakhulu ecabangeni njengesiqhelo, kodwa iibhola zakhe khange bakwazi ukuzigqibezela abadlali abafana noDavid Zulu, kunye noXola Mlambo phambili. Umqeqeshi we-Arrows uClinton Larson uthi imeko abebedlalela phantsi kwayo abadlali bakhe khange bakwazi ukuyiqhela. 
“Sidlale kakuhle kakhulu ingakumbi ngasemva, kodwa besisilela kwicabanga lasekhohlo kuba uMalongoane ebebanika ixesha elinzima abadlali,” utshilo uLarsen. 
 UMalesela uthi uqinisekile ukuba iChippa izakuphela le sizini ihleli kumaqela asibhozo okuqala.  
“Xa sikwazi ukwenza amathuba ngolu hlobo, kwaye ziwafake uxinizelelo amanye amaqela, loo nto ithetha ukuba ikhona into esiyenza kakuhle,” uvale ngokutsho uMalesela.

headline: Ziqinisekile ngoloyiso izikolo zaseMathole
text:
Imidlalo yomnyazi ezikolweni ikwelinye inqanaba. Kwinyanga ezayo izikolo zeMpuma Koloni ziza kudibana eMonti – apho kulindeleke ukuba kuqhawuke unobathana.  
Izikolo zaseMathole ziya kwimidlalo yephondo ngomhla wethoba kwinyanga ezayo zizithembile kakhulu emva kokuvan’ amandla.  
Kwiveki ephelileyo amaqela omnyazi ebedibene eWalter Sisulu University eGcuwa – apho ahluzene khona phambi kokushiyeka kwamane aya eMonti.  
Abadlali bamaqela onke babonise izakhono zabo zokudlala ibhola, udlamko olukhulu; ibhola ibijulwa futhi ihamba ngesantya esiphezulu. 
Umdlalo wezikolo zonke ubuncomeka, kangangokuba bekunzima nokubona ukuba kudlala abantwana abaphuma kwizikolo ezingenazo iindawo zokuzilolonga ezisemgangathweni.  
Usihlalo wombutho wezikolo zaseMathole, umam’ uNocawe Dlephu, uyincomile kakhulu indlela izikolo ezidlale ngayo nendlela abaziphethe ngayo abantwana. 
 “Abantwana bethu badlale kakuhle, umgangatho ubuphakamile. Nangona kunjalo, kusafuneka abaqeqeshi balungiselele umgangatho ophezulu njengokuba sisiya kwimidlalo yephondo. Thina singaMathole sihamba phambili oko. Siba ngoompondozihlanjiwe thina emidlalweni. Ndiqinisekile siza kubuya nodumo,” utshilo uDlephu. 
Ukhona umdla wokudlala ibhola yomnyazi ebantwaneni, kootitshala kwaye nezikolo ziyazama ukuncedisa abantwana – kodwa kuyabonakala ukuba ukungabikho kwenkxaso kwicala lezezimali kuyawuqhwalelisa lo mdlalo.  
UDlephu uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa ukuba iSebe lezeMfundo (eMpuma Koloni) livele libaxelele ukuba imidlalo luxanduva lwezikolo – lona alingeni ndawo. Izikolo eziza kumela Amathole yiJojweni, iDaluxolo, iLangalethu neZwelidumile. 
“Into esisokolisayo kwibhola yomnyazi kukungakhathalelwa. Akukho nkxaso siyifumanayo. Utitshala onomdla uphetha ekhupha kuye ngoba kaloku kwalapha ezikolweni imali yokuya phambili ayikho. Kuye kuthiwe isebe lezemfundo linegalelo emidlalweni – kodwa kunzima ukuyibona into eliyenzayo. Livele lithi uxanduva lolwesikolo, ngakumbi kule midlalo yethu. Kule midlalo yephondo esiya kuyo, isikolo siza kuzisela abantwana baso. Uyabetheka ke ngoku umntwana xa isikolo singakwazi ukuya phambili ngenxa yemali sibe siphumelele. Uthezeka amandla naye umqeqeshi kwelinye icala,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uDlephu.

headline: U-Ali ebengumzekelo kwiintshatsheli ezininzi
text:
Isamane ingena imiyalezo yovelwano, emva kokuvakala sokuwa komthi omkhulu kumdlalo wamanqindi. 
UMuhammad “The Greatest” Ali uyibekile inqawa kule mpelaveki eneminyaka engamashumi asixhenxe anesine. Eli qhawe linikezele kwidabi leminyaka ebelililwa nesifo iParkinson’s syndrome.  
 Le ntshatsheli izenzele igama kakhulu ehlabathini ngokuba yimbethi mamqindi yokuqala ukuphumelela iintshinga yehlabathi amatyeli amathathu. 
“Ilungu lam limkile, kwaye ilungu elikhulu,” utshilo uGeorge Foreman naye osele esuka ukuba yintshatsheli yehlabathi kwaye wangquzulana no-Ali kakhulu eqongeni lokulwa. 
 U-Ali ebesaziwa njengomntu onelizwi kwimiba emininzi ngaphandle kwamanqindi. Wayethetha kakhulu ngemiba yecalucalulo eMelika ngeminyaka yoo1960.  
Indlela aweyakwazi ngayo ukusulela ngayo abantu yayichumela ngaphandle kweqonga lokulwa.  
Waqhubeka waba sisithethi sabantu abaninzi abamnyama ababecinezelekile, kwihlabathi jikelele kuba wayengakuvumeli ukuvalwa umlomo angazivakalisi izimvo zakhe. Mhla wayebuzwa ngeyona nto afuna ukukhunjulwa ngayo * -Ali wathi: “Ndingathanda ukukhunjulwa njengendoda eyaphumelela intshinga yeheavyweight amatyeli amathathu, umntu owayenobuntu ebaphethe kakuhle abanye abantu.  
Njengendoda eyayingazange ibajongele phantsi abantu abajonge kuyo, neyayizimela iinkolelo zayo.” 
 Le ndedeba yazalelwa eLouisville, eKuntucky ngomhla weshumi elinesixhenxe kwinyanga yoMqungu ngonyaka ka1942, wazalwa enguCassius Marcellus Clay Jr.  
Ulitshintshe igama lakhe emva kokuba eguqukele kwinkolo ye-Islam. 
 U-Ali ushiya ngasemva inkosikazi yakhe uLonie Williams kunye nabantwana bakhe abalithoba. Kulindeleke ukuba abekwe kwikhaya lakhe lokugqibela ngoLwesihlanu wale veki.

headline: iChippa United ibambise uSambu, kwakhona!
text:
Idemesha eyenzeke kwezoshishino nasentlalweni yoluntu ayithetheki. Kube njalo nasebholeni ekhatywayo. Abaphathi bamaqela kuza kunyanzeleka bangene nzulu ezipokothweni xa bebhatala imivuzo yabadlali kule nyanga ngoba iPSL ngeke iyikhuphe imali yesibonelelo yesiqhelo emva kokuqengqeleka kweenyanga ezintathu ingadlalwa iibhola ngenxa yekhorona. Kodwa eyona nto ebembi kakhulu kukuba amaqela kuye kwanyanzeleka abakhulule abadlali abaphelelwe zizivumelwano ekupheleni kwenyanga yeSilimela bengayigqibanga isizini. Nayo iChippa iphakathi kwamaqela athe achatshazelelwa kakubi kukumiswa kwesizini ngoba iye yanyanzeleka okokuba imkhulule uRhulani Mokwena – owafika Ekwindla ngemboleko, engena endaweni kaNorman Mapeza. “Siye sanyanzeleka simkhulule umqeqeshi ngoba besingaqinisekanga ngesibhengezo ebesiza kwenziwa ngumphathiswa ngemidlalo,” litshilo kumajelo eendaba igosa eliphezulu lizama ukucacisa ukuhamba kukaMokwena. Akukacaci kakuhle eyona nto ebangele iChippa imyeke uMokwena ingaphelanga isizini ngoba akanayo indawo nakwi-Orlando Pirates eyayibolekise ngaye ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka.   
Njengesiqhelo, iChippa United iphinde yanika uMbuyiselo Sambu iintambo njengebambela kude kubekho umqeqeshi omtsha. Kokwesithathu kule sizini ebambela uSambu. Emva kokuhamba kukaClinton Larsen nasemva kokuhamba kukaMapeza – kwaye kwakhwetywa yena. USambu, obelisekela-maqeqeshi ixesha elide, waye wathotyiselwa wayokuqeqesha iChippa United edlala kwiMultiChoice Diski Challenge. Ethetha neli phephandaba ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, uSambu wathi akumkhathazi ukunyuka esehla ngoba ziseninzi izinto azifundayo. Ujongene nomsebenzi onzima kakhulu ngoba iChippa United kufuneka ilwele ukusinda ezembeni emidlalweni emithandathu eshiyekileyo. Kungoku nje iChippa ihleli kwindawo yeshumi elinesibini. Iqokelele amashumi amabini anesithandathu amanqaku emidlalweni engamashumi amabini anane. Kulindeleke iPSL ikhethe amaphondo amaqela aza kwenza iinkampu kuzo agqibezele nemidlalo yawo kuwo. Amaphondo ekucingeleka okokuba angakhethwa lelaKwaZulu-Natal, iGauteng, iMpumalanga okanye eMntla Ntshona. Kodwa konke oko kwakuthi kwenzeka phantsi kwemiqathango epasiswe ngabezempilo norhulumente.

headline: Abafana Bes’thende baphume ebaleni bethokombisile emva kokuhlazwa yiBloemfontein Celtic
text:
Abafana Bes’thende bayinikele umva iDr Molemela Stadium bethokombisile emva kokuhlazwa ngemvula yamagowuli amahlanu eqandeni yiBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership obumhle ngeyona ndlela emalanga namhlanje. Isiwelele (Celtic) siye emdlalweni wanamhlanje sinomsindo emva kokubethwa yi-Orlando Pirates ngo’3-1 kwiveki ephelileyo. Umtshutshisi omkhulu, uNdumiso Mabena, ubhakuzelise umnatha kungekapheli nomzuzu omnye kuqale isiqingatha sokuqala emva kokuba abadlali beGolden Arrows bengakwazanga ukuthatha ibhola kuye. UMenzi Masuku ufake igowuli lesibini emzuzwini weshumi elinesithathu umdlalo uqalile. Ngelo xesha, kuvele kwacaca nje okokuba iCeltic ifuna amanqaku amathathu noxa bekubonakala okokuba iArrows izimisele ukulwa. 
Kuthe kwakubonakala ukuba iCeltic ize ngamandla, uSteve Komphela ukhuphe uSiyabonga Dube, endaweni yakhe ufake uKnox Mutiza – enethemba lokuguquka kwezinto. UJackson Mabokgwabe, obefudula edlalela i-Orlando Pirates, wenze umsebenzi omhle kakhulu ezipalini. UHarris Tchilimbou ufake elinye igowuli emva kokudlalelwa nguMabena ibhola entle. UMzwanele Mahashe no-Andile Fikizolo ngabanye babadlali abafake amagowuli angcwabe iGolden Arrows. Emva kokuphumelela namhlanje, iCeltic inyukele kwindawo yesihlanu kwiPSL. UKomphela uyivumile induku emva komdlalo watsho esithi iqela lakhe libethwe liqela elidlale kakuhle kakhulu. 
   
BloemfonteinCeltic: Mabokgwane, Mashikinya, Potsane, Tani, Baloyi, Mahashe, Mabena, Pfumbidzai, Lingwati, Masuku, Tchilimbou. 
Amalalela: Chaine, Fikizolo, De Jongh, Khasipe, Luthuli, Maema, Maloisane. 
Golden Arrows: Sibanda, Dube, Bilankulu, Mathiane, Lunga,  Shitolo, Venter, Mtshali, Makhubela, Sabelo, Gumede. 
Amalalela: Mbaeava, Dube, Phiri, Nkombelo, Lamola, Mutizwa, Matloga.

headline: Makuqeqeshwe oomanejala bamanqindi
text:
Bekukhe kwakho ixesha apho bekubhejwa ngeembethi manqindi, zona zingayazi lo nto, ziphele zisilwiswa imilo enganyanzelekanga nenzima kuba umthelekisi othile ufuna ukogqitha oogxa bakhe ngobunganga.  
Undonakele wokuqala wawusekubeni, gxebe mandithi usekuben, kuba lo mkhuba usaqhubeka, abaphathi bembethi manqindi bayekela uxanduva lwabo kubathelekisi. Makhe ndikhumbuze ndithunuke izazela zabaphathi ukuze babambe indawo yabo. 
Abaphathi bembethi manqindi banoxanduva lokukhusela nokuxonkxa ikamva labadlali ababaphetheyo. Xa imbethi manqindi isweleka iyimpula kalujaca okanye ingafikeleli kwinqanaba elithile inesakhono sokuya ezinkwenkwezini, amehlo athe ntsho kumphathi wayo. Kungoko abaphathi kufuneka balwe kumile ingca emqolo xa kukho abanjongo engayiphuhlisiyo imbethi manqindi. 
Ixesha elininzi abaphathi bembethi manqindi abanaluqeqesho okanye isiqinekiso sokuphatha, baphatha kuba bavule indawo yokuzilolonga kwakho abadlali.  
Ukungabinamali kokunye okwenza batye tyum nangona kusonakala, kaloku uninzi lwabathelekisi itasi, ziyamimitheka kwaye zikhe ziphose kubaphathi aba, ibangele ukuba abanye babo batekete.  
Imbethi manqindi zingomye umceli-mngeni kuba nazo ziphuma zingena azinasizinzo, zenze kubenzima ukuphatheka kuxonxwe ikamva lazo. 
Yonke le miceli-mngeni ayinazisombululo zilula, kubemandundu ngakumbi ke xa kungekho qeqesho lukhoyo kubaphathi, ifuna inkcub-abuchopho eziqeqeshiweyo.  
Uqeqesho lungenza umahluko omkhulu kubomi beembethi manqindi zethu kunye nesidima kulo mdlalo. Icekwa lilele kwiziphatha- mandla zequmrhu elilawula amanqindi. Kungakuhle ukuba kunokuba nesolotya eligunyazisa ukuba nabani na ozakongamela umdlali abenesiqinisekiso soqeqesho.  
Iqumrhu linoxanduva lokwenza amathuba okuqeqesha avuleleke, kodwa kuqalwe ngabo kudala benethwa bengenadyasi. Iimbethi manqindi ezininzi ezinesakhono ziphelela emafini zingafikanga ezinkwenkwezini ngenxa yalo mkhwa. 
Amade ngawetyala ke zinkosi, xa kuqala unyaka ozayo kufuneka sibhinqe omfutshane siqinisekise Ikamva lomdlalo.

headline: Iya kumdlalo wokugqibela iFrance emva kokunikezela kweBelgium
text:
Kugqityiwe, iFrance iza kudlala umdlalo wokugqibela kwi-2018 FIFA World Cup nelizwe eliphumeleleyo phakathi kweCroatia neNgilane emva kokunikezela kweBelgium kumdlalo obuseSaint Petersburg Stadium namhlanje. Umdlali wasemva, uSamuel Umtiti, ungcangcazelise umnatha kumzuzu wesihlanu kwisiqingatha sesibini somdlalo. Lelo gowuli elithe lasondeza iFrance kwiphupha layo lokuphakamisa eyona ndebe inexabiso kwibhola yehlabathi. Liphelile ithemba leBelgium lokuya kumdlalo wokugqibela okokuqala embalini yayo kwindebe yehlabathi. 
Ukubethwa kwayo iBelgium yinto abalandeli bayo abangangayamkeli ncam ngoba yiyo ebiqale yabonisa amandla emdlalweni nangona ingakwazanga nje ukufumana igowuli. Umdlali waseswini weBelgium, u-Eden Hazard, ebesenza unothanda kwiindawo eziyingozi emhlabeni weFrance – kodwa namhlanje iBelgium iphoxhwe bubuthuntu bukaRomelu Lukaku phambili oze emdlalweni ekhangela igowuli lesihlanu. UKavin du Bruyne, owabhokodisa iBrazil kwiveki ephelileyo, ngomnye wabadlali abazamileyo ukudlala umdlalo ophucukileyo – kodwa ngelishwa izinto azivumanga namhlanje. 
   
Unozinti weFrance, uHugo Lloris, ubonisile ukuba ungumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu futhi oluncedo kakhulu kwilizwe. Iibhola azivalileyo kwizigaba zozibini zomdlalo ziyigcine isemdlalweni iFrance. Amendu kaKylian Mbappe ayincedile iFrance – kodwa u-Olivier Giroud akakwazanga ukusebenzisa iibhola ebezimane ukuthi gqi emacaleni. Amakhwenkwe kaRoberto Martinez agoduka ekhathazekile – kodwa eyenzile indima yawo ekufanele kukuqhwatyelwa izandla ngabantu baseBelgium eze kwindebe yehlabathi yothuba abantu abaninzi ngomdlalo ophucukileyo. 
      
Kwimizuzu yokugqibela, iFrance ibiphantsi koxinizelelo – kodwa abadlali bayo bakwazile ukuxhathisa nokukhusela igowuli abalifumeneyo. Ikwazile kekambe iFrance ukudlala umdlalo ozinzileyo phaya naphaya. Ngoku iza kulinda ephumeleleyo kumdlalo ophakathi kweCroatia neNgilane ngomso. Umdlalo wokugqibela wendebe yehlabathi uya kudlalwa ngeCawe ngentsimbi yesihlanu emalanga eMoscow. 
Belgium: Thibaut Courtois, Jan Vertonghen, Vincent Kompany, Toby Alderweireld, Kevin de Bruyne, Marouane Fellaini, Axel Witsel, Moussa Dembele, Macer Chadli, Eden Hazard, Romelu Lukaku. 
France: Hugo Lloris, Lucas Hernandez, Samuel Umtiti, Raphael Varane, Benjamin Pavard,  Blaise Matuidi, Ngolo Kante, Antonine Griezmann, Paul Pogba, Kylian Mbappe, Olivier Giroud.

headline: Abadlali beqakamba bagxeka amatshijolo aphethe kakubi iCricket South Africa
text:
Iqakamba yaseMzantsi Afrika ineminyaka ngoku iwiza kwiingxaki zolawulo ezingapheliyo. Ziya zibambi ngakumbi izinto, kangangokuba uMzantsi Afrika ungazibhaqa usikwa ngumbutho olawula iqakamba yehlabathi. Kwiveki ephelileyo, abongamele amaphondo nekungabo abathatha izigqibo nebhodi yethutyana ekhoyo, basikhabile isigqibo sokuvumela iCricket South Africa (CSA) ikhokelwe ngabantu abazimeleyo nangona babevumile ngaphambili. 
Ulawulo lweqakamba aluluhlanga eMzantsi Afrika – kodwa iintloko zamaphondo azizimiselanga ukwenza nto elungileyo kuba zisoyika ukuphulukana namandla xa iCSA iphantsi kwabantu abazimeleyo. 
Ukupheqa kweCSA ngomzuzu wokugqibela kumcaphukisile uMphathiswa weZemidlalo, uMnu. Nathi Mthethwa, onethuba elide kakhulu ecenga abaphethe iqakamba ukuba mabenze into elungileyo ukuze kulunge izinto ezigwenxa eza bhentsiswa luphando olwenziwa isebe lakhe lisakhokelwa nguMnu. Fikile Mbalula. 
UMthethwa uxelele isigqeba esiphetheyo ukuba uza kusebenzisa igunya lakhe akubhangise ukusebenza kweCricket SA ukuba asiguquki. Ungenelelo lokuRhulumente lunganyanzela umbutho olawula iqakamba yehlabathi uwenze ikheswa nangona lihambisana nokwenziwa nguMthethwa. 
Abadlali beqakamba bazigxekile izenzo zobutshijolo zabaphethe iqakamba kule veki batsho bexolisa kwiinkampani ezixhasa ngezimali iqela lesizwe. UKhaya Zondo, uDane van Niekerk, uDean Elgar noTemba Bavuma ngabo abavakalise ukungonwabi kwabadlali okubangelwe nguqulukubhode owenziwa ngabalawuli. 
Abadlali bakhaliswa kukwazi ukuba ukungenelela kukaRhulumente, iqakamba iya kulahlekelwa yimali eninzi ngaphezulu kweseyihambe nabaxhasi abafana noMomentum, uStandard Bank noSunflower. Iingxelo zithi iintloko zamaphondo bezibambe iintlanganiso ekuqaleni kwale veki – kodwa khange ziphume nasisombululo. 
Abasemfuthweni wolwazi bathi iMpuma Koloni, iKwaZulu-Natal neLimpopo bezifuna iinguqu – kodwa azikwazanga ukufumana iivoti ezaneleyo ebeziza kubangela kubuye isidima seqakamba yaseMzantsi Afrika. Ulawulo olungekhoyo kwiCSA luchaphazela kakubi iqela lesizwe elibethwe yiPakistan emidlalweni yosuku olunye nakweyeKFC T20 kule nyanga kaTshazimpuzi.

headline: UZungu ungxamele ePortugal
text:
Umdlali wasesiswini kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uBongani Zungu, uthi ukuya kudlala ePortugal izakuba linyathelo elihle njengokuba efuna ukuzakhela ikamva lakhe kwibhola ekhatywayo phesheya kolwandle. 
Lo mdlali uneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithathu, ebesele engqinile ngaphambili ukuba uzakuyishiya iMamelodi Sundowns xa kuphelelwa isivumelwano sakhe sokusebenza ekupheleni kwale sizini. IVictoria Gumarez liqela elisele kuvakele ukuba uzakuzibandakanya nalo uZungu. 
Eli tyendyana belivumile nokuba iSundowns izamile ukulinqanda ukuba lingahambi, kodwa ufuna ukuqhubekeka nebhola ekhatywayo phesheya kolwandle. 
“Ngamatyeli amaninzi apho iSundowns ibizama ukuba mandihlale, kwaye khange ndivume. ISundowns iyayazi ukuba elona phupha lam kukuya kudlala kumazwe aseYurophu,” utshilo uZungu. 
UBen 10, nanjengoko esaziwa uZungu ngabalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo,udlale indima ebonakalayo kwimpumelelo yeli qela kule sizini. Ingakumbi esanzulwini sebala. 
“Ndibona kwaba badlali beqela lesizwe badlala eYurophu ukuba banazo iimpawu eziliqela endizi dingayo nje ngomdlali, ingakumbi ukwakheka kunye nendlela endidlala ngayo nje ngomdlali. 
“Ndifuna kakhulu ukudlala eNgilane, eSpain kunye naseJamani, kodwa ndingathanda ukuqala ePortugal ukulungiselela ukufumana amava. Ndiyibukela kakhulu imidlalo yamaqela asePortugal kwaye maninzi amaqela adlala kwiChampions League, ingaba sisiqalo esihle kum,” uvale ngokutsho uZungu.

headline: iiEastern Aloes ziphumelele “iBrutal”
text:
Iqela laseMpuma Koloni, iiEastern Aloes, liphumelele ngendlela 
encumisayo kumjikelo wesibini kukhuphiswano lweBrutal Fruit Netball Premier league ngempelaveki ngo’50-29 kwiholo iHeartfelt Arena. 
Eli qela, liquka aba badlali: uGS Zanidle Njeza, GA Noluvuyo Nodludlume, WA Nontando Lusaseni, C Arne Rust, WD Nobulele Phuza, GD Zanele Vimbela, GK Zukelwa Cwaba. Eli qela  libhexeshwa ngumqeqeshi uDes Neville, lothuse umzi ngokuthi liziphumelele zozithathu izigaba zalo mdlalo. 
Kwisigaba sokuqala salo mdlalo, ii-Aloes bezikhokela ngamanqaku alishumi elinantathu, xeshikweni iiMpumalanga Sunbirds bezihleli kumanqaku alishumi (13-10). 
Sisigaba sesibini apho iqela lasekhaya ii-Aloes liye lazibonakalisa ukuba lifuna impumelelo ngokuthi liqokelele amanqaku angamashumi amabini anesibhozo (28) kwalishumi elinesixhenxe (17) kwiqela lakwiphondo iMpumalanga, iSunbirds. 
Umdlali othe wabalasela kwii-Aloes, nguZanele Vimbela, ochulumance kakhulu ngempumelelo yeli qela nelithe lagqibezela isigaba sesithathu ngamashumi amane ananye (41) kwangamashumi amabini anesine (24) kwiSunbirds, bawuphumelela lo mdlalo ngo’50-29. 
Le mpumelelo iza emva kokubethwa kumjikelo wokuqala wolu khuphiswano yiKZN Kingdom Stars ngo’46-26. Eli qela lizakuzibona lisenyuka kuluhlu lamaqela alishumi kolu khuphiswano emva kokuzibhaqa lihleli emsileni kumjikelo wokuqala. 
Kwezinye iziphumo 
Sunbirds 28-66 Flames  
Kingdom Stars 35-45 Fireballs 
Southern Stings 35-31 Kingdom Stars Aloes 50-29 Sunbirds 
 Jaguars 65-34 Diamonds  
Flames 55- 44 Crinums 
Diamonds 46-38 Baobabs.

headline: IiChilli-boys zamkela iDikwena eWolfson Stadium
text:
Kulindleke ijule yonke into enayo iChippa United kumdlalo wayo olandelayo ukuze ifumane amanqaku amathathu emva kokuba ingakwazanga ukufumana nelinye inqaku kwimidlalo emibini ye-Absa Premier Soccer League edlulileyo.  
IiChilli-boys zamkela iPlatinum Stars kulo mdlalo wamaqela amabini afuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba isizini ayiphetha ephakathi kwamaqela asibhozo aphambili.  
Umdlalo ophakathi kweChippa neDikwena uza- kudlalelwa eWolfson Stadium ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngoLwesithathu, umhla wenkululeko kweli lizwe loMzantsi Afrika.  
Emva kokubethwa yiSuperSport United nePolokwane City izihlandlo zilandelelana, iChippa kuyanyanzeleka iqokelele amanqaku kulo umdlalo ukuba izimisele ngendawo yesibhozo kwiPSL.  
Idlala neqela elidlala kakuhle futhi eliqeqeshwa nguCavin Johson owaziwa ngobuchule obungumangaliso. 
 Iqela laseMpuma Koloni lakuthi libeke ithemba lalo kubadlali abafana noThamsanqa Sangweni, uJoseph Malongoane, uNkosinathi Mthiyane noAndile Mbenyane.

headline: UKagiso Rabada angaphoswa yimidlalo yovavanyo elandelayo
text:
Omnye wabadlali beqela lezwe loMzantsi Afrika leqakamba, uKagiso Rabada, odume ngokugibisela iqakamba umangalelwe yi-ICC emva kokugila welizwe lase-Australia ngegxalaba. URabada ugile uSteve Smith ngoLwesihlanu ngethuba uMzantsi Afrika uqubisene ne-Australia kumdlalo wesibini wovavanyo obuseSt George’s Park. 
Esi siganeko senzeka kanye phambi kwexesha lokuphumla. Kulindeleke uKagiso Rabada aliphikise ityala elibekiweyo namhlanje xa kuchotshelwa umba wakhe. Kulindeleke iqumrhu elilawula iqakamba lizambe ukujonga ukuba uRabada wamgila ngabom kusini na uSmith ngala mini. UMantsi Afrika ubambe amazinyo ngoba ukuba ityala liyamnamathela uKagiso – lo nto iyakuthetha ukuthi uza kuphoswa yimidlalo elandelayo nelizwe lase-Australia. 
URabada uwis oothinti abahlanu eyedwa kumangeno wokuqala we-Australia kumdlalo okwenzeke kuwo esi sihlo. Lo mdlali weqakamba akaqali ukuba sezintweni ngenxa yezinto ezisondeleyo kule ezithi zimfake engxakini. Abadlali abafana noNathan Lyon, uDavid Warmer noQuinton de Kock bonke bagxizwa ngomdliwo wemali ngenxa yezenzo ezibheke ecaleni.

headline: ABanyana baya kwitumente ye-Afrika
text:
Umqeqeshi obambeleyo weBanyana Banyana, uDesiree Ellis, ubhengeze amagama wabadlali abazakuthi bamele ilizwe kwiWomen’s Africa Cup of Nations ezakube iseCameroon.  
Kweli qela lisingise emantla ezwekazi le Afrika – ubuninzi babadlali abakulo ngabo bathathe inxaxheba kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki ebibanjelwe eRio de Janeiro, eBrazil, kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo.  
“Ndiqinisekile ukuba eli qela lakuthi liwumele ngokukuko uMzantsi Afrika emva kokuqokelela amava kwi-Olimpiki. Xa ingenayo ingxaki, akukho sizathi sakuyilungisa,” utshilo * -Ellis. 
Iqela:  
Oozinti: Andile Dlamini, Yolula Tsawe , Roxanne Barker                                
Abadlali basemva: Leandra Smeda, Nothando Vilakazi, Janine van Wyk (K), Noko Matlou, Astria Boks, Bambanani Mbane, Lebogang Mabatle, Nomathemba Ntsibande                
Esiswini: Mamello Makhabane, Amogelang Motau, Refiloe Jane , Nompumelelo Nyandeni, Silindile Ngubane, Linda Motlhalo                               
Iifolosi: Shiwe Nogwanya, Andisiwe Mgcoyi, Jermaine Seoposenwe, Thembi Kgatlana

headline: Ukuzithemba kuphezulu kwinkampu yeBoks
text:
Umdlali weSpringbok, uFaf de Klerk, uthi kubalulekile ukugxininisa kwindlela abawasebenzisa ngayo amathuba beliqela phambi kokudibana neAustralia kumdlalo weRugby Championship ojongwe ngamehlo abomvu oza kube useNelson Mandela Bay Stadium emalanga ngoMgqibelo.  
Amakhwenkwe kaRassie Erasmus anyathelela phezulu kwaye nokuzithemba kufunqukile emva kokubetha ngo’36-34 iintshatsheli zehlabathi – iNew Zealand.  
Okufunekayo ngoku kukuba abadlali beBoks basebenzise amandla afanayo nalawa babethe ngawo iNew Zealand kutshanje.  
UDe Klerk uthi umoya wabadlali enkampini ubusoloko umhle – kodwa bekukho ukungazithembi ncam phambi kwempumelelo abayifumene eWellington.  
“Leya impumelelo ibabonisile abadlali into abanokuyenza. Siwuphakamisile umdlalo wethu ngoku. Into efunekayo kukuba siye emdlalweni sidlale umdlalo ongcono,” utshilo uDe Klerk. 
Ukubetha iNew Zealand kutshintshe izinto kwiqela lesizwe emva kokungaqhubi kakuhle kwimidlalo emibini. Imeko yeWallabies iyafana neyeBoks ngoba zikhangela iziphumo ezihle emva kokutywatyushwa kwimidlalo egqithileyo.  
Yiyo lo nto eza kwenza umdlalo ube nzima futhi unike umdla kubalandeli bombhoxo. Ukuphumelela kweqela likaRassie kubabuyisile abalandeli ababethande ukulifulathela ngenxa yokungaqhubi kakuhle. 
 “Ngoku isizwe sonke sithembele kuthi. Ukuba singadlala ngokufanayo nomdlalo ogqithileyo, lo nto ingasinceda njengokuba sijonge kwindebe yehlabathi. Siyakwazi ukudala amathuba emidlalweni – kodwa asiwasebenzisi kakuhle. Enye yezinto ezibangela lo nto kukungabikho kwamava kubadlali abathile,” utshilo uDe Klerk. 
Ukudlalela kwayo kude nekhaya iAustralia ziindaba ezimnandi kubadlali bayo ngoba basoloko bephantsi koxinizelelo ekhaya.  
“Ukuba kude eAustralia yinto engasinceda nathi. Eli lithuba lethu lokuhlangana kwakhona,” utshilo uAllan Alaalatoa weWallabies.

headline: Nyati: Ndifuna ibuyele kwiTop 8 iChippa United
text:
I’solezwe lesiXhosa lincokole nomnye wabalandeli abaphambili kwiChilli Boys futhi oyinkokeli yesebe labalandeli awalisungulayo kwilokishi yakhe. Usibalisele ngobomi bakhe njengomlandeli weli qela laseMpuma Koloni. 
Pedro Mapelo: Bhota Mhlekazi, unjani? 
Umlandeli: Kuhle, unjani wena? 
PM: Kuhle nakum. Khawuzichaze ngokufutshane, ungubani? 
Umlandeli: Igama lam ndinguLuvuyo Nyati, usihlalo weChippa United Supporters Branch apha eWalmer, eBhayi. 
PM:  Oh, kulungile. Nceda usixelele, kutheni wena wakhetha iChippa United? 
LUVUYO NYATI: Eeeyi! Ndandingumlandeli weKaizer Chiefs ngaphambili. Kodwa kwathi kwakufika iChippa apha ndaqonda ukuba mandixhase yona kuba ikuphela kwalo iqela elidlala kwiPSL apha eMpuma Koloni nelisondeza imidlalo. Ndiyayithanda nendlela ibhola eyidlala ngayo kakhulu. 
PM:  Uziva njani njengomlandeli weChippa emva kwesizini ka’2016/17? 
LN: Ndiyayincoma inkqubela eyenziwe liqela. Siqhube kakuhle kwiMTN 8 safikelela kwimidlalo ephambi kwamagqibela kankqoyi kwiNedbank Cup okokuqala kwimbali yeChippa United. Iimpazamo ezenziwe liqela ndiyazamkela futhi ndizithatha njengokuba ziyinxalenye yokukhula. Kufuneka sifunde kuzo. 
PM:  Yintoni ongasoze uyilibale ngeqela lakho? 
LN: Ndiyithandile indlela esidlale ngayo neMamelodi Sundowns, siyisokolisile kakhulu – kanti iChippa United iwabethile amaqela amakhulu afana neChiefs, i-Orlando Pirates neSuperSport United. Ndakhathazeka mhla sasibethwa yiCape Town City kodwa. 
PM:  Ulindele ntoni kwisizini ezayo? 
LN: Ndilindele iChippa United ibuyele kwiTop 8 kwisizini ezayo. Enye yezinto endiyinqwenelayo yinkxaso yabantu baseMpuma Koloni bebonke. Likhulu eli phondo, sifuna idolophu nganye ibenalo isebe leChippa. 
PM: Ngubani umdlali omthandayo? 
LN:  NguSandile Zuke. Uyayilwela iChippa ngamaxesha onke kwaye akasiphoxi. Omnye umdlali nguPaseka Mako, ngomnye umdlali odlala kakuhle.

headline: Ertugral: Siphise ngawo umdlalo
text:
Akonwabanga umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMuhsin Ertugral, emva kokuba iqela lakhe linikezele ngomzuzu wokugqibela kumdlalo wangoLwesibini.  
Amabhakaniya abambene nePlatinum Stars ngo’1-1 kumdlalo wePSL e-Orlando Stadium. NguThabiso Kutumela, obekade edlalela iDikwena, ofake igowuli leBucs, elokulinganisa lifakwe nguThobani Kunene ongene kwisiqingatha sesibini somdlalo. Nangona * -Ertugral ethe abadlali bakhe badlale kakuhle – kodwa utshilo ukuba baphise ngawo umdlalo. UCollins Mbesuma ufumene igowuli lakhe lekhulu kwiPSL ngethuba iHighlands Park idlala ngo’1-1 neCape Town City. Yona iMaritzburg United ibethwe yiPolokwane City ngo’1-0. Ngumdlalo wesithathu lo iTeam of Choice ebethwe kuwo.

headline: Uncumile uNomeva oqhekeze uKhongsong obelushica eThekwini!
text:
Uphinde wazibonakalisa uXolisani “Nomeva” Ndongeni ukuba uyenye yeembethimanqindi ezisemgathweni ophezulu eMzantsi Afrika nakwihlabathi lonke. Le ndedeba yakwaBhaca, kodwa ezinze kwiphondo laseGauteng ngokuhlala, iziqaqambise ngethuba ibetha uApinun Khongsong waseThailand walala phantsi engondlalelwanga emlweni we-International Junior Weltereight obuseThekwini kwiveki ephelileyo. Noxa uKhongsong egoduke esophisa – kodwa naye uNomeva uphumelele evile. Akothusanga ukuphumelela kwakhe uNomeva ngoba umlo ufike ewulungele. Indlela azilungiselele ngayo nomsebenzi awenzileyo eqongeni kubonise umntu ozimiseleyo. 
Uyixhaphaze isisu imbethimanqindi yaseThailand yanikezela kumjikelo wesixhenxe watsho wadibanisa amashumi amathathu ananye emilo ayiphumeleleyo uNdongeni njengembethimanqindi ekudidi labahlawulwayo. Impumelelo kaNomeva iza emva kokuba ebethe uReymond Yanong emlweni obuseSandton, eGoli, kwiinyanga ezigqithileyo. Kwikhasi lakhe lonxibelelwano, uNomeva (32) uyibulele inkxaso ayinikwe ngabalandeli nabaqeqeshi bakhe – kodwa wavuma ukuba bekunzima ukulwa noKhongsong. “Bekunzima ukulwa noKhongsong. Ndiyamhlonipha ngoba ebezokulwa apha,” utshilo uNdongeni kuFacebook emva komlo obubekelwe imijikelo elishumi. 
“Sisebenze ngokukhulu ukuzimisela phambi kwalo mdlalo. Bendinako ukudinwa – kodwa ndanyamezela. Ukuwisa uKhongsong yinto ebikwisicwangciso sethu ejimini. Size emlweni simazi kakuhle ukuba uyimbethimanqindi elushica kakhulu. Namhlanje ndizibonile nam ukuba ndiyalwa xa imeko isithi mandilwe. Bendifuna ukubhinqa ibhanti esinqeni sam,” utshilo uNdongeni emva komlo obuququzelelwe yiESPN Africa. Komnye umlo obalulekileyo, uLudumo Lamati ubethe uMark Anthony Geraldo emlweni we-International Featherweight. ULamati umbethe wanaba phantsi uGeraldo wasePhilippine kumjikelo wesine kwitumente ebikwaKwaZulu-Natal. Akukho nto enokubaliswa ngokwenzeke kwimijikelo yokuqala ngoba zombini iimbethimanqindi bezifundana – kodwa uLamati uye waswabuluka kumjikelo wesithathu nowesine.

headline: Kufuneka isebenze nzima iChippa kwimidlalo yayo
text:
Emva kokungakwazi ukuqokelela amanqaku apheleleyo kwimidlalo emibini edlulileyo, iChippa United izibhaqa inyanzelekile ukuba iyiphumelele yonke imidlalo yayo eshiyekileyo ukuba ifuna ukubethelela indawo yayo kwiTop 8.  
Eli qela leMpuma Koloni lidlale ntanganye ngeqanda macala neBloemfontein Celtic kumdlalo obuseDr Molemela Stadium ngoLwesibini wale veki.  
Lo mdlalo ulandela omnye iChippa edlale ntanganye kuwo ngo’1-1 neAjax Cape Town kutshanje eBhayi.  
Okwangoku iChippa, isengaphakathi kwiTop 8 ngamanqaku angamashumi amathathu anesihlanu – kodwa ingxaki ejongene nayo kukuba mane amaqela afuthela emagxeni kuyo futhi anokuyityhalela ezantsi ukuba ayaphumelela, yona xa ingayiphumeleli eyayo imidlalo.  
Isizini ephelileyo yaphela abantu baseMpuma Koloni bebambe izibilini ngenxa yokungaqhubi kakuhle kweChippa. 
IChippa iyibeke yacaca injongo yayo kule sizini: ifuna ukubethelela indawo yayo kwiTop 8. Ingenzeka lo nto nakubeni ilahle amanqaku kwimidlalo emibini.  
Kule mpelaveki, iiChilli Boys zamkela iSuperSport United engeza kuyo ikelemile kumdlalo weAbsa Premier Soccer League ozakube useSisa Dukashe Stadium.  
Kunyanzelekile abadlali beChippa bakhuphe onke amandla wabo kulo mdlalo wangempelaveki ukuba bafuna impumelelo, kungenjalo, iqela lingazibhaqa lisilwela ukusinda ezembeni kwakhona. 
 Amatsatsantsa a Pitori akaqhubanga kakuhle kwimidlalo yawo eliqela kule sizini, kodwa izinto zingajika ngoba engafuni ukuzibhaqa ethotyiselwa.  
UKaitano Tembo kunyanzelekile aze eMonti eneqhinga lokunqanda iifolosi zeChippa eziyingozi ezifana noMxolisi Macuphu noLinda Mntambo. 
KwangoMgqibelo njalo, iMamelodi Sundowns kulindeleke ukuba iqinisekise ukuba iyayithatha indebe yePSL kule mpelaveki xa isamkela iAjax Cape Town kumdlalo ongentsimbi yesithathu emalanga eLucas Moripe Stadium. Wona Amakhosi aza kuzama ukulungisa izinto xa edibana neMaritzburg United emva kokubethwa yiGolden Arrows ngo’2-0 ekuqaleni kwale veki. Omabini la maqela azakube esilwela indawo yesithathu kwimidlalo yawo eshiyekileyo. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
NgoMgqibelo: Golden Arrows vs Platinum Stars @Princess Magogo Stadium, 15:00; Baroka FC vs Bloemfontein Celtic @Peter Mokaba Stadium, 15:00; Free State Stars vs Polokwane City @Goble Park Stadium, 15:00; Cape Town City vs Orlando Pirates @Cape Town City, 15:00; Bidvest Wits vs AmaZulu FC @Bidvest Wits Stadium, 15:00

headline: Ulambele indebe umdlali weDowns
text:
Kwitumente yalo nyaka yeTelkom Knockout kuza kudibana oomakad’ezondana, iMamelodi Sundowns neencutshe kwiindebe kweli loMzantsi Afrika – iKaizer Chiefs.  
Kumdlalo wedabi labakhaya basePitoli, iSundowns ivuthulule iSuperSport United, iintshantsheli zonyaka ophelileyo ebezikhusela, ngamagowuli amathathu onke kweli jwi.  
Amakhosi wona aphumelele nzima kwipenela emva kokudlala ntanganye imizuzu engaphaya kwekhulu.  
Phambi kwale midlalo abantu abaninzi bebeneminqweno yokuba iqela elithile inga lingadibana nelithile kumdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi – kodwa yena uTeko Modise uthi nokuba ibiyiPirates abebezakudlala nayo kuyafana. 
Eli qela laseChloorkop liza kudlala neChiefs likwisimo esihle kakhulu ngoba liqhuba kakuhle emidlalweni yayo.  
Naye uModise uthi beyiSundowns bayawuvuyela lo mdlalo baza kuwudlala neChiefs. “Sonwabe kakhulu kukufikelela kwethu kumdlalo wokugqibela weTKO..sidlala umdlalo oncomekayo kwaye sifumana iziphumo ezihle.  
Xa mna ndingadlali ndinika inkxaso abo badlalayo ngoba sisebenzela into enye – impumelelo.  
Nokuba besidlala neliphi kula maqela makhulu bekungazubakho mahluko,” utshilo uModise kwikhasi lomnatha lakhe izolo.

headline: AmaZulu afundiswe ibhola simahla yiBidvest Wits enkundleni yawo
text:
Azikhotha amanxeba AmaZulu emva kokuvuthululwa yiBidvest Wits ngamagowuli amathathu eqandeni (3-0) emdlalweni wePSL obumhle eKing Zwelithini Stadium ebusuku namhlanje. Intliziyo kaGavin Hunt idada emafutheni, hayi kuba iqela lakhe lifundise AmaZulu ibhola simahla – kodwa ngenxa yendlela elidlale ngayo kakuhle nebelibukhali ngayo iqela lakhe phambi kweepali. Emva kokuba iqokelele amanqaku amathathu, ngoku iWits ithe ngcu phezulu kwiPSL isusa iMamelodi Sundowns ebethe iSuperSport United ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni emalanga namhlanje. Iqela likaCavin Johnson lenze iimpazamo ezininzi kakhulu emdlalweni noxa likwazile ukudlala ibhola engcono kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. 
UHunt ufake abadlali bakhe abatsha abaquka uZitha Macheke obedlalela iChippa United kwisizini egqithileyo noSameehg Doutie owayefudula edlalela iAjax Cape Town. Impazamo eyenziwe nguNhlanhla Vilakazi noThemba Sikhakhane emva inike uTerrance Dzukummanja ithuba elihle lokufaka ibhola emnatheni. Igowuli lesibnini lifakwe nguDeon Hotto. Lona elesithathu igowuli lifakwe nguThulani Hlatshwayo ongqube ibhola ebigotywe ngobuchule nguKeegan Ritchie. Abadlali baMaZulu bazamile ukubuyela emdlalweni kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo – kodwa ngelo ixesha iWits ibisele ivingce wonke amazibuko. 
 ‪ 
AmaZulu: Josephs, Sikhakane, Mabiliso, Khumalo, T.Gumede, Vilakazi, Ncube, Sithebe, Maduna, De Jong, Ntuli. 
Amalalela: Mbatha, Gumede, Modisakeng, Darpoh, Magaqa, Chawaphihwa, Majoro. 
Bidvest Wits: Petersen, Hlatshwayo, Monare, Hotto, Mkhwanazi, Alexander, Doutie, Macheke, Ritchie, Macuphu, Dzvukamanja. 
Amalalela: Mhlongo, Johannes, Pelembe, Domingo, Scott, Motupa, Lark.

headline: UScarra Ntubeni ubaxelele ngokubaluleka kwezemidlalo abantwana baseQunu
text:
Umdlali wombhoxo weSpringbok, uScarra Ntubeni,, ubashiye namazwi enkuthazo abantwana bezikolo zaseQunu, eMthatha. Le ndedeba, edlalela iqela lombhoxo laseNtshona Koloni, iStormers, ibihamba negqiza likaMTN neSpringbok ebelityelele eMbekela High Schol neN.Z. Mtirara High School – apho liphise ngezikipha zokudlala umbhoxo, ibhola ekhatywayo nomnyazi. UNtubeni, oyinzalelwane yaseQonce kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni, ubongoze ulutsha lwaseQunu – apho kwazalelwa khona owayenguMongame wokuqala omnyama uNelson Rholihlahla Mandela, ukuba lubambelele kwezemidlalo ngoba zihambelana ncamashi nemfundo. Akuxelele abafundi ubaqinisekisile ukuba kukona okumqinisileyo kuhambo lwakhe embhoxweni ukusukela ngo-2011 – unyaka awaqala ngawo ukudlalela iStormers neWestern Privince. 
“Abantwana banawo umnqweno wokuphumelela ebomini babo,” uvule ngalo mazwi uNtubeni. “Kodwa abanye baye batyhafiswe zizinto ezifana nokuba kufuneka ufunde kwindawo ethile ukuze ufikelele kwiindawo ezithile. Ngokufika kwabantu abafana nam apha ndifuna ukubaxelela ukuba nam ndiphuma kwiindawo ezinje,” utshilo. UNtubeni ubalule izizathu ezibangela afune ulutsha lubambelele kwezemidlalo. “Ndifuna ukuthi ebantwini abatsha mabaqhubele phambili nemizamo yabo. Nokuba abafikelelanga kwinqanaba eliphezulu kwezemidlalo ngoba zona zingabavulela iminyango kwizinto ezifana nemfundo. Mabahambele kude kwiziyobisi nakwizinto ezifana notywala. 
“Yandisebenzela lo nto mna. Ndandidlala nabantu ababhetele kum – kodwa bona batyhafa endleleni. Ezemidlalo zikufundisa izinto ezininzi ngobomi. Enye into ufunda nendlela yokusebenza nabantu, ukuphatha abantu nokuhlonipha. Zizinto endizifunde embhoxweni ezo endizisebenzisa nasebomini bam. Ngoku nokuba kunzima – kodwa ndiyakwazi ukunyamela ngoba isilo lam ndilibeka kwiziphumo zento endiyenzayo,” utshilo uNtubeni. Ngokokutsho kukaMaria Soars Van Niekerk, uMTN unephulo lokujikeleza iphondo lonke njengoko ezama ukusabela iingxaki zabantu abasebenzisa iingcingo zamaza wenkampani yabo.

headline: AmaBhokobhoko aya etshatshalazeni notshaba olukhulu eTwickenham
text:
Iqela lesizwe lombhoxo, AmaBhokobhoko, linethuba elihle lokusonga utyelelo lwaseYurophu ngendlela encomekayo. Oku kulandela umsebenzi omhle eliwenzileyo ngethuba liguqisa phantsi iWales ngo’23-18 (emdlalweni wokugabula izigcawu) neScotland ngo’30-15 emdlalweni obuseMurrayfield kwimpelaveki egqithileyo. Nangona iqela likaSiya Kolisi beluphantsi koxinizelelo emdlalweni ogqithileyo  – kodwa liphumelele ekugqibeleni ngenxa kaMakazole Mapimpi olele emgceni amatyeli amabini. Njengokuba AmaBhokobhoko esonga utyelelo lwaseYurophu, kulindeleke ukuba kudlane iintsimbi xa edibana neNgilane emdlalweni wokugqibela eTwickenham ngoMgqibelo. INgilane lutshaba olukhulu loMzantsi Afrika embhoxweni wehlabathi. 
Okwenza kubekho uchatha ngoku kukuba amakhwenkwe kaJacques Nienaber athatha indebe yehlabathi emva kokubetha amaNgesi ngonyaka ka-2019, eYokohama, eJapan. Lo nto iyodwa, iza kwenza AmaNgesi aye emdlalweni engonyame kakhulu. Ngaphandle kokubetha iNew Zealand, iWales neScotland emidlalweni elandelelanayo kulo nyaka, kuninzi okuza kudlalelwa nguMzantsi Afrika ngoba ufuna ukuvala unyaka uhleli kwindawo yokuqala kumanqwanqwa ehlabathi. UNienaber uthe uHandre Pollard, uCobus Reinach noLood de Jager ngabanye babadlali abaza kuqala umdlalo eTwickenham. Noxa umdlalo ungeke ubelula – kodwa uMzantsi Afrika uya kuwo uzithembile emva kokubetha amazwe alushica. 
“Senze umsebenzi oncomekayo emidlalweni esibethe kuyo iWales neScotland. Okubalulekileyo ngoku kukuqinisekisa ukuba sidlala ngokuzimisela xa sidibana neNgilane. Yiyo lo nto sigqibe kwelokuba senze iinguqu ezintathu qha. AmaNgesi aza kudlala umdlalo owahlukileyo kwegqithileyo,” utshilo uNienaber olindele umdlalo onzima. “Iza kuza kuthi ikelemile iNgilane ngoba isebenzisa abadlali beBritish $Irish Lions. Nangona kunjalo, siya emdlalweni sikhuthazekile kwaye sifuna ukuhlala kwindawo yokuqala ehlabathini. INgilane inabadlali basemva abanamandla – kodwa kwangaxeshanye, iyakwazi ukuya phambili ihlasele. Sinethuba siwenza amalungiselelo. Okwethu kukuqinisekisa ukuba siwulungele kakuhle umdlalo siwasebenzise kakuhle amathuba avelayo emdlalweni wovavanyo ofana nalo siya kuwo,” utshilo umqeqeshi.

headline: Kuthe nco ezintliziyweni zaMabhakaniya emva kokubetha iChiefs emdlalweni weDiski Challenge!
text:
Kuthathe imizuzu engamashumi asibhozo anesihlanu yonke ukuze kubekho iqela eliphumelelayo emdlalweni wedabi laseSoweto kwiDiski Challenge namhlanje eDobsonville Stadium. Kuthe nco entliziyweni zabalandeli be-Orlando Pirates emva iqela labo libethe iKaizer Chiefs ngegowuli elinye eqandeni emdlalweni obumhle ngale njikalanga yanamhlanje. Igowuli ephumelele ngalo iPirates lifakwe nguSimiso Bophela kwisiqingatha sesibini somdlalo. UShaun Bartlett ebengumqeqe weChiefs edlala kwiDiksi Challenge namhlanje ngoba u-Arthur Zwane uncedisa uMolefi Ntseki kwiqela lesizwe eliza kuqubisana neSudana emdlalweni ohlahla indlela eya kwi-Afcon ngomso e-Orlando Stadium. Ikwazile ukusilawula isiqingatha sokuqala iChiefs – kodwa ayikwazanga ukufaka ibhola emnatheni. Amakhosi adlale umdlalo omhle – kodwa iBucs ebingenalo ulwamvila, izamile ukuyithintela iChiefs ebifuna ukufaka igowuli. 
 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphuma kungekho qela elibhalisileyo ebhodini. AmaBhakaniya anyuse igiya kwisigaba sesibini. Unozinti weChiefs, uBontle Molefe, ebexakeke ngaphezulu kukaKopano Thutsane wePirates. Abadlali abathe badlala kakuhle kwiPirates emdlalweni wanamhlanje baquka uBophela, uKagiso Mmadisha noSizwe Jaca. Kanti kwiChiefs bekukho uNkosingiphile Ngcobo odlale umdlalo wonke emva kokukhonkxwa kukonzakala ixesha elide, uNjabulo Blom noDarrel Matsheke oye wachongwa njengomdlali oqaqambileyo emdlalweni. Impumelelo yanamhlanje ithathe iBucs yayibeka kwindawo yesithathu kwiDiski Challenge. Kule isizini yeDiski Challenge, iBucs iqokelele amashumi amabini anesixhenxe emidlalweni elishumi elinesine. Phezulu kuhleli iMamelodi Sundowns ebethe iSuperSport United ngo’6-3, emva kwayo yiBidvest Wits. Umqeqeshi wePirates, uGlen Salmon, uvuye kakhulu emva komdlalo watsho esithi abadlali bakhe benze kanye into ebifuneka emdlalweni. 
 
Chiefs: Bontle Molefe, Darrel Matsheke, Khumbulani Ncube, Kefiloe Mojaki, Wandy Khwinana, Tshepo Myeni, Nkosingiphile Ngcobo, Njabulo Blom, Lebohang Lesako, Yaseen Buting, Keletso Sifama.
