Pirates: Kopano Thutsane, Siyabonga Buda, Thabiso Sesane,Katlego Ramonyai, Sizwe Jaca, Lehlohonolo Mofokeng, Bonisile Mbangwa, Kagiso Madisha, Lehlohonolo Sepeng, Sifiso Luthuli, Simiso Bophela.

headline: UBarker ufuna iphephe izembe iStellenbosch
text:
Akakwazi ukuwuvala umlomo uSteve Barker emva kokuphumelela kweqela lakhe imidlalo emithathu ilandelelana emva kokusokola ixesha elide.  
IStellenbosch ibethe iPolokwane City ngo1-0 emdlalweni weAbsa Premiership kwimpelaveki egqithileyo eCape Town City.  
Kanti phambi kodlulileyo umdlalo, iStellenbosch ibethe iHighlands Park ngo’4-1 komnye yabetha iBaroka FC ngo’1-0.  
Impumelelo yeqela likaBarker emidlalweni emithathu ilithathe yalibeka kwindawo yesibhozo.  
“Amanqaku amathandathu siwafumene emva kokuphumelela imidlalo emibini. Ngoku sidinga amanye amanqaku kweminye imidlalo emithathu ukuze siqinisekise indawo yethu kwiPSL,” utshilo uBarker emva komdlalo.  
Ngethuba iStellenbosch ingaqhubi kakuhle bekukho uloyiko lokuthotyiselwa kwayo kodwa umqeqeshi uthi zange abenalo uvalo nakanye.  
“Zange kwabakho mntu othetha ngokundigxotha.   
Iqela landithemba ukusukela ngomhla wokuqala. Ngoku sikwindawo yesibhozo futhi sinamanqaku amathandathu asahlulayo neqela elisemsileni,” utshilo uBarker.

headline: IFree State Stars ikrazule iintliziyo zeSiwelele
text:
IFree State State iphumelele gqathu idabi lobukhaya lakwiphondo laseFree State ngethuba idlala neBloemfontein Celtic kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League ngempela veki.  
Igowuli elihle elifakwe nguLucky Mohomi kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo lilo elinike iFree State Stars impumelelo ka’1-0 kumdlalo obumhle ngeyona ndlela eGoble Park Stadium. 
Ibethe iCeltic eyingqongqo yamaqela adlala kwiPSL mva nje engaphumelelanga phantse yonke imidlalo emihlanu phantsi komqeqeshi ofike ekupheleni konyaka ophelileyo, uSerame Letsoaka.  
Ngumdlalo wesibini lo iStars iwuphumelela phantsi kwalo mqeqeshi wayo mtsha, osuka kwilizwe lase-Italy. Yona iCeltic ibethwe ityeli lesithathu ngoku elandelelana emva kokubethwa kwiveki ephelileyo yiKaizer Chiefs enkundleni yayo ngo’1-0. Ilwe kwamdaka isali iFree State noxa bekungelulanga ukumelana nabadlali beCeltic abadlala ibhola ebalekayo nabanobuchule bokudlala ibhola.  
ULetsoaka, umqeqeshi weCeltic, ucule iculo elinye nelo alicule kwimidlalo yangaphambili – ukuyekwa kwamathuba ngabadlali bakhe. Abadlali abafana noNyatama, uMassa noLamola bazamile ukuqhekeza udonga lweFree State amatyeli aliqela kodwa boyiswa.  
Umqeqeshi weFree State State, indoda efikayo kweli lizwe ebizwa ngokuba nguGiovanni Solinas, uwavuyele amanqaku amathathu kodwa wabe evuma kwangaxeshanye ukuba bekunzima kakhulu.  
“Ndonwabile kakhulu, ndibukhathazeka yindlela esiqhube ngayo kwezinye iindawo – kodwa ndixoliswe kakhulu yindlela esidlale ngayo phaya ngasemva,” utshilo uGiovanni. 
Njengokuba la maqela edlale kakhulu kulo mdlalo, ngoonozinti bamacala omabini abathe benza umahluko kakhulu. UDaouda Diakite, unozinte weFree State, nguye ochongwe njengoyena mdlali obaleseleyo kulo mdlalo ngenxa yomsebenzo omkhulu awenze kuzo zozibini izigaba.

headline: Izigidi zeerandi kumnyhadala wetolofiya
text:
YIMALI ebalelwa kwizigidi ngezigidi zeerandi ebekelwe bucala lisebe lezeMidlalo, uLonwabo, ubuGcisa neNkcubeko eMpuma Koloni ukuxhasa umnyhadala obanjelwa eTinarha iPrickly Pear Festival. 
Itolofiya, iPrickly Pear ngesiNgesi, ikhula ngendlela emangalisayo eTinarha kwaye uluntu lwale dolophu luyaxhamla kuqoqosho lwetolofiya. 
KwiPrickly Pear Festival, ebekungekacaci ukuba iza kubanjwa nini eTinarha, kuye konwatywe ngomculo, oonobuhle, ukhuphiswano ngokupheka, iimoto ezibaleka ngesantya esixhomisa amehlo nokunye. 
Iinjongo zalo mnyhadala kukukhulisa ingxowa-mali yokugcina amaziko embali (museums) amathathu aseTinarha esemgangathweni. 
Kwintetho malunga nomgaqonkqubo wesebe lakhe kwiveki ephelileyo, uMphathiswa uPemmy Majodina uthi lo mnyhadala waseTinarha liqonga lokukhuthaza ukwakhiwa kwesizwe kwakunye nobunye. 
Noxa nje bekungekacaci ukuba yimalini ncakasana eza kutyalwa lisebe kulo mnyhadala, kodwa uMajodina uvakalise ukuba imali engaphaya kwezigidi ezisixhenxe zeerandi (R7.7 million) ibekelwe bucala ukujongana namaziko okugcinwa kwembali (museum) kweli leMpuma Koloni kunyakamali ka2018/19. 
“Isebe liza kusebenzisana nebhodi yeziko lembali (museum) yaseTinarha ukuphakamisa igama lalo mnyhadala ngenyanga yenkululeko uTshazimpuzi ka2018,” utshilo uMajodina. 
Itolofiya sisiqhamo esimuncu-buncasa, maxa wambi sibencasa egqibeleleyo. Siyonwabeleka xa usitya noxa nje siye sisokolise ngokuthi sifune ukukhuhlwa ufazane lwameva phambi kokuba usitye. 
Ngokwentetho yasezilalini, kukho itolofiya yesilungu (leyo ineziqhamo ezikhulu futhi ezinameva angephi iphinde ibenamanzi anencasa) kuphinde kubekho leyo yesiXhosa (leyo encinane ngokweziqhamo, imuncu-buncasa iphinde ibenameva 
aliqela. 
USinazo Ntsonge weYunivesithi iRhodes phantsi kwezifundo zezoqoqosho nolondolozo-ndalo kunyaka ophelileyo wenze uphando-sifundo ngendlela uluntu lwaseTinarha oluthi lwenze intshukumo kuqoqosho lwabo ngokuvuna, ukuthutha nokuthengisa itolofiya. 
Ngokophando-sifundo lukaNtsonge, abantu abavuna itolofiya eTinarha bayakwazi ukwenza imali engangewaka leerandi (R1 000) ngenyanga, ze abo bayithengisayo 
benze imali ekwiwaka elinesiqingatha (R1 500) ngenyanga, logama abo bayithuthayo besenza imali ephakathi kwamashumi asibhozo eerandi (R80) ukuya kumakhulu amane anamashumi asibhozo (R480) ngosuku.

headline: Ngumdliva wamanqindi ngorhatya lwangomso eMonti
text:
Abalandeli bamanqindi baza kufumana omnye umdliva wamanqindi ngempelaveki. Yimilo emihlanu yoorhasatsha beembethimanqindi eza konwatyelwa eMonti ngorhatya ngoLwesihlanu kwitumente eququzelelwa yinkampani yabathelekisi, iXaba Boxing Promotions. Umlo ophambili uphakathi kukaPhumelela Cafu walapha eMzantsi Afrika noBen Mananquil wasePhilipines. La madoda mabini aza kube esilwela intshinga engenamntu yeWBA Junior Bantamweight. Umlo kulindeleke utake iintlantsi ngoba uCafu yindoda ebetha izinto eziwayo. Emilweni esibhozo ayilwileyo, uyiphumelele kakuhle kakhulu futhi ungqengqise amadoda afana noHamza Mchanjo, uDalisizwe Komani noThandolwethu Nkwenteni. 
Nakubeni uMananquil engeyiyo indoda engadelelwa – kodwa uya emlweni wangempelaveki efuna impumelelo ngoba wabethwa emlweni wangonyaka ka-2019 nguYuki Kobayashi. Intshinga engenamntu inika iimbethimanqindi zombini ithuba elihle lokuxwaya ibhanti elitsha. Kolandelayo uGideon Buthelezi waKwaZulu-Natal uza kudibana noDave Apolanario wasePhilippines kwintshinga ye-IBO Flyweight. UButhelezi yintshatsheli eyaziwayo kwaye yenye yeembethimanqindi ezibalaseleyo eMzantsi Afrika. Kwakufuneka uDave azimisele kakhulu ukuze amoyise uButhelezi endaweni ayiqhelileyo njengeMonti. Emilweni engamashumi amabini anesithathu, uButhelezi ubethwe kahlanu. 
Kanti yena uDave uqhayisa ngoba zange wabethwa kwinqanaba leembethimanqindi ezihlawulwayo. Omnye umlo oza kuba nomtsalane ebantwini uphakathi kuka-Ayanda Ndulani noSiphamandla Baleni xa bexikixana kwi-IBO Mini-Fly weight. UNcedo Cecane uza kudibana noMzolisi Yoyo emlweni wokucweya. Kanti komnye umlo, uMpumelelo Thabalala uza kukhusela intshinga yeSA Junior flyweight kuSikho Moshani waseDuncan Village. Abaphathi beXaba Promotions basingatha le tumente ngelizama ukubhiyozela ubomi begqala lomzabalazo, uRholihlahla Nelson Mandela. Iingcango zeholo (East London ICC) ziza kuvulwa ngentsimbi yesixhenxe ngorhatya ngoLwesihlanu.

headline: Umqeqeshi weBrazil uhlomla ngokwenzeke emdlalweni wayizolo
text:
Indebe yehlabathi yalo nyaka inomahluko kunezinye. Amazwe amakhulu ekujongwe kuwo kakhulu ngabantu asokole kwimidlalo yawo yokuqala. Lo nto inokuwabeka emngciphekweni ukuba izinto aziguquki kwimidlalo elandelayo. NgoLwesihlanu weveki ephelileyo, iSpain sibanjwe yiPortugal ngo’3-3, i-Argentina ibanjwe ngobhongwane yi-Icelannd kumdlalo ophele ngo’1-1, iintshatsheli ezikhuselayo (iGermany) yothuswe yiMexico ngo’1-0 kumdlalo obutshisa bhe – kanti yona iBrazil isokoliswe yiSwitzerland kumdlalo obunzima ophele ngo’1-1. Zingene izixhiliphithi zaseBrazil zikhokelwa nguNeymar. Njengelizwe eliphumelele indebe yehlabathi izihlandlo esihlanu – iBrazil ingene ebaleni inoxinizelelo kuba kulindelwe ukuba iyibethe lula iSwitzerland. Akubanganjalo nakubeni iBrazil idlale umdlalo ongcono kune Switzerland. 
 
Iqhube kakuhle iBrazil kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. Abadlali bayo bakwazile ukuyiqhekeza iSwitzerland ebithe finini emva. Kumzuzu wamashumi amabini uPhilipe Coutinho uzibonakalisile ukuba ungumdlali ophokeleyo ngokufaka igowuli ekude. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iSwitzerland ifuthela emagxeni weBrazil – kodwa khange ikwazi ukubhalisa ebhodini. Izinto zijikile kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Abadlali beSwitzerland bayibeke phantsi koxinizelelo iBrazil yade yavula. Igowuli lokulinganisa lamaSwiss ifakwe nguStephen Zuber – ongqube ibhola ngentloko eyedwa – kodwa emva kokubonakala etyala umdlali weBrazil wasemva uMiranda. 
 
Umqeqeshi weBrazil, uTite, akayithandanga into eyenzeke kuMiranda kwaye ucinga ukuba usompempe wenze impazamo. “Into eyenzeke kuMiranda icacile. Singaxoxa ngepenela esingayinikwanga – kodwa yona le kaMiranda icacile. UMiranda uthe utshoviwe. Ndithe kuye kulungile ngoku angawanga wanga ngoba ibiza kubonakala ngolunye uhlobo ebantwini,” utshilo uTite. 
Kumdlalo wayizolo, iSwitzerland ibonisile ukuba akukho lizwe eliza kunyathela phezu kwayo nangona ingakwazanga ukudala amathuba acacileyo emdlalweni ngaphezulu kweBrazil.  
  
BRAZIL: Allisson, Thiago Sliva, Miranda, Casemiro, Gabriel Jesus, Neymar, Philippe Coutinho, Marcelo, Danilo, Paulinho, Willian. 
SWITZERLAND: Yann Sommer, Stephan Lichtsteiner, Manuel Akanji, Haris Seferovic, Granit Xhaka, Valon Behrami, Ricardo Rodriguez, Steven Zuber,  Blerim Dzemaili, Fabian Schaer, Xherdan Shaqiri.

headline: UMzantsi Afrika usungula amalungiselelo weNetball World Cup
text:
Kwisithuba seminyaka emibini ezayo, isixeko saseKapa siza kusingatha itumente yehlabathi yebhola yomnyazi (2023 Netball World Cup). Iza kuba kokokuqala uMzantsi Afrika usingatha itumente yowona mdlalo omkhulu wamanenekazi – kodwa iya kuba kokwesithathu usingatha itumente yehlabathi. UMphathiswa weZemidlalo, uMnu. Nathi Mthethwa, uqale amalungiselelo ngokubhengeza amagama wabantu abangamalungu wekomiti eza kuququzelela itumente nathe kufuneka kufuneka ingaze ilibaleke ezimbalini. 
UMzantsi Afrika unawo amava wokusingatha iitumente ezinkulu emva kokusingatha itumente yombhoxo ngo’95 neyebhola ekhatywayo ngo-2010, eyothusa abantu abaninzi ababe yithandabuza iAfrika. Abonyuliweyo baquka uCecilia Molokwane, uBlanche de la Guerre, uSumayya Khan, uJP Smith, uLyndon Bouah noPatience Shikwambana weSascoc oza kuba yintloko yekomiti. Abo ngabantu ekufuneka baqinisekise ukuba uMzantsi Afrika awulidanisi ihlabathi. 
“UMzantsi Afrika uyaziwa jikelele ngokusingatha iitumente ezinkulu. Kufuneka siqhubele phambili nokwenza njalo. Sizimisele ukwenza itumente (yethu) yomnyazi ibe yeyona ihlala ezingqondweni zabantu naphakade,” utshilo uMthethwa ethetha ePitoli. Abaphethe ibhola yomnyazi banethemba lokuba iNdebe yeHlabathi iya kukhuthaza abantu abaninzi ukuze bayibone njengomdlalo obafaneleyo. 
“Sizimisele ukukhuthaza amanenekazi ukuze awubone umnyazi njengomnye wemidlalo emikhulu kwihlabathi ngokuzisa itumente yehlabathi kubo,” utshilo uMphathiswa. Konke oku kwenzeka kakuhle umnyazi ukhula ngendlela encomekayo eMzantsi Afrika. Kwiveki ephelileyo, uMzantsi uphumelele indebe yeSPAR Challenge Tri-Nations emva kokubetha i-Uganda ngo’44-32. 
Nangona uDerette Badenhorst (umqeqeshi) esebenzise abadlali abatsha kuba bengafumanekanga abadlala eYurophu – kodwa iqela lakhe lenze umsebenzi oncomekayo ngokuphumelela imidlalo emithandathu yonke. “Kube kuhle ukubona italente esinayo kweli lizwe. Abanye abadlali abatsha baza kudlala kwiNdebe yeHlabathi (2023 World Cup),” utshilo uBadenhorst, emva kwetumente ebiquke neNamibia.

headline: Kufike ixesha lokukhula kuDoctor Khumalo
text:
Kwiveki ephelileyo kuvakele iindaba ezithi uDoctor Khumalo uyinikela umva iKaizer Chiefs. Ezi ndaba zamkelwe ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo ngabalandeli bebhola – ingakumbi abalandeli beChiefs.  
UKhumalo, 50, uye kwiBaroka FC phambi kwesizini entsha emva kokusebenzela iChiefs iminyaka engaphezulu kwamashumi amathathu.  
UDoctor ‘16V’ Khumalo wafika kwiChiefs ekupheleni koo-1980 esemncinci, wakhulela kuyo, wayikhokela njengokapteni wagqibela ngokuba lisekela-mqeqeshi. Emva kokuncedisa abaqeqeshi abafana noVladimir Vemerzovic, uStuart Baxter kwiChiefs – eli lixesha lokuba uKhumalo akhule njengomqeqeshi.  
Bekungekho thuba licacileyo lokukhula kwiChiefs ngoba yile isoloko ikhangela abaqeqeshi abanamava. 
Ukuya kwiBaroka FC engekazinzi kwaPSL kwenza ixhala – kodwa yeyona ndawo anokuthi atyale kuyo ulwazi, kukwalapho anokwenza khona umahluko ocacileyo.  
Kulo nyaka uKhumalo ufince amashumi amahlanu eminyaka, lo nto ithetha ukuthi bekufanele ukuba kudala esebenza njengomqeqeshi ozimeleyo xa ethelekiswa namadoda afana noDan Malesela, uSteve Komphela, * -Eric Tinkler, uClinton Larsen noBenni McCarthy abangabaqeqeshi kwinqanaba eliphezulu. 
NgoLwesine weveki ephelileyo, uKhuma waqeshwa njengomqeqeshi owongameleyo kwicandelo lezebhola kwiBaroka. Esi sisikhundla esingaphezulu kwesokuqeqesha futhi sesona sinika iqela umkhomba-ndlela.  
“UKaizer Motaung ukusikelele ukuhamba kwam kwaye ndivuya kakhulu. Andifuni ke abantu bathethe izinto ezingekhoyo – akukho nto yenzekileyo phakathi kwam neChiefs,” utshilo uKhumalo. 
Le ndedeba iyibethelele ke into ethi ayiyi kwiBaroka kuba ifuna ukungena endaweni kaKgoloko Thobejane. Eli lithuba lokuzibonakalisa kuKhumalo.  
“UDoctor weza kum ezokuthetha ngekamva lakhe neminqweno anayo. Saxoxa ke ngalo nto; savumelana ngokumkhulula ukuze kube kokufezekiswa kweminqweno yakhe. Sizimisele ukumamkela kwakhona ukuba izinto azimhambeli kakuhle,” watsho uMotaung.

headline: UTembo uzingomba isifuba ngabadlali bakhe emva kwesibhaxu sePirates
text:
Umqeqeshi weSuperSport United, uKkaitano Tembo, uzingomba isifuba ngomsebenzi owenziwe ngabadlali bakhe abasakhulayo nangona iqela lakhe libethiwe emdlalweni ebeseliwufumene. Amatsatsantsa a Pitori, abethwe ngamagowuli amathathu kwamabini yiPirates, aphise ngomdlalo weDStv Premiership sele usesandleni izolo e-Orlando Stadium. UKegan Johannes ubhakuzelise umnatha emzuzwini wesine kwisigaba sokuqala. Elesibini lifakwe nguGamphani Jones Lungu emzuzwini weshumi elinesibhozo. Phambi kokusongwa kwesigaba sokuqala, iPirates ifumene iipenela ezimbini ezifakwe emnatheni nguDeon Hotto. 
Akubangakho qela elikwazileyo ukusebenzisa amathuba avele emdlalweni kwade kwaphela imizuzu engamashumi alithoba omdlalo. Kuthe xa umdlalo ungena kwixesha elongezwe ngusompempe, uGoodman Mosele utsale intambula yebhola ethe qelele yayohlala emnatheni. Ngalo ndlela, iPirates ifumene amanqaku amathathu – kodwa isahleli kwindawo yesine. Iqela likaKaitano Tembo lilahlekelwe ngumdlalo ngexesha elibi ngenxa yeempazamo ezimbini ezenziwa ngabadlali endaweni embi. Ubakhusele kodwa umqeqeshi abadlali bakhe ngelithi kuninzi okuncomekayo abuye nako emdlalweni. “Isiqalo sethu besisihle kakhulu,” utshilo uTembo ethetha noSuperSport TV emva lkomdlalo. 
“Sikwazile ukuyicinezela iPirates yade yenza iimpazamo eziqandusele amagowuli. Kuba nzima kodwa xa izigqibo zikasompempe zisoloko zibetha icala elinye. Kwenzeke lo nto emdlalweni ebekufanele kukho into esiyifumeneyo kuwo. Bekufanele ukuba senze ngcono phaya emva – kodwa nsiyaziqhenya ngendlela abadlale ngayo abafana bam. Bazenzile abadlali iimpazamo – kodwa kufuneka sibathembe ukuze bakhule. Ukuba singadlala kanje, siza kuphumelela imidlalo emininzi. Besikufuna ukuphumelela. Akubanga njalo – kodwa ke siyaphambili,” utshilo uTembo emva komdlalo.

headline: UTinkler ushiywe enomsindo yiTP Mazembe
text:
Umqeqeshi weSuperSport United, u-Eric Tinkler, ushiyeke enomsinfo futhi ekhala ngeTP Mazembe engenambeko emva kokuba iqela lakhe lingakwangazana ukuphumelela izolo. Iqela laseDemocratic Republic of Congo, iTP Mazembe, liziintshatsheli ezivunyiweyo zeCaf Confederation Cup emva kokudlala ntanganye ngeqanda neSuperSport United ebinethemba lokufumana impumelelo eLucas Moripe Stadium ebusuku. Kumdlalo wokuqala, iMazembe yabetha Amatsatsantsa a Pitori ngo’2-1 eLubumbashi. Umdlalo wayizolo ubunzima kakhulu – lo nto ibonakele nasebaleni. Usompempe obephethe umdlalo kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba akhuphe amakhade abomvu amabini ngenxa yoburhabaxa babadlali ebaleni. Into ecaphukise abaqeqeshi beSuperSport kukuthukwa nguKabaso Chongo emva kokukhutshwa ngekhadi elibomvu emdlalweni. 
Eli ibilityeli lesibini uTinkler ezama ukuphumelela iConfederation Cup kwisithuba seminyaka nje emibini. Ngo-2015 woyiswa ekugqibeleni njengayizoli esaqeqesha i-Orlando Pirates. Iqela lakhe belinawo amathuba aliqela ekuqoshelisa umdlalo – kodwa alikwazanga ngoba nayo iTP Mazembe ibizimisele kakhulu. “Besizimisele ukuyiphumelela le ndebe. Kukho izinto ezenzekileyo namhlanje endicinga ukuba ziyibeka ibala elibi ibhola yezwekazi le-Afrika,” utshilo uTinkler obethe fixi ngumsindo. 
“Ndisazimisele ukufumana indebe apha e-Afrika – kodwa kukho izinto ezenzekayo futhi ezidakumbisayo. Namhlanje sigezelwe. Xa siye kwamanye amazwe siyahlonipha, abantu beza apha bafike bangaziphathi kakuhle. Kufuneka iphele lo nto,” utshilo uTinkler emva komdlalo. 
Ubukho babadlali abanje ngoReneilwe Letsholonyane akuyincedanga konke konke iSuperSport United engakwazanga ukuwasebenzisa amathuba ebinawo emdlalweni.  
“Ndicinga ukuba iMazembe isixheshile kwimizuzu elishumi yokuqala emdlalweni. Sithe sakungena kakuhle emdlalweni zatshintsha kodwa izinto. Sidlale ibhola entle futhi sisiya phambili. Ewe, siwafumene amathuba – kodwa ngelishwa lethu asikwazanga ukuwasebenzisa kakuhle,” uvale ngalo mazwi uTinkler. 
Umqeqeshi weMazembe, uPamphile Mihayo, ukuvuyele kakhulu ukuphumelela le ndebe nabadlali bakhe izolo. “Besidlala neqela elomeleleyo kakhulu, akubanga lula ukufumana ezi ziphumo,” utshilo uMihayo.

headline: Amakhosi angcwabe iZimamoto ngemvula yamagowuli eNelson Mandela bay Stadium
text:
Abuyele ngesitayile Amakhosi kwimidlalo yeCaf Confederation Cup ngokuzibethela iZimamoto ngemvula yamagowuli amane eqandeli (4-0) emdlalweni obumhle eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ebusuku namhlanje. UKhama Billiat ufake amagowuli amathathu eyedwa kwamane Amakhosi ayingcwabe ngawo iZimamoto ebizama ukudlala ibhola noxa ibingenabo amandla wokumelana neKaizer Chiefs. UKabelo Mahlasela uzifakele elakhe igowuli kwiZimamoto ebidaphudaphu kwisigaba sesibini. UHendrick Ekstein ongene kwisigaba sesibini uwenzile umahluko emdlalweni futhi wancedisa kwigowuli lesibini elifakwe nguBilliat. Umqeqeshi weChiefs, uGiovani Solinas, wenze iinguqu eziliqela kwiqela labadlali aqhele ukulidlalisa. Ezipalini unike ithuba uVirgil Vries; phambi kwakhe bekudlala uTeenage Hadebe, uErick Mathoho noSiphosethu Ntiya-ntiya. Esiswini uWillard Katsande ebebotshwe nesiququ saseMadagasca esidlale umdlalo ophucukileyo – uAndriamirado Andrianarimanana. 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla Amakhosi enkqenkqeza phambili ngegowuli elinye elifakwe nguKhama Billiat ngomzuzu wesithandathu umdlalo uqalile. Umdlalo ubulawulwa yiChiefs futhi ibikwayiyo nevelise amathuba acacileyo emdlalweni. Into abadlali bakaGiovanni Solinas abangakwazanga ukuyenza kukugalela amagowuli emnatheni amathuba okwenza njalo ekhona. Nangona iliqela elingenandumasi kangako ebholeni yezwekazi le-Afrika – kodwa iZimamoto izamile ukuxhathisa saphela isiqingatha sokuqala iChiefs ingakwazanga ukufumana igowuli lesibini ebilifuna. UDaniel Cardoso noogxa bakhe emva bakhe benza impazamo embi ethe yalunguswe nguVirgil Vries emva koxinizelelo olufakwe ngabadlali beZimamoto. UBilliat, uLeornado Castro noLebogang Manyama bazamile ukunkqonkqoza kwiipali zayo iZimamoto – kodwa iinzame zabo ziwe phantsi. 
 
IZimamoto ibuye ekhefini izimisele kakhulu. Abadlali bayo bebetshayela kwanto ephambi kwabo kwaye benayo nendawo erhabaxa ebadlalini beChiefs. USolinas ufake uHendrick Ekstein endaweni ka-Andrianarimanana emzuzwini wesihlanu kwisigaba sesibini. Ngomzuzu wethoba, uBiliat ukhabe intambula yebhola ekude – kodwa ibanjwe lula ngunozinti weZimamoto, uRamadhan Abdalla. Ngomzuzu weshumi elinesine kwisiqingatha sesibini, uKhama Billiat wenze adume ngazo ngethuba efaka igowuli lesibini ethe qelele emva kokudlalelwa ibhola entle ngu-Ekstein noNtiya-ntiya. UKabelo Mahlasela ubhakuzelise umnatha ngomzuzu wamashumi amabini anesithathu kwisigaba sesibini emva kwebhola entle edlalwe nguBilliat noLebogang Manyama esizikithini sebala. Ibathwana labalandeli bebhola ebelixhasa iChiefs ligoduke lixolile ngenxa yenani llamagowuli afakiweyo emdlalweni. 
 
Kaizer Chiefs: Virgil Vries, Daniel Cardoso, Erick Mathoho, Teenage Hadebe, Siphosakhe Ntiya-ntiya, Willard Katsande, Lebogang Manyama, Andriamirado Andianarimanana, Kabelo Mahlasela, Khama Billiat, Leonardo Castro. 
 Zimamoto: Abdalla Ramadhan, Yussuf Ramadhan Mtuba, Amour Hati Aussein, Suleiman Said Juma, Mohd Ramadhan Ameir, Hassan Said Hassan, Hauna Abdalla Jabir, Ibrahim Hamad Ahmada, Nyange Othman Denge, Hafidh Barik Juma.    
Zimamoto: Abdalla Ramadhan, Yussuf Ramadhan Mtuba, Amour Hati Aussein, Suleiman Said Juma, Mohd Ramadhan Ameir, Hassan Said Hassan, Hauna Abdalla Jabir, Ibrahim Hamad Ahmada, Nyange Othman Denge, Hafidh Barik Juma.

headline: Batyunjwe yiCAF abadlali bePirates
text:
Ifolosi ye-Orlando Pirates uThamsanqa Gabuza uthi uchulumancile kukutyunjwa kwakhe kwimbasa yeCAF yomdlali wonyaka obalaseleyo, kunye nabadlali beqela lakhe uKermit Erasmus, Oupa Manyisa kunye noFelipe Ovono. 
Esi sine sabadlali silincede kakhulu eli qela ukuba lifikelele kumagqibela-kankqoyi e-CAF, uGabuza kunye no-Erasmus ngamnye kubo ufake amagowuli amahlanu kolu khuphiswano. UManyisa yena ebeyi kapteni yeliqela, edlala esizikithini sebala phambili kokuba enzakale emlenzeni, * -Ovono yena uqwalaselwe ngendima athe wayidlala kwiqela lase Equatorial Guinea kwimidlalo ye-Afcon ngoFebruwari. 
“Liwonga ngenene ukutyunjwa kunye no-Erasmus. Kungaba kuhle kakhulu ukuba sinyamezele kude kube sekupheleni,” ubhale njalo uGabuza kwikhasi lakhe likaTwitter. 
“Asijonganga phezulu kakhulu kodwa. Sizama ukuzithoba kwaye siyeke indlela esidlala ngayo isithethelele.” 
U-Erasmus yena wongeze ngelithi: “Intle kakhulu kuthi singabadlali into yokutyunjwa kula mawonga ingakumbi kweli nqanaba, kuba ithetha ukuba uqhuba kakuhle.”
